23a3(1): byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bsod pas/ sems can mtha' dang / dpung byed pa 'dul bar 'gyur pa de dag la rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas khong du chud par byed pa 'am/ gang mnga'adas pa dang / 
23a4(1): myong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang po thugs skyed pa nas bzung ste// byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa'i thugs chad yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang / zla byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
23a5(1): 'i byang chub tu 'chang bya bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag mar bskrun pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas bsas cad dang rgyad kyi tshul gcig tu gyu rang pa'i ye shes kyi rlabs kyis rjes su yi rabab / 
23a6(1): de bzhin gshes pa de dag yongs susu ngan las 'das pa'i bstanang par/ yang dag par bzung ba nas// nye bar bzung ba nas/ thams cad kyi/ mthar drug gi bar du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yang bur grub par 'gyur
23a7(1): ba 'am/ sangs rgyas la dbyigs pa'i bsam pa 'byam klas pa brjodadu myed pa'i/ rang gi dmyigs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gang brtsams ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du bsgrib pa myed par/ 
23a8(1): dbyigs pas par byed par byed ba yang rung ste/ ge sa za pa'i rnam par 'bye brjod byed cing / 'byam thas dadang myigs pa na chen po mangs byed pas dmags pa de dag pams pa 'di ltan 'ongs pa'o ste/ dag shi rtse ba dang sad
23a9(1): dang / gang bathu dang ldadra byed pa dge ba'i chu ba de dag gi gang 'i nyid du 'dag pa dres paras par 'byas zlas pa'i dus pa dun pa dang / 'jig rted ni 'am bzhin tu ga blangs pas 'das sa thamasacad/ zangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi chu
23b1(1): 'byung ba dang / gang ji snyed kyi de bzhin nyid go skabs thams cad kyi sngon gyi sku'i skal pa'i mthar gyur da pa/ sa mtshams myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa/ byang chub sems
23b2(1): dpa'i bsam pas rnam par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis yang dag par bzung bdag dadu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyad yongs su dag 'byung ba dang / gang yang las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'am/ gang yang pyod pa las yang dag par
23b3(1): 'byung ba' ba/ gang yang sems can bsgral bar bya ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan pa 'am/ gang yang shin tu mos pa rnam par dag pa 'am/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis shes par bya ba 'am/ gar yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
23b4(1): pa yang dag par bstan pa'as/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams sun ma mamadrig pa'am/ gang mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i briphrim las 'jig rten las 'das pa byung ba'am/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pog spyod pa byas sras
23b5(1): ngas byang ba'ang / ldapa dod pa ga chad rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa pas/ sa cad kyi byin gyi sa rlangs kyis byung ba 'am/ phyi ma'i mara' bskas para'acha rgya bar rgyan chad pa byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs kyi nus thams cad da/ 
23b6(1): chu 'gyu pa/ da 'di byings rdzi thas pa/ chos kyi gyis kyi ras brtags pa 'di rten gyi'ams pas cad thams pas pa/ 'ongs pa'i dus sa pa mas pa'inas su na tu bstan pa/ masongs pa'i
23b7(1): kham gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa grangam myed pa brjod pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i chus rgyun 'chad pa byed cing / sa mtshams kyi mtha' skyed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas thugs su chud pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skad cig
23b8(1): spyan cha byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bzhas pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa thams cad mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'chang mya bachad byed par rang ba dang / mnongs
23b9(1): 'i dus sa mam sa rnyed ci ri la rgya chad padag kya/ babyed dpa de bzhin bshegs pa dgra thos pas dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rlom kyi byings sams pad du byab par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyam rgyan bya 'ong dang / 
23b10(1): gongs su ga pa da po na'i rkye nam par the bdus/ rlos kyi rgyan mid du 'or bya dang dran pa mams pad dang / mi tog bams cad kyi rgyan gyi mam rab tu 'bab pa/ daza' thams cad kyi rgyan gyi srin sa tshogs so can thams cad kyis brgya padas
24a1(1): / tha dad pa'i mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rnam par bres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu rgyan par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brjod du myed pas rab tu brgyan cing grub pa grogs bsam gyis myi
24a2(1): khyab pa/ rnam par dag pas yongs su bsgrubs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin bkyi rlabs kyi rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i
24a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dmyig/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ mthun mong ma yin pas rnam par mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu myong bar 'gyur ba/ chos thams cad
24a4(1): d+hA pa'i rnam pa lta bur khong du chud pa chos thams cad kyi skul pa lta bus rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las 'byam klas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 
24a5(1): 'dzin kyi tshul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi/ khyu mchog mthu' phyung ba/ yang dag par rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od bla na myed pas snang bar byas pa rgya che bsna tshogs pa/ tshad myed pa bsam gyis myi
24a6(1): khyab pa rnams yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag para'agyur ba de bzhin du ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thos cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi
24a7(1): zhing yongs su dag pa rab tu byung byin tu grub rnam par dag pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa kun nas yon tan can 'ang bsngags par bya bar tshad myed bar/ dri zhim po bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ mtha' yas pa/ shing chang
24a8(1): byed pa dang ldan pa/ rgyan grangs myed pa can/ gtsug lag 'ang grangs myed pa dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong pa'i sgra grangs myed pa/ yod pa mtha' yas par rab tu bston pa/ rjes su 'gyod pa'i grogs chad myed pa dang ldan pa/ yon
24a9(1): tan sna tshogs cad gyi zhes pa dang ldan pa / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ blos thams cad sbyin pa/ 'brid pa thams cad kyis brgyadan de/ byem thams cad kyi brgya pa rin po che mas cad kyis rgya nga/ na mabra' thams ca
24a10(1): kyis rgyan pa/ rgyal mchan thasus cad kyis rgyan pa/ ba dan thams cad kyis rgyad pa/ rin po me sa rtogs kyi snam bu kun du btis pas rgyang ba/ rim po che thams cad kyis stegs bus brgyad pa/ gser gi dra ba grang
24b1(1): byed las kun tu yog par brgyan pa/ chu klung grangs myed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ grangs myed pa'i srin gyis char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa/ rol mo brdung ba dang bkrol ba'i tshogs grangs myed pas yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa de dag dang / de bzhin
24b2(1): dus lus pa thams cad rab tu bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyang yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa/ gang dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu mkhyen pa// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam/ 
24b3(1): ma ba'i mtha' gtugs pa zhid gyi gnas su byu dad pa thams cad phyogs kyi lor mtha' yas par shin tu bstan par phyogs bcu rnam par bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'azas 'byam blas pa las rnams pa sna tshogs kyi don par 'du byas pa/ rab pa
24b4(1): khams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gzhan dang gzhan gi rjes su song bar rab tu gnas pa/ las rnam pa tha dad pas shin tu 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du byed
24b5(1): bar shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'byung gnas/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa zhing gyi rnam pa tha dad parjod du myed pa// 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / dpung myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis shin da tu
24b6(1): brtan pa de ltar ma lus pathams cad yongs su bzung ste/ chos kyi kyi sa mas cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi'i thams cad kyi yul 'dug yas rgya rnam par dag pa thams cad dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su na
24b7(1): pa thams cad ci skad du bshad pa dang / ji skad bstan pa dang / ji skad du brjod pa dang / ji skad du gsal bar byas pa dang / ji skad du smos pa dang / ji skad du bslabs pa dang / ji skad du 'grob dang / ji lta bur brta nus pa dang
24b8(1): ri lta bur rnam par 'akod pa de dang de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes pa'i sa sgra kyi zhing kyi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dge ba rang/ sangs rgyas kyi ni/ 
24b9(1): gyi mdag nyid me ba dang / pasangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde par bskyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zil kyis ma non pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad kyi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi bzhi
24b10(1): bas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning gyi rnas pa dang / sang sargyas kyi zhing kyi 'gas pa dang/ sadas rgyas kyi zhing 'o gas pa bdas/ bangs rgyas rtse na ming du nga bdang / sangs rgyas khye zhing gyi zu skyes dang / 
25a1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par bye
25a2(1): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtso bo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgri ra ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mar du
25a3(1): 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pabyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dang/ de skad yongs su bzung ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / 
25a4(1): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par dag pa gang ji snyed pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag par gyun cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'di
25a5(1): lhabu'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan par byar cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na tham / ya 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad yang dag par gnas
25a6(1): bar gyud cig/ grub par gyu rang kyis rnam par dag par gyu rang cig/ yod sa su dag par gyurd cig/ yang dag par grub par gyu dang cig/ na tu byung bar byad cig/ rung tu rgyad par gyudad cig/ kun tu brgyan par gyur
25a7(1): cig/ byung bar gyud cig/ byin gyi rlabs par gyur na cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams tham sa cad du'ang 'a khrus par yongs su bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi
25a8(1): dbyings kyis klas pa/ rkyenas ma' 'im pas gtugs pa/ thams cad ma lus par/ de snyed kyis rgyan gyis yongs su rgyan par gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa lus par dus gsum thams cad kyi sangs rgyas zhis gyi yon
25a9(1): na nam par byes dang / ming sargyam gyi zhing tu dang / sangs rgyas kyi shing bdag nyid che pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bag gyi dbas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dang yangasadang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi rnam
25a10(1): sa sa byo mas kyi tsaca mchom rgyas kyi zhing bachung babyed pa dang/ sa chung ci zhing lam kyi'i par nying ba can gyi ma byasas paca ca/  sa so rnamams
25b1(1): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa/ kun tu spyod pa mang ba/ sems can gyi khams rtogs par byas pa khong du chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings/ 'jug pa/ rab tu rtogs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings
25b2(1): la'ajug pa/ rmongs bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i tshul can tshad myed pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ gtor la'i rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa/ ye shes
25b3(1): kyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can chags pa myed par lta ba dang byigs su myed pa las rab tu 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ram zas log cang 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang
25b4(1): gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chubs tu 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su song ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi yul gyi 'od gzer rab tu 'byed pa bdud las thams cad rnam par sbyangs pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi
25b5(1): rang bzhin khong du chud pa/ byin ci log byed pas yang dag par byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang smon lam la gti mug phyed pa sha stag gis yongasagisu gang bar gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i de lta bu'i tshul can/ de lta
25b6(1): tshung myod pa la/ zug du/ des du'i dzin na dang lda ba mardungs paskyed pa cad/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi zin pas lan namasangs rgyas kyi byang chub sa gang pa rab tu tshor ro// zan pa
25b7(1): 1 chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus gcig gis khyab par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i chen po yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes chen po khong du chud pas thams cad bkye nga pa nyid kyi bum
25b8(1): la nga ldan pa/ ma gyi byis pama' mas pa'i tshig ra tu dbye ba mad dang sgrub sa la sa 'as pa/ 'di thams cad kyi rjes sra mongs/ gnas byed par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na narnam pa/ mam mapar byis su mos
25b9(1): rtsigs pa 'a du 'dus/ ras kya byi 'ams du ma par bye mi bam / byang chub sems pa cid de 'dzin papa ma bas ba 'ogasas sa pabyed pa'i gyod
25b10(1): sangs rgyas kyi nyid la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin kyis rlabs shes par bya ba la sangs pa/ chos grangs byed pa bstan cing bshad pa la 'jigs pa byed pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / dkar thub pa'i sangs kyi
26a1(1): / thams cad kyi dge ba'i rjes su song ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa// A bas ma gyis myi 'am pa rnam par
26a2(1): bye shing mngon par gru la sams / grangs byed pa da nam pa ba nad pa zhes pa tha byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i mkhong du chung ba'is/ 'jig rten ni khams thams cad kyi rnam su ma zhing chags bskyed pa rjod
26a3(1): pha ho 'ongs pa byed pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su rtog sa pas/ gnas pa skyed pa/ sems skyed pa yangs bzhin tu rnam par bsgogs pa/ ye shes gcig tu baspyad pa'i chung ba la mkhas pa/ don cig nas gcig tu bstan pa/ rab tu
26a4(1): grub pa de lta bu dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag yongs su brgyan par gyur cig/ yongs su gang bar gyur cig/ rnam par brjes par gyur da cig/ rjes su dong bar gyurd cig/ kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ baspobs par gyur/ 
26a5(1): cig ga bshin tu bsgoms par gyur cig/ sbyangs par gyurd cig/  shin tu sbyangs par gyurd cig/ zhi bar byas par gyurd cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re phyogs le re zhing yang byang chub sems rapa'i tshad myed pa
26a6(1): grangs skyed pa/ bsas gyi gyi khyab pa/ gzhal du sbed pa/ su skyed ba/ sa mtshams skyed pa/ dpag tu myed pa/ brjod du myed pa/ brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pas/ yongs su rgyas par gyur nga / 
26a7(1): phyogs cig jig pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas zhing rgyas kyi byings kyis 'thas pa/ nam pa 'a'ims gcugs pa/ mthus pa/ thus pabyed pa rnag sa byed pa/ thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu chul can
26a8(1): gyim yongs su rgyas shing yongs su gang bar gyur da nas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ste/ tshul de lta bus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / rdul de lta bus byung ba mas ca/ 
26a9(1): ngang / chub de lta bus sems can gyi 'am sa tshams cad rnaMs pa dag pa dang / chub de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang / rgyab lta bus smon las 'am pacad dngam / tshul de lta bus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ 
26a10(1): sangs rgyas skyes pa mthong ba dang / kyi bral ba ba dang / mu la de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa spu che tshad skyed pa dang / tshul de lta bus thogs pa byed par chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo spong ba'i phyir gyi lton pa'i phyir
26b1(1): yongs su sngo'o/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems
26b2(1): dpa' yongs drug pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyis ma lus par gang bar byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par shin tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
26b3(1): dngag thams cad mkhyen par byung ba/ bgo bskal pa myed par yongs su bsngos pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams chad skyed pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems kyis dang / yongs sngo pa'i tshad bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i rjes su zhugs
26b4(1): pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i mnyam pa nyid las kyi rnam par sbyin pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing shin tu mos pa dang / yongs su sngo ba'i khyad par mtha' yas pa 'brel bar byas pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i
26b5(1): tshul/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rjes su song bas yongs su bsngo/ pa'i tshe/ bdag la myi rtog go// bdag gi lus la rnam par myi rtog/ go/ sangs rgyas la myi rtog do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la myi rtog
26b6(1): ga zhing sa kyi nyon no// zhing gis yang dag par spyod pas rnas paradag pa sa rnas par gyi rtog go// sems cad la rnam par myi rtonag no/ sems cad gtul ba la rnam par byartag na/ las la myi rtog no// 
26b7(1): las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la rnam par myi rtog go// sems cad la chags par myi byed do// bsam pas kyang mngon par chags par myi byed do// rgyu chud bzon par myi byed do// rgyu dang 'bras bu chung gzon par myi byed/ dngos por nye
26b8(1): bar len par myi byed do// dngos po'i chos la yang chags par myi byed do// 'khor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa gcig tu myi byed do// zhi ba rnam par brtags pa myed pas rloms sems myi skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
26b9(1): gshegs pa'i yul gyis bsnyems par myi byed do// chos gang gis kyang chos la gnas par myi byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nye bar bstabs so// khong du chud par byed do// yongs su
26b10(1): 'o ga la yongs su sbyin par par byed do// mnyam par byed do// sprub po// mtshan mar gyi byed do// dbyigs par myi byed do// myi 'jal lo// myi gartag go// rnas par rtog go byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
27a1(1): sa ma dang /  sa ma cad rjes madran papa dge pa'i bkyi rgya'ang ba nyin/ kyang chub sems dpa' masacad pa ya dngan
27a2(1): mas cad kyi de bayin/ nga rnam pa dag pas sangs su stobs/ dge ba tha bgyi 'a ba yin/ sems can 'ab rnam pa dag pa sa pam myong bas dge pa'i rtsa babyin pa / 
27a3(1): chos gyi dbyings su 'jug pa la mazhugs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gyi zad pa yin/ nas mkha'i khams ltar tshad byed pa'i sems la yongs su bsgom pas dge ba'i rtsab myi zad pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul
27a4(1): sa shin tu mos pas dge ba'i 'chab kyi zad pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las la bcor pas dge ba'i rtsab phyi zad pa yin/ dus gsum rab tu rnam par 'byed pas// dge ba'i rtsab myi zad pa yin te// de ni sem
27a5(1): sa can gyi khams thams cad la sems can myed par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o// chos thams cad la srog myed par khong du chud cing yongs su sngoru/ chos thas cad la byed pa myed par yang dag par
27a6(1): ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su sde'o/ dge ba'irtsa ba thams cad la gang zag myed par sems shing yongs su sto/ chos thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par rab tu rtog cing yongs su
27a7(1): sngon/ chos thams cad kyi rten pa yang dag par mthong zhing yongs su na/ dngos po thams cad la gyi gnas pa yang dag par ji ste ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su ma'o/ zhing thams cad la yang dag par
27a8(1): myi gnas pa nyid du shes shing yongs su rlo'o// bya chub ses sa dpa'i spyod pa la myi gnas pa nyid dug zhing yongs su sngo'o// dmyigs pa thams cad la dbyigs su byed pa nyid du shes pas mthon zhing yongs su rdzo /  de
27a9(1): yongs su smros/ ning gang yang kun ne sanyon mongs pa dang bcas par gyig las tu myi srung bar 'gyur ro// kun tu lta yang sems can gang yang gyi thun pa mthong bar gyi 'gyur ro// myong ba'i tshe chos gang yang yang dag par gyi brtson
27a10(1): do// ye shes kyi 'jug pas gang la yang 'jug pa myed do// nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad la yang rab tu gnas te de yang shin tu shes so// bsod nams kyi stobs chad byed pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i spug chos thams cad gang ba
27b1(1): shin tu shes so / sems can thams cad tshim por bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad du 'gro ba la yang dag par baspyod do// de'i sems skyed pa re re zhing yang sems can brjod du myed pa'i yang / brjod du byed pa stobs bcu'i
27b2(1): sar yang dag par 'grub bo// des sems rnams cad bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rma ba rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung nas dang ldan pa zas cad rab tu bas zlas po
27b3(1): ze yo byad ci 'dod pa phun gsum tshogs pas bsod nams kyi mdzod yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// de gang gang dang tu 'gro ba de dang de dag tu zhing thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing 'gro'o// de gang dang gang
27b4(1): sems can bdod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa rnas pa pang dag par bya ba'i phyir bsod rnams kyi rmongs kyis yongs su brdung ba la rab tu nog cing yang dag par gyur ro// de ltar yongs su rdzo ba de rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyas thus pas
27b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyor pa na gzugs myed pa yin/  'jig rten thams cad kyis phyi non pa'i bsod nams yin/ bdud thamasacad kyis gzi' brjid myi zad pa yin/ phyir rgol ba thams cad dge ba'i
27b6(1): rtsa ba myi phrogs pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid yang dag par brtog pa dang ldan pas smod lam yin tu che ba dang / sems rab tu yangs pa yin/ sems bskyed pa gcig gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad byed par
27b7(1): 'gro ba yin/ ye shes kyi stobs mtha' yas pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul yongs su shes pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu dang po yin// ye shes mtha' yas par shin tu 'jug pad la rab tu gnas yin// nam
27b8(1): a ba'i dbyings kyis klas par chos kyi dbyings yangs pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i chen po rnags kyi yongs su sngob lnga pa/ bsod nams myi bzad pa'i mdzod ces pa ste/ de la gnas
27b9(1): ba'i byang chub sems dpa di myibad pa'i mdod bcu pa gatho bo// cugang zhe na/ kwa'i grangs gcig tus ngas rgyam grangs byed par 'byung ba la 'drug gyi sangs rgyas pal du ba mtho 'o// chos thams
27b10(1): cad gcig tu rab tu gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / ye shes kyi phyir chos kyi 'jug pa'i gter myi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// de zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung zhing
28a1(1): chun byi thos par bya ba'i phyir dran pas gzung ba'i gter gyi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob/ de bzhin gshes da pa thams cad kyi tshul dang / dgos pa shin tu bstand pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ 
28a2(1): blo gros rnam par nges pa'i gnyen gyi zad pa'i mngon rab tu rdo 'i po/ chos kyi chul rnam par dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir rig pas 'dzin pa'i gter gyi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thong // nam la ba'i dbyings mnyam pa'i rdo
28a3(1): dus gsum thams cad khyab par bya ba'i phyir blo chad b+ha'i gter myi gzad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// sems can thams cad tshim par bya bas myi zad par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi gter myi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// sems can thams
28a4(1): cad kyi thun pa dang / ling tog dang / gti mug dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par gsal ba'i phyir ye shes dang / dga' ba dang blo'i gter myi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid bu ring pa'i rab tu bstan pas/ 
28a5(1): sems can thams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa rnam par nges pa de'i gter rab tu thob bo// byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pargyad kyi chad pasathams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid chags pa myed pa'i thabs spyod myed pa'i dbang skur
28a6(1): ba'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang / gyi 'jigs pa'i gter gyi thang parang du thob ste/ gter gyi zang pa'i mdzod bcu po 'di dag rab tu thong mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i rgyal mtshar gyis sangs rgyas kyi byi rgya
28a7(1): brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsam pas mthu stobs rnyed pa de dag ni/ mtha' yas chos la kun tu dbang sgyur cing/ rnga bsod nams gter la rjes su yi
28a8(1): rang ba/ de dag chags byed tshul gyis yongs su sngo \u0f7f// rus gsum rgyal ba su dag ri snyed pas// rnam dag zhing rnams 'jig rten rnams sbyangs pa// yon tad kun dang ldan zhing 'phags pa'i rnams // de 'dra'i rdzas dag zhing du yongs su sngo
28a9(1): dras gsungam rgyal ba ji snyed bzhugs pa'i tshul rnams kun la rjes su sems byed cing // thams cad lus pa byed par des gzung ste// de 'dra'i zhing ni gtan pa rnams kyis brgyad// dus gsum bskal 'ji snyed yod pa'i// zhing gcig yod
28a10(1): de dag blang byas kyang // bskal pa ji snyed de dag zar 'gyur gyi// zhing gyi yon tan bsngags pa myi zad 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i zhing rnaMs thams cad ma lus par// myi'i ma thA hrIsgra ji snyed mthong 'gyur ba// thams cad ma lus zhing kyi yon tan gyis
28b1(1): ji sri 'jib nyid dag gan pa sbeng / de dag gu kya na ma dag si dang ldan/ de dag rgya ba'i gsang skyes mas yin te/ yanatu 'akun kyis brgyad pa'i sems dang ldang/ zhing gi phyogs rnams ras tu rgyas par byed// de dan thus ni mtshan
28b2(1): gyi shi rgyan// de dag 'i byang bzang pos lus kyang mdes// de dgas tha' yas yang dag so sogs// 'gro ba'i rgyam tsho'i gyi mang ji gzhin no// de dag spyod yul dag dang yang dag ldan// ting 'dzin kun la gangs pa rjes su zong/ 
28b3(1): mchung sa byed shin tu rnams drag pa'i yid// thams cad phyogs rnams su ni 'od 'byed// 'di 'dra'i zhing rnams ma lus gzung byas te/ nyan thos pyod yul dag la dang byed pa/ rang rgyal thams cad shin du spangs 'gyur te// phyi'i dam pa
28b4(1): shin tu gang gyur na cig/ de dag de 'dra'i yongs sngo sems ldan pa// gang gis ma lus jig rten byang chub sa tu/ dus gsum rgyal bas mngon par sangs rgyas pa// de dang ldan par yongs su sngo bar byed/ phyogs bcu kun na ji snyed pani
28b5(1): bdud dang / nyon mongs de dag gu 'dong mas// dpal ldan mthub can ka gzhan gyis pham phyi nus// rnam par nges par chos kyi dam pa spyod// de dag smod lam mthu' stobs yangs pa 'is/ yongs su sngo ba chags/ 
28b6(1): pa byed byed cing // bsod nams cang byed de dag mdzod du zhugs/ de ni dus gsus kun tu zad kyi 'gyur// de dag spyod pas chos la 'das bar byed// de dag byed pa byed pa'i chos la zhugs// g.yo myed chos
28b7(1): kyang de dag rab tu shes// las kyi rnam pas yongs su myi sems so// gzugs ni ma yin 'os kyang gzugs myed myin// 'du shes myed myin 'du shes yod pa myin/ dngos yod ma yin dngos po myed pa myin/ dngos myed thams
28b8(1): zang rang bzhin yong du chud / yod pa 'od ma yin myed pa'ang ma yin te// rgyu'i rgyud la mngon par chags myi byed/ rkyen la 'jug par de dag kyi byed de// nam yang de dag chags par myi byed do// 'gro ba 'di la sA tshul ri snyed pa// de la nas
28b9(1): 'chags par gyi 'byed do// 'du shes bsas pa bad yang rab tu shes// bdag myed chos kyang so so mazhin tu rtogs// de dag sems can gyi bral cis 'gyur ro// 'di 'dra'i tshis nyid mnyam pa tu rtogs// de 'dra'i zhing
28b10(1): de bzhid las rnams/ dus gsum thams cad ma lus gzung byas shing // shes byas de dag de bzhin yongs su sngo/ las kyi rnam par gang gis skye ldan zhing // rang bzhin da ma tshan nyid gang yid dang // den ci 'dra'i chos nyid
29a1(1): ba /  // yod pa dag de shi de dag dag par yongs su sngo// gang gi yid kyis ngo bo nyid dang 'ang bya// rang bzhin byas pa phyed par de dag shes// 'gro la de dag kyi gnas lend pa byed pa// 'gro ba kun phying yongs su gzhog
29a2(1): spyod yul ma lus thams cad gzung byas shing 'od gsal thams cad rjes su sems par byed// ma lus thams cad de bzhin nyid kyang de dag shes// gang gis lta ba thams cad ma lus shing // bsam pa'i spyod por rnam par spangs pa'i rnams// / 
29a3(1): rtag tu de dag dri myed kun gdung byed/ chags myed kun gyi tshul yang rjes su/ rtogs// de dag gis ni chos rnams ma shig ste// nams kyang chos nyid zhig par 'gyur ba byed// chos la chags par de dag myi byed do// de dag 'jig rten smra
29a4(1): brnyan 'dra ba yin// gang gis dus gsum 'jig rten skyes pa'i// 'gro ba rkyen byang chos kyang rab tu shes// bsam pa dag dang bag chags khong du chud // thams cad 'jig par byed pa gang yang myed// de dag las dang las myin rab tu shes
29a5(1): las dang rnam par 'gal bar myi byed de// las kyi rnam pa sbyin pa chung la/ myi gzon// rgyu las byung ba'i chos kyang shin tu bston// 'di na seg nas can gang yang 'khor ba byed// sems can rnams la gnas pa byed
29a6(1): bar smra// sems can rgyud kyi nya yang rab tu rtogs//  bsod nams kyi tha pe ga 'i mdod pa ces bya ba ste// yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i mas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
29a7(1): yongs su sngo ba drug pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal por gyur te srid chen po thob nas/ tshe ba dang / phyir rgol
29a8(1): pa bcom ste// rgyal po chen por grags pa dang / srid chen po khams la gnas shing srid yangs pa la dbang bar gyur nas/ 'khon myed cing / stong pa myed par srid la gnas pa gang chos kyi rgyal srid kyis spyod par byed pa/ chos dang
29a9(1): 'thun pa chos kyi rjes su me skyes pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i srid chen po thob pa// sa chen po la gdugs cig tu gyurang pa/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa myed pas skyong ba dri ma myed pa'i thabs thob pa// srid la pha rol gyi sdes gce ba
29a10(1): myed pa// chos dang ldan pa dbyin pa myed pa dang / mtshon cha myed pas 'gro ba rnams shin tu spyod pa/ chos kyi rjes su zhugs shing // slu ba'i dngos po zhes 'gro ba sdud pa 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po gyu dad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la
29a11(1): byin pa btamamam rgya sagan byam man med ni nas sargyas ma d+ha ji na gras ma cu bas d+ha skyes po sus ma sa rgya lo bcas ma
29b1(1): marjod kyi sa rin tu marnam pa de dbang byag de lasul gnas shing / de gadrug chom la gnas pa/ gsos dang 'arjod mang pog tu smras pa/  gzugs dang bladang / 'grob ma cad gangs gyur bar ba/ yi sa ma
29b2(1): byed pa gsod nams rnam par dag dang ldan pa/ zi lad kyi gyi non pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa she lus shin tu rnam par phye ba mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ bltan bzang ba tshul dang mthun pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bstobs dang ldan pa ga thub pa
29b3(1): myed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs chen po dang ldan pa mthu' chen po'i lus kyis bzung ba/ rnam par dag pa'i las dang ldan pa/ bsgrib pa myed pa'i las rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa des zas yongs su gtong ba 'am/ btung ba 'am/ 
29b4(1): ro 'am/ bzhon pa 'am/ gos sam mye tog gam// 'phreng ba 'am/ spos sam/ byug pa 'am/ al ca'am/ gnas sam rgya rten nam// mar bye 'am/ smon dam 'am/ nad kyi rkyen sman nas/ yo byad rnams sbyin pa 'am/ rin
29b5(1): go mas gzhal ba'i snod sna tshogs pa kang zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / shing rta du brakang zhing tshad myed pa'i tshe dang / nor yongs su gtong ba dang / glang po cang shes sam/ rta cang shes rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par
29b6(1): cod pan nas/ gtsug gi nod bu dag dbang phyag la gyi bonas dbang skud pas/  btson bcas bcings shing brtson dan 'dug pa'i sems can rnams thong nas/ rom thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / g.yog dang / bdag tu bcas te byin
29b7(1): nas/ bcom na de dag nas ses smra rnams yongs su dad par byed pa/ bsad par khrid pa mthong nas bdag gi lus dang /  ng+ge srog yongs su gtang ste gsang pa de blu bar byed pa/ gtsug pun dang thor bag tu bcas pa'i mgo bo dag kyang
29b8(1): slong bas bslangs na// myi gtong ba myed pa'i sems kyis gtong pa// myi gnyis yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rna ba dang / sA yongs su gtong ba 'am/ song dang / tA lce yongs su gtong ba 'am/ mgo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ 
29b9(1): galag yongs su gtong ba 'ab/ rab gi lus kyang dral cing spong ba la zhag yongs su gtod gtong ba 'am/ ga dang gang yang yongs su gtong ba'am/ slong ba la rang gi lus las snying byung ste/ yongs su bu Sh+TaH/ 
30a1(1): @#// spong zhing len pa sna tshogs la spyam dang / ched pa dang / ma'al ma dang / pho ba rnams yongs gtong ba'am/ rang gi lus las yan lag dang nying lag dang / nus pa bslangs na dad pa'i sems kyis yongs
30a2(1): su gtong ba lam stong pa la mos par lta bas pags pa dang / mdog yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rgal ga las sor mo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ chos 'dod pa'i phyi rang gi sha dang sen mo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ chos shin tu dgon
30a3(1): pa chol zhing skyes gang ba'i lobs spyid phreng lag tag bdun du mchod par byed pa 'am/ chos srung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal spyod pa thams cad kyang rang gi lus kyis bzod par byed pa 'am/ chos chos zhing chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 'bru cig gi phyir
30a4(1): nga / rgya mtshol ba thug pas chen za 'angs sugatong ba'am/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug byed pa 'am / phyi dge ba'i chos las sems cad rnams bzlob ste/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu bskyod ba 'am skyes bu'i margyas
30a5(1): gcod pa mthong nas ka sdig pa'i las de dag las/ sems canade dag rnam par zlo ka m+le \u0f7f/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sa nas rgyas par 'jig rten thams cad sgrog cing gtsug la khab shA dang / pho brad
30a6(1): rgya lo ba pyod kyi phyir gyis dang // khams yongs su gtong bsa'am rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir/ bran dang las byed pa'i phyirna mas gtong pa 'am// slong ba la'i mgro bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid dbul ba 'am/ chos
30a7(1): dad pas dga' zhing mgu bu'i rnyed nas/ rang gi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rim 'gro byed pa 'am// bdag nyid sems can thams can la gtor ba 'am// sangs rgyas thams cad la rim 'gro ba'i phyir rgyal srid yongs su gtong pa dang
30a8(1): klong ga rnams la gyi rigs su yul dang phyin bcas pa 'am/ gro khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yongs su gtod pa 'am/ slong ba la bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dag yongs su btod pa 'am
30a9(1): spong ba rnams kha ci rigs su khyim thams cad yongs su sbyin zhing gtod pa 'am/ bza' shing gi ra ba sbyin pa 'am/ slong ba sna tshogs dang // lend pa sna tshogs dang // sems can sna tshogs dang / gang zag sde tshogs dang ldan pa
30a10(1): pa phyogs tha dad pa nas 'od pa/ tshad las 'das pa'i myi dang // myi sna tshogs dang / sbyin pa'i gnas la mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma grangs myed pa rnams byed cing yongs su gtong ba'am/ de sbyin pa'i
30b1(1): dbyigs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su rtong pa'i che// seMs 'di ltar bskyed de yongs su sngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song / bas/ gzugs shin tu bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po
30b2(1): rjes su songs/ gzugs shin tu bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po rjes su song bas tshor ba shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song / pas/ 'bru byed shin tu bzung bas/ dge bzhi
30b3(1): rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas/ rnam par shes pa shin tu bzung bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su bsod pas// srid thams cad shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i 'chab thams cad kyi snying po'i
30b4(1): rjes su song ba bas 'kho shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po la rjes su song bas/ long bapyod shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su grus/ sbyin gshin tu gzungs / 
30b5(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ bla na myed pas dmyigs nas/ bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'di dag 'di ltar btang nye ba dang / 'di ltar sbyin pa dang / 'di ltar chags pa myed pa dang / 'di
30b6(1): lha dbyings pa byed pa dang / 'di ltar nye bar btang ba 'di ltar sa bzung ba dang / 'di ltar lhag par bsam pa dang / 'di ltar nga sa tho yongs su btang dang 'di ltar dmyigs pa la myi gnas pa das
30b7(1): 'am nga 'a na/ sem panamapa pa mishes kyi la zas dang ldan pa dang / chags babyed pa la brtson pa sems kyi rnam yongs sugs pas// shes bskyed pa rnams dang / dana' ba'i nas dang/ 
30b8(1): zang zing 'i zas dang / ye shes rgya dang / chos kyis brtan pang dang/ dge ba'i rtsabs yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi sgyu dang / ye shes kyi sbrul yang dag par spyod pa dang/ sbyin pa'i gnas dang / sbyid rtse bdi 'azlas rab tu
30b9(1): len par byed cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas sbyin pa de dag yongs su sding // byang chub sems dpa' btung ba'i skyid pa gtong ba'i se mas che/ 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge pa'i rtsal
30b10(1): 'dis/ sems can thams cad chos kyi gdung ba 'thung ba la brtson pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i skom pa rgyar chung pa dang / sangs kyi ye shes kyi sgom pa las mya ldog padas/ 
31a1(1): bdang shes rab rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / chos kyi ri rab dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi btung bas ngoms par gyur da cig ces de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btung ba'i sbyin deng g.yongs su rlom
31a2(1): byang chum sems dpa' bro ba sbyin pa spyod thams cad pasal nas rnas par dag pa sbyar ba dang ngang ba dang / kha ba dang / tho ba dang / chab dang pas tshogs kyi rom chog dang ldanapa/ shin tu 'das pa'i 'o mchog pan kyi
31a3(1): rnam pa dang ldan pa/ ro sna chogaso bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong bsngags pa dang ldan pa// khams rnams mnyam zhing 'khrug pa byed par gnags lus kyi stobs rton par byed pa / sems dka' thar/ dad cing sos pa dang / 
31a4(1): tsA ba dang / gsal pa skyed pa / zhis zhing chu ba dang ldan pa'i ron dam par gyur ba/ nang kyi dbang po nas yang dag par byed// to/ la bde bas yang dag par rton pa/ snyom pa thams cad sel bar byed pa
31a5(1): nigan mang wa 'o ste/ sems ca mas cad bcu mim nom panyam pa'i sems kyis daza ba'i mchog dang sbed par byu cig sems napa' 'as thabs kyi pa sas kyi mayongs shes zhing / chos kyi
31b1(1): byung byeng chos kyi sa mid rgyas par byud da cig/ ces de ltar mo'i sbyin pa'i tshogs la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpag sems dpa' chen po// sems can thams cad kyi ye shes chags pabyed pa'i phupras tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir de
31b2(1): ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzhon pa'i sbyin gtong ba'i me/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi theg pa la zhon par gyur da cig/ theg
31b3(1): pa ches rlob tu ci rngam par zhig pa myed pa'i theg pa dang / mchog/ gi theg pa dang / dam pa'i batheg pa dang // mgyogs pa'i theg pa dang bsod nams dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
31b4(1): theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i theg pas byung ste/ yon tad thams cad bran chag sum tshogs par gyudad cig ces de sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
31b5(1): pabasta sa ba sa sa pa 'du/ byang rna thams pabs pa me/  bdeg pang na sa sa yod pa/ 
32a1(1): kyi'i sa nas na su/ dgar dung gnams spangs rgyas ba ldan 'das sang tu byu pa dang // de bde gshegs pa'i mangs su myang ma lam 'das
32a2(1): mchod ce rnams la 'bral ba dang / chos makon mchog ma mchod par// byed pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la dbul ba dang nga / dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' la dbu' ba dang
32a3(1): sa dang / rang sa sa rgyam dang / ba dang 'arnams la te sbyin pa'i byed pa'i ni/ chung ngun bdag gi lus dang // des yin pa gzhan 'akren pa dang / phongs pa spong zhing led pa sa chos
32a4(1): la re ba de dag sbyin par byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dge 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan 'as/ sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzind kyi
32a5(1): me tog rgyas pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la dgal ba rab tu rnyed nas/ bltan myi ngoms par gyu rang cig/ sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi sems myi khrugs
32a6(1): pas ltan yid du 'ong bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i las la lta zhing nye bar pyod pas lta ba yangs par gyur na cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i ba shes gnyen thams cad la blta dang
32a7(1): sems ma nyams pas rjes su lta ba'i dran bya dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i dug sreg pa'i phyir/ drug sman bzang po nyams su myong ba lta bur gyu rad cig/ sems can
32a8(1): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po la 'gro ba thams cad 'god pas smon lam chen po ma 'ong par gyur cig pa/ sems can thams cad// sems can gyi rab rib dang / yid tig/ dang / bud pa bsal ba'i rkye
32b1(1): kyimathong 'amad pa'i mi phor bar gyun cig/ sems can thams cad kyang chub kyi 'od rnam par spe Ti phyis rnab sna bu mthong par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing
32b2(1): chos kyi rnam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis ma rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i gling du 'jug pa mthong bar gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad kyi sgribs pa myed pa'i
32b3(1): ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa la'i me tog yongs su gtong bar gartogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs sngo'o// byang chub sems
32b4(1): dpa' 'phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i che dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad blta na mdzes pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// blta na yid du 'ong ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// blta na bzang ba'i phyir yongs su sngo
32b5(1): blta na sdug pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// blta na mngon/ par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o9/ blta na mya ngan myed phyir yongs su sngo'o/ blta rab tu dga' ba'i phyir yongs sngo'o// blta na yid du myi
32b6(1): bde ba myed pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas mdzod ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs su sde'o// bla na myed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mthor ba rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir yongs sngo'o ste/ 
32b7(1): de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'greng ba'i sbyin pa'i byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa
32b8(1): de sa sems camams cad pa di rjo/ rlom mongs su song ngas skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad chus khrisas kyi sa dang lda par byud cig/ gabyal sa shinas ma dang / ma
32b9(1): dang / mam ma 'i phyi dang di rten papa 'das pa'i dra bami da / rkyed drus me dpa rnams kyi 'o'o phyi chu thi dang / dran par gyun ci// chu rdzigs kyi drang po nga da
33a1(1): maca tu pa'i chub brims songs sangs pa dang / sems canams cad ldan pa bya byeg ces de ltar byang chu mems dpa sems dpa 'anam thas kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i rje/ dge pa'i za bded gi sems 'anan ma
33a2(1): zug pa'ibyon bamasongs su zung bab dge ba'i rgya 'dis sems can sa'acad gtong babams cad sangs su gto zhing skyi pas 'asgos par gyur ci/ mami ca 'ams ca rags pa byed pa'i bams parab tu/ 
33a3(1): dring bzod pas pa smos par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub dasems dpa'i theg pa chen po la brtson 'grus kyi go ma bgos shing / brtson pas 'grus kyis bsgos par gyu dang cig/ sems can thams cad da ltar byung ba'i
33a4(1): sangs rgyas mngon du zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas bsam gtan gyis bsgos par gyur na cig/ sems can rams cad bla na byed pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po la skad cig gis rnam par dag cing zhes ra/ 
33a5(1): khyis bsgos par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad gyur byed pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa byed pa rab tu thob ning chos kyis bsgos par gyur cing ga sems can thams cad/ yon tan 'bas kyi le shes rab tu za bcing son tad byis
33a6(1): smos par gyu rad cog/ sems cadan thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rolang tu phyind pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyis bsgos par gyu radang cig/ sems cadan thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos
33a7(1): ma 'das rnams ni mas dang rnas 'anos pang sa / che de bar cang chum ze sadapa' med man pa tshon pabyag pa'i byed pabyed pa 'i dge pa rtse ba de dag yongs pa so// rgya ma las dpas phas pa'i spyod 'byed pa
33a8(1): des yi ma bde das di sar songs thos 'o zhe/ mes sa thabs ca shes pa dang me ga cher po thob pa'i nyin danas kyis pa ra rab tuthob par byas cig / sems can pasas ca kyima'i rgyachos mid pa'i thang bu gyi byan
33a9(1): dgo ba'i phyir/ gathags pa'imapa ras tu thob par gyur na cig/ sems can pas shad 'dor ba'i zug pa garnams pad gongs su sred pa'i phyi bde 'a'is pa rab tu thos par byas cig/ sem carnamams cad sangs rgyas mams ca rnam pa
33b1(1): 'i chos 'dral yang dag par mthong ba'i phyid/ rin po ni lta bu'i mapa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad legs par bkod pam gse go ba'i phyir mnyam pa byed pa'i mas rab tu thob par gyur cig
33b2(1): sems can thams cad 'jig rten pas 'das pa'i chos zi lad kyis ma non pa rnam par dag pas/ rgya mtshon sde rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi bde ba dang ldan pas/ dge' pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur pa cig
33b3(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyogs pa la brtson pas shin tu dga' ba'i lam rab tu thob par gyur gyi// sems can thams cad dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis sgrub pa dang / ldan pa shin tu brtan pa'i lal rab tu thob par gyub
33b4(1): cig / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzinas pa lta bur glo g.yas pras 'bebs pa dang ldan pas seng ge'i mal rab tu thob par gyurang gcig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa shes bzhin gyis shin tu bsam pa'i dbang
33b5(1): b.langs byu snag sa / rdzun bams pa sbyin pasos sug nga ba dge pa'i bde dag sems can thams la bya sngo sa/ brang chub sems dpa' dab sems rkyen po gnas kyi hU~M/ 
34a1(1): bde ba'i sems kyi ye shes kyi rten chen po la spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten la spyod pa dang / bla ma'i rten la spyod pa dang / legs par spyod pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po'i
34a2(1): rten la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyinang pa drug gi rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems shin tu yangs pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam gyi rten la spyod
34a3(1): cing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten la spyod par bla rad cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rgyab rten byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad/ yon tan thams cad rnam par
34a4(1): dag par 'gyur ba dang / shin tu dag par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / las rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang kau chos rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang // bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / 
34a5(1): sa rnam par ngas pam gyung ba dang / sman las nam pa na der gyur pa dang / ban pa bshes pa tan dang/ yeshes rnam na pa gyur bar byunga'i phyir yongs su sngo// byang chub sems dang
34a6(1): da kyi bar me /  ro/ rab mas pang snang ba'i mar me / rnam pa de ga bu'i mam me de dag sas su gtong shi sbyin pabyed pa da/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba rnams cadas bde ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rtu
34a7(1): 'di gang bdas tha sngo ste/ mang ba sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dgege pa'i rtsa ba 'das/ sems can 'ams cad/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyichos la snang ba ma pa yas par 'gyur gcig / sems can bams cad 'jig tan bams pa
34a8(1): shin tha phra ba dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir/ snang ba zhin tu gas sa zhing dang bar byur nga cig/ sems can thams cad/ sems can byed pa'i khams yongs su shes shing snang ba // rang rib byed par gyur cig / sems cas thams cad 'o
34a9(1): 'byed pa'i lus su mngon par byung zhing snang ga ma pa la yas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir myi ldog pa'i sems dang / ldan zhing 'od kun tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur gcig/ 
34b1(1): sems can thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa dem ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi 'od rab tu thob par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'od gcig gis
34b2(1): rgyas par byed cing / thogs pa byed pa'i snang ba dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems cad thams cad pasas gyis myi khyab pa'i zhing du 'od gzer rab tu 'byed cing / spang na bag tu byed par gyu da cig/ sems can thams
34b3(1): cad ye shes kyi skan 'das 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing / 'od snang ba'i slar mda'i rgyal po lta bur gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad zhing kun tu 'od 'byed pa'i rnam par phul pas byung zhing
34b4(1): snang ba'i kha dog mtha' yas par gyurd cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me'i smin pa rab tu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems
34b5(1): can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs bzung bas yongs su 'dzind do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bzung bas yang dag par
34b6(1): 'dzin to// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rdza pa'i/ skal pas bgo bsha byed do// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba snying brdze bar byed do// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba sbyin par byed do// 
34b7(1): sems can thams cad dge ba'i rdza bas rab tu gzung bas sa tu 'dzin to// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu sbyi sa/ sa yongs su sbyin par yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can rnams
34b8(1): cad dge ba'i rtsa bas dmyigs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes pas rnam par dpyod par byed do// de ltar mar me sbyin pas
35a1(1): sa la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul gis spang a ga da lta bur gyu dad cig ka sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug gis gsal shing 'byin cing te/ sangs rgyas kyi sman du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dzal
35a2(1): cad rnam par spyod pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu myi khrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyu rang bcig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gso' ba la
35a3(1): zhugs shing smad gyi sdong lo ga bung bya dang cig/ sems can 'ams cad/ tha thams cad ma byen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu rdzong ma cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam 'di lta ba bzhin du smar gyi sbyor ba la bzod
35a4(1): bas 'grob bams cad kyi blan la mdzes par gyud cig ce de ltang byang chub sems dpa kun gyi sbyid byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thems can dmas cad gi tugamo pa'i phyin 'ongs su sngo / gon tu bde'i dga' bgyi
35a5(1): yongs su sngon ga/ sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par da pa'i phyir yongs sla sa/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan / myi mnga' ba lta bur rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sa / sems can
35a6(1): thasas cad kyidang kyig dru mams pa brjog pa'i phyi yongs su sngon/ sems cad thams cad kyil ma nyams pa byed cing/ brtan pa'i yongs sa sdod pa sems can thams cad rdo rje'i khong sugs zur gnos
35a7(1): gyi rloms pa dang // stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyin yongs su 'o// thoms can thabs cad stobs mams cad kyis brtan cing shA bas ma bzhin du 'tho' ba'i thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngon/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas
35a8(1): byi de ba'i rnamapa/ sa kyis byed pa'i bas pa rdzogs par tha sa kyi sa pa'i/  spangs sa can kyi kyi sa 'i phyi yongs na na
35a9(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' ma chen po spyod sna tshogs dang/ bre dang lA pre khA sbyid pa byed/ di swA s+t+waMH/ gser gyi snod dang / gser gyi rje da// lA bre rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngub gyi sdod
35a10(1): rang / das kyi med mthong na pa'i ma rdzogs kyis rgyas sa ba ku ga da du dris gi nyid tu 'ab srin byed cu'i ni dang / ma ze ring po rnas pa 'dang bas sangs pasagangs dang 'angs byen
35b1(1): snod dang shel gyi bre dang ka lnga bre rin po che'i rgyan rtsa rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste mu sa rA ga la bzhi / snod dang / Di mu sa ra gal ba'i bre dang / lnga bre mu tig dmar pos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste a spa gang
35b2(1): rang rjo gam gdasa'i ze dang /  lnga sngo po che'i kyi bu dang / nod du rin ze me'i 'od gzer snang bas yongs su 'greng ba dngag 'di lta ste rin po che gi ba'i snod dang / rin po cheg pa'i khri dang / lnga bre la zas zhis po'i mchog pa tshogs kyin
35b3(1): yongs su bgang ba dang / ba tu ste can dang gyi bro dang / can de gyi bre dang / A we lba rdzas lta bu'i gos thugs kyis yongs su bkang pa dang / 'di sku ste rdo rje'i snod dang / rdo rje'i bre dang / lnga gre spos rin po ma bye ga zag khrig brgya grong ngu mas yongs
35b4(1): zu bkang ba dang 'di lta ste snong snga tshogs dngos po rnam la tha dad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / bre dang lnga bre du ma sA rogs pas tshogs par bya ba chad skyed pa'i nor gyi dbi gu dang / dngul dang / gser byes yongs su bkang ba de dag
35b5(1): ston gyi gnas bsam gyis kyi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul lam pa// dge ba'i gshes nyen glid tu dkon pas sems bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog zas
35b6(1): mag sangs rgyas kyis bstanan pa shin tu bstan pa byid 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dbul ba kham 'phags pa'iskye bo la shin tu mos pa'i sems kyis gang zag rnam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs
35b7(1): rgyas la dbul ba 'ang/ bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing bshes gnyen la rim 'gro bya ba'i sems kyis// pha dang ma dag la sbyin pa byed sri ma/ de dang de dag tu yon tan gyi tshogs pas chags pa dang / kadams ngag dang ka bslab par
35b8(1): 'phags pa'i nyan pa la gnas par brtson pas/ ba slob dpon dang / b+h+ra me dang // sbyin pa'i gnas la 'phrul lam/ sems can thams cad la zhe myi sdang ba'i byig gis byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing gtong ba'i sems kyis 'das pa 'bos
35b9(1): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gcig tu nges dar zhugs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa thams cad rtsom zhing tshogs chen po grangs myed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs
35b10(1): sra myi gtor zhing kyi spang ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par mi chags pa dang/ yon gyi gnas thams cad rab tu gzung ba'i sems la gnas pas bkren pa dang / phongs pa'i spong ba rnams la snod sA zhes
36a1(1): bre dang ma rnon pa byad tshogs dam pa pa dang sa yongs su pabang ba de dag sbyin pa dang / yongs su 'atong ba'i tshogs dge ba'i rtsa pa de dag 'di ltar yongs su ste/ dge pa'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad drang ba'i dbang po sangam nga'i
36a2(1): dbyings lhan sangs pa dang ldan te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad thams cad gzung ba dang / blang ba dang / yid la bya ba'i dran pa mongs pa myed cing snod tshad myed pa'i snying po can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zab no/ 
36a3(1): rgyun chad byed pa'i chos can du gyur pa te/ snod la zang po rnam par dag par gyund cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'dzis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bla na/ myed pa'i snod rin po che
36a4(1): b+ha brang byu dang cig ga sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sa dbyer myed pa la mos pas yang dag par bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i snod du gyud cig/ sems can thams
36a5(1): cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ rgya che zhing mthul che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas/ rim po me'i snod rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa shin tu rgyan pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' 'a/ dpung byed pa'i
36a6(1): na byed pa la shes pa nas pa na gi yon can bams cad kyi snang dang 'byung gnas sa bya cig/ sems can bams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dad / sa pa sgrib pabyed pas mdas cad sa byed pa'i ye shes kyi sa par gdugs kyi ga ma tham
36a7(1): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khongs su chud par gyu ra cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par thams cad mkhyend pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhog pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i sA lad par byang chub sems pani
36a8(1): spyod pa'i snod du gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gyi chos bstand pa yang dag par 'dzind pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur da te/ yon tan mchog thams cad dang / dusu gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi stong/ 
36a9(1): su bya rang cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skong ba la gsol pa 'debs pa dang / chos yongs su 'dri ba la smra ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i skyes pa bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil khor 'jig rten
36a10(1): gyi khams nam la ba'i mthas tugs pa gang bar byed pa shod pa'i snod du gyu nad cig/ ces de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang / sems can khams thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang // smon las yongs su
36a11(1): mdzag na bya mam yun mas pa mi byed canasas rgod rgyas tsam ma sa dang / kyang sum thams ma gan man 'a ni ma rgya nan na sa kyad phyin 'i mam dmas bum ma byad kyis byed ma gyi kyiyang
36b1(1): rdzogs pa'i snod du gyu dad pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing rta sna tshogs dang / shing rta tu ma dang / rin po ches sna tshogs kyi shing rta tshad byed pa dag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig nas
36b2(1): gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bla ma dang / ston pa dang /  dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs bslong zhing len pa dang / phyogs gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag snga tshogs
36b3(1): dang / 'ongs pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dpag tu myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smra thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid ches pas skabs phye ste 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang sbyin pa'i sgra thos te 'odas
36b4(1): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smod lam dang sems kyis bos shing bstabs pa de dag la sbyin zhing gtong ba 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i shing rta la rgyad kyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa sbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta la dril bu'i dra ba rab tu 'khrol ba'i
36b5(1): rgyan rin po che'i srad bu'i lda ldi bkye ba sbyin pa 'am/ be dur+ya'i zhing rta la rin po dache bye khrag khrig rgya stong du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu smras pa/ sbyin pa 'am/ dngul gyi shing rta la shin tu dag pa'i gser rab bzang po'i
36b6(1): bas g.yogs shing / rta cang shes la bcas pa'i rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas brgyad cing klubs pa basbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi zhing rta la rin po che'i dre ba dang / rgyan thams cad phun gsum tshogs pas brgyan cing glang po ca
36b7(1): shes la bcas sbyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am tsan dan gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dam pa sna tshogs kyis spras te/ rin po me'i seng ge'i khris rgyan pa/ na chung brgya phrag stong zhon pa/ rgyan thams cad dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi
36b8(1): gdugs phun sum tshogs pa skyes bu cang shes brgya stong du mas drang ba/ sbyin pa 'am/ shel gyi shing rta la sa rin po du sas 'dog rnam pa 'byes pas shi nad tu mdzes par byas shing / na cung bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong grangs myed pas
36b9(1): yongs su gang ba / rim po che'i bla res yog par bres pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan snga tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa sbyin pa 'am/ a swa gar ba'i shing rta la rin po che sna tshogs sums shin tu mdzes par byas te spos sna tshogs dri
36b10(1): zhis pos btugs pa/ spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyi phyag pas rab tu byugs pa / me tog gi rgyas thams cad kyis chal bar bkang la bu mo brgya phrag gis rin po che'i srad bu bogs te bral pa byed par drang ba spyod pa 'am/ dri zhim tho
37a1(1): / pa'i byashes pa chen gyi tong ba'i mem byed pabyed par byar ci// sems can thams can pasas bamatham pa'i dge bsartsa ba yongs sa 'did pa'i phying dge ba'i 'ashes gnyen dang rod/ rtswang bur rgyu byin
37a2(1): kha sems can thams cad gtong ba dang / yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phan 'dog pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la/ bla ma'i rim 'gros ched brtsod par gyur dacig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ 
37a3(1): daca 'a bya bye pa smra ba'i phyi padage ba da nga 'an par bya ni// sems nams pa du ge pa'i bshes pa can dang 'drang ba'i bskyed papam pa dang da byed pa dge pa'i bshes byed mthong ba na garlob par ma
37a4(1): sems can bams cad bes pa labya dpa byed pa'i nyams pa byed pa dang 'dres byed cing rtog pabyed pa'i phyi dge ba'i bya bshes panyen pa 'gro 'a'i bsas pa cad du byur cig/ sems ca byams cad so byang 'dod parab cu rtswa
37a5(1): da kyan 'a gyur cig/ sem ba ca sa cad sangs rgyas kyis na bdun pa yang dag par mnyam pa'i phyim dge ba'i bshes gnyen byas cing / sems can mapa tho mas pa rtso ma
37a6(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung ba dang / stobs kyi mabar gtug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang las kyi rnam par smid pa yongs su dag pa dang 'brus zhing gcig par gyu dad cig tu sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin
37a7(1): rnams ca thams cad kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pas zhes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin tu byung bar gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad bzung ma'i phyir pha ro bang du phyinang pa'i las
37a8(1): gtugs par khong du chud pas rig pa'i pha rolang du phyind pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa'i theg las// thams cad ma khyed pa'i nyid la kyi mthur btugs te/ theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing yang dag par gnas
37a9(1): par gyur da cig sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyogs las phyir gyi ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzind par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmong ba la
37b1(1): skyed pas chos thams cad la rab tu zhol zhing ji lta bzhin du rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la 'byung ba'i mthar thug pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad
37b2(1): kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dpe' myed pa rab tu thob pas ma gyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba
37b3(1): rams cad mongs su sbyin par bya dang / theg pa chen pos 'dus pa la rab tu zhugs pas 'gro zhing thod pa phud gsum tshogs par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad le shes gling nyas 'gro ba'i mngar drug pas gti mug byed pas 'gro bar spyad cin
37b4(1): sems cad thams cad sgribs pa byed pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing chags pa myed pa'i shing rta bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba/ 
37b5(1): dang yongasas su gtong bas/ yang dag par bzla ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba' de dag / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur da pas bsnyen du kur la/ yongs su sgrub
37b6(1): ba'i rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ sa byang chub sems dang / sems dpa' chen po sbyong pa thams cad la shin tu bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa'i bsam pa can yon tan gyi rnam par
37b7(1): dag pa'i yid dang ldan ma'i mdun par yongs su gtong brisas pa can/ dge 'dun rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshogs rin po che la shin tu mos pa'i bsam pa can bstan pa rab tu gzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i// lhag pa'i bsam pa
37b8(1): shi tu can pa'i bsam pa can rim 'gro byed pa'i dang ldan pa/ mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin nin tu byas pa'i bstan pa'i yon tan chen po rjod pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yodan tan tshwa rnyed pas/ 'dogasas zhing rnyog skyed pa dag pa de/ de 'din
37b9(1): dgenas pa'i dge 'dun dgon mchogs shing rta 'dul ba'i che/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing ta yul bas yas ngag par gzung bas dge ba'i ma ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad sangs
37b10(1): rgyas kyi sargyanan pa la sang dag par gan sa pas yang dag par zin par lhad cig/ sems can thams cad 'bags pa'i skye ma ched las chos gzhan byed pa dashin du thub pas sems nang tu gzhol bar byad da cig pa/ sems can thams cad
38a1(1): sna tshogs kyi shing rta la ras dang / gos sna tshogs kyi bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yog par khebs pa/ spos zhim po yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa byi thun pa byed pa/ tshor na dga' ba shin tu 'phrul
38a2(1): ba ba ma rnams kyi lha'i bus drang ba rin po me'i 'khor lo rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ sbyin pa 'am/ rin che thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byed pa'i shing rta la 'dog rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i rin po
38a3(1): rtenas 'chub rkyen gyis rgyan pa dan ma chen chogs kyi za bas ga des bres pa rin po che ba phyogs kyi sred bamapa' yas pa kunanas brgyangs pa bu'ang / bu ma tsun pa thos sa chogs kyi byis pa tshan rgya
38a4(1): byed pa dadag pasag sa sangs rgyas bca las 'das rnams la shing 'dus pa'i ma dge ba'i rtsa sa de 'di ltar longs pa'i/ sems pan bsas pa sangs rgyas man chad byed pa 'phral bar dang cid / drin pa'i nanas myong ba
38a5(1): rgyas thams cad la yongs su gtong ngang mos par gyur cig sems can bya thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thard pa bsgribs pa myed pa rab tu thom cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi smod las dang bral te/ 
38a6(1): sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ma khyend pa'i ye shes la shin du mos shing / sangs rgyas la yon gsol bzad kyi shes par gyur da cig/ seMs can thams cad bun byed pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing / ye shes kyi
38a7(1): mchog la rab tu rten par gyudad cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phru/ la thams cad du 'gro 'thob ste gang tu dga' bar 'gro bar gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas la rab tu 'a'adu
38a8(1): ba khyab pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab tu rten par gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te/ bsod nams kyi zhing dam par gyu dad cig/ sems can thams cad dge
38a9(1): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing / sangs rgyas thams cad la myi dga' 'a myed pa'i sems su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad phu
38b1(1): bar byed par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi drung du phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas
38b2(1): nama' ba'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i lus la rab tu zhugs par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad gnas dpe' myed pa'i lus rab tu thob pas ngal zhing dub pa myed pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyud
38b3(1): cig/ sems can thams cad phyir myi ldog pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba dang ldan zhing lus kyi mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyunan cig/ sems can thams cad sems skad cigs cig gi bsas pa dang / khams khyab par byed pas sangs
38b4(1): rgyas kyi rnas par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par son pa'i snang ba dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin kyis rlabs dang / bya mchog gi mthus byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pang thob par gyun cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub
38b5(1): sems dpa' thams cad kyi baspyod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro bas rab tu brtson par gyud da cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba thob pas shin du myur tu 'gro
38b6(1): bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad tha myin bar 'jug pa la/ 'jig rten gi 'ams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'gro dza 'i pha rolang du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
38b7(1): byir gyi ldog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / tshul shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud pa'i pha ro long du phyind pa thob pas 'dod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos ma
38b8(1): cad kyi rjes su song zhing / chos ci lta ba bzhin du mthong bas 'dra 'a byed pa'i ye shes kyi tshul thob par gyu dang cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin shegs pa rnams mngon tu gyu rad pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs
38b9(1): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs myed par 'gyur ba'i mthar phyin yongs su stsol/ byang chub sems dpan
38b10(1): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta dbul ba'i che/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa'i drin myi gtong ba'i phyir dge
39a1(1): sangs rgyas kyims gcig nas gcig tu brgyun pas/ yang dag par bgyur bas 'phags par red par gyud da cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad 'jig rten thun gyi shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangasas
39a2(1): thal zang gyu cis/ sem pan masacar ma gying byas kyi kyis pa nga bzhin shes pa 'ong spangs chags bskyed pa'i gyis pa pang dranan pa par byud ci// sems sanams ca pas sa cad de shin ni
39a3(1): 'i/ ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis yang dag par 'byung bas cad shes kyis kun nas bsko ra par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas/ nyon mongs pa byed pa'i chos la dpyod par gyur da cing
39a4(1): sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo'o myed pa'i sas bla na myed pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog rab rjod par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa myed par 'gyur ba'i ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos can du
39a5(1): 'byu rang te ka 'phagag pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur dacig/ sems cad/ thams cad khams thams cad kyis gos pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan / zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur da cig/ sems can
39a6(1): tham sa cad ye shes kyi chos kyi 'khor lo stod pa la mkhas pas legs pa kyi tshe bcas pa'i ye shes kyi gan mun pa dang ldan par gyu dad cig/ sem sa can thams cad 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyud brjod du byed par shis
39a7(1): 'gro ba'i gros la mkhas pas sems kyi skad cig gi rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyu rad cig// sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhid nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi shing rta
39a8(1): sgrub par gyur da cig/ sems cad thams cas rba nam mkha'i dbyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par khyab par byed 'bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
39a9(1): du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang tu dga' khar 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang ldan pas lus yang ba'i myur rjes su rtogs pa rab tu rtog par
39a10(1): gyur da cig/ sems can rnams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khon mtha' mas pa la mkhas par myur cig/ sems can rams cad 'jig rten gyi khams tha mus rgyung du rgyas 'tsha
39b1(1): le zhes rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la myi gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par mya rang cig/ sems can thams cad dus la ji ltar 'bab par sems cadan yongs su sbrid par byed cing 'dul ba gyi gtong ba'i myo
39b2(1): sa kyis myi rtsu pa'i zla 'brul d+hA tshis gis su phyung bsang dag par byed pa spyad cig/ sems can thams cad sa cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa phyid nga bsgribs pa'i byed pa'i su
39b3(1): bang 'i de sbyini dang de ltar sems ca thams pa pa byed pa'i 'i nyes Ti la gnas par rnam par dag ga pa byur 'dang / rnam kyi zang ma dang / ma kyi dbyings na 'i
39b4(1): sa kyi ra phyi cu blod par 'byung pa bying mo pa la'o/ gzhanas kyangam rgyab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mad bzigs kyi 'dushes te 'ang gnan thamasas
39b5(1): 'gro can zhes dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid che na yon tan rgya mchogapa sem mtsho'i tshul la mangs pa yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la rnam par sems pas rdzu
39b6(1): chen cing skyes pa sal pa byes zas thig pa tu bang du sangs su ba rloms pa'i snyems dang ldan d+ha/ blang chub sems papashi khyod du nus banon du byed pa masas dang spyodan pa par snang b.rab tu zhugs pa/ 
39b7(1): ngas pa zams pad las sems rab tho ba ba drang du ma'i sded nga/ bdun kyi sde bsu kyi phyogs pa'i skabs rab tu 'jom pa'i sems dang ldana'o// gzhal du byed pa'i chos la mchis par snang bar byu nga pa deca rlom
39b8(1): dang sangs rgyam pani kyang bug pa'i me gong te mongs sun tong bas yang das par 'azung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nas 'di ltar yongs su thong ste/ bems pa na thams cad bu byed pa'i tshun ma mongs su bu
40a1(1): kha can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyis yang dag par sdu ba la brtson pas/ sbyin pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs myed pa'i 'bras bu rab
40a2(1): tu gtong bas ye shes kyi mu stegs las byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil khor mchog gis rnam par dag pa bsgrings pa myed par rtogs par khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
40a3(1): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed pa myed par khong du chud pas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos la rnam par spyod par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing sbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas
40a4(1): bsod nams tshad myed pa shin tu bsags par gyurd cig/ semasacan thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su byas te phan 'dogs kyi garnam par dag pas chos 'phrul mtha' yas pas rnam par rol
40a5(1): pa yang dag par ston par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su stobs pas sbyid pa'i gnasayon tan zad kyi zhes par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad brtson
40a6(1): rnams kyi phung po kyi zang pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug par gyu ra te/ sbyid pa'i gnas don yod pa'i 'bras bu dang bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig dang / ye shes
40a7(1): 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod ba'i ye shes kyis rnamakhar rig pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos/ dzumagyu cang mnyan pa la mos shing brtson par gyur pa/ 
40a8(1): cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las thos pa/ rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind pa thos myur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
40a9(1): zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba las rnam par 'das ste bstan pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog rnam par spel ba byed cing 'phags pa mthong ba
40b1(1): ra du thos par gyuran cig/ sems rnams cad 'bazlas pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i 'de ba dang ldan nyizhing le shes kyis spyon pa'i gang nag la mos par gyud da cig/ sems can thams can sangs rgyas kyi
40b2(1): lta ba rjes su ba'o las byung bas thos rnon yod par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad bstan pa rab tu bzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung pa la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa la ye shes kyi mkhas pa/ 
40b3(1): rab tu thob par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstanyan pa gsapa bar bya ba'i sA Ta/ thob pas chos thams cad zos pa shin tu 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyurd cig/ sems
40b4(1): can thams cad sbyin pa'i mdzod kyis dga' bar baspyad cing gtod pa shin tu byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin tu byas pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan dra pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa/ phun sus tshogs
40b5(1): par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing rta dbul ba'i che/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis/ ye shes
40b6(1): dang mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu thob cing ci nas kyang myi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa'i rab tu thob par/ 
40b7(1): bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yid byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang / len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang / gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang slong phyongs
40b8(1): pa dang / bkren pa mang po tshad myed pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smom lam dang / sems skyed pas mos shing bstabs pa khams cad gtod pas shin du re ba'i
40b9(1): yid cad de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas/ slob pa la rim 'gro bas kyi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongangs pa rnams la bzod par gsol ba'i sems bskyed de 'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu lhod
40b10(1): kyi drung du song ste ris 'gro bya ba zhig na da 'di ltar khyed 'dir phyind to// zhes kyi bos khyed 'azod pa gsol bas spong ba thams cad bzod par byas / rim gror byas rdzo pa 'a bstis nas/  ci 'dzirje
41a1(1): bsnyen pa de dag gis shin tu rim gro byed de/ 'di ltar nor du gau ti 'dam bu'i gling gir chung b.rangs so rin po ches yongs su gang ba dang / 'di ga ste gser gi ga tu yul gyi ma sung
41a2(1): rin po me shin tu rnam par dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste be dUr+ya'i shing rta chung ma'i 'khor glu dang / rol mo rdung zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi shing rta shig tu mdze
41a3(1): ba bud byed gzhi du l+la'i bu mo lta bus yongs su gang ba dang / 'di ste rin po che bye khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed pa'i rgyan pa'i shing rta bud myed cang bshes rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas
41a4(1): yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste tsan dan gi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' zhon par 'os pa dang / 'di lta ste shel gyi shing rta bud myed bzang mo bzhi zang pa cha byad sdug gu shin tu brgyan pa// gzugs ma dzes pa
41a5(1): bsta na sdug bcing myi thun pa myed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta/ ste/ sa sA gar ba'i shing rta nga'ang daskur pas yongs su gang ba dang // 'di lta ste spos dam pa'i shing rta dang / bu mos yongs su
41a6(1): bkang drang / 'di lta de rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i rdo ta nang gi bshes gnye dbyer myi byed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / de rnam par 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs myed pa rnas pa sna tshogs
41a7(1): slongs mo pa thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong bas slong bar 'dod par bya ba'i dngos po rab tu thob pas yid la bsam pa shin tu rdzogs nas/ slong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis
41a8(1): yang dag par bzung ste/ shin tu tshim par byas shing bam pa rdzogs par byas nas/ dga' ba dang / mgul pa dang // rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par byas ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo
41a9(1): sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyis kyi khyab cing/ thogs pa'i shing rta'i 'khod lo phyir/ phyi ldog pas 'gro ba dang ldan te/ reg pa chen po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams
41a10(1): cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing / phyi ma'i mtha'i maskal pa'i mur thug par phyir myi ldog pas chos kyi shing rta cang shes la zhon par gyur da cig/ sems cad thams cad chos thams cad la
41b1(1): da/  chum mas dpa'i gyun pa'i rnas par dag pa'i lan shAm+b+ha s+t+wa~M/ sems pamam salan gdas pa nga
41b2(1): thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la bslabs par spyord da cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi shi tas 'byung ba'i 'a rol tu phyi dang pa lob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi shing tas 'od pas
41b3(1): gyur dacin/ sems can thams cad phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang / bde ba yang dag par stod pas bsod nams thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba cad byed pa dang / chos bsas kyis kyi khyab pa
41b4(1): 'i shing rta la 'khas par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad 'jungs pa'i dri ma rab tu sbyangs te// sbyin pa gtor bas byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thos cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang
41b5(1): dazung byed pa galus pas tshul khrims rnams par dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i shing rta dang ldan par bya rang cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrugs
42a1(1): pa skyed par gnas pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi khasam pa 'khrugs pa skyed cing / bzod pa pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur pa cig/ sems can tham sa sna
42a2(1): 'byung ba'i gling brgyas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar dpyod pa'i go chos bgos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi sa ro sa du phyinang pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad shid du du mgyogs pa ni
42a3(1): shin brtas snying po byang chub tu 'byung sa ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rtsa dang ldan par myurang cig/ sems rnams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing tam shin tu gzhon zhing sangs rgyas
42a4(1): kyi yul 'phrul pas rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur na cig/ sems can thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jigs pa myed pas thams cad mabyed pa
42a5(1): banyid kyidon du sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rgyam po'i shing bya zhon par gyur dad cig / sems can thams cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang dang bzhin kyi phyogs thams cad la tu 'jug pa rmongs pa byed pa'i phyir smod lan
42a6(1): sa kyi gnas pa'i leshes kyi shing tu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen po mnon pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'i ga cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par snanang pa'i byin/ sangs rgya
42a7(1): thams cad kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par bya rad cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon las skyo ba skyed par yongs su rdzogs sra bar bye ba'i yongs su brdzogs par byed pa'i phyir thams cad
42a8(1): mkhyedad pa'i rin po che'i shing rta la zhon par gyurd cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas dang // len pa dang / slong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / 
42a9(1): mos pa dang / spro ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pas sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/ de dag pa sems cad thams cad/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i theg pa la zhen pa shin du bsgrubs pas / ye shes dang / sems kyi
42a10(1): rnam pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ dus bu gnyis pa bas po lnga pa// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
