42b1(1): sems dpa' chen po glang po cad ges yan lag badra shin tu gnas pa/ lo drug bcu lon pa/ mame ba drug dang ldan pa/ 'dog padang lta bu/ gdong na par dag pa dkar ning dri ba byed pa/ gcer gyi rgyal mchad cad gser gyi
42b2(1): rgyad dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas lus kun nas yog pa/ sA rin blo sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan du bcug pa/ gser ltar blta da N+Da rjes pa/ dpa/ ga tshad stong gis khyodan du dal ba skyed par 'gro basbyin cing gtong ba 'am
42b3(1): ta barbang shes gos pa zo mdog bde bar 'dor zhing 'deg pa dang / bya ltar mgyogs pa dang ldan pa/ chogs lung lor khril ba// nam cong dang / smyig par ldan pa/ rtsig pa li dbyibs mtho' zhing spyod byed pa// gser gyi dril bu'i
42b4(1): dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba dang ldan pa/ blo kun nas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spyod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ zhon na bde ba/ lus la byams pa/ shin tu bgyogs pa/ 
42b5(1): phyogs bzhid yid ltung baphyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan 'ang / lA rdzas lta bu'i lAb lbub thams cad dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i bla ma'i skye bo dang / zla mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes nyen dang / pa dang / pa dang / 
42b6(1): phongs pa dang / bkren pa spong ba dang / len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang sems yangs pas sbyin pa dang / sems la chags pa byed pas gtod pa dang / rjes sus byed pa la byed pas
42b7(1): yid mgu bar byed pa dang / snying rje ched pos yongs su brgyas pa'i 'amal pas gtor ba chen pos rab tu gtor zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu rtsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
42b8(1): su mdong par skyes pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyor ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i brtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyan gyis 'byung ste/ cad shes kyi theg
42b9(1): pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung ste theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon par zhon par gyurd cig/ sems can thams can
42b10(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgribs pa byed pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya la rab tu thob pa la pa/ ro lang du phyi nad pa'i theg pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung ba na
43a1(1): ka / gyu cig / sems can thams cad ldan pa skyed pa'i ye shes rin po ches sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin du 'byung ba'i chos can du 'gyur te/ theg pa nin pa tshe yongs su rdzogs par gyur dacin
43a2(1): sems can thasas cad byang chub sems dpa ti de 'din thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang sbed du gyur te// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan nam pam pa sogs pa'i ris pas ning du'i rgyud cig/ sems can/ 
43a3(1): thams cad mtha' yas pa'i rig pa la spyan pa sa mngon par brtson pa'i yeshes kyi chos can du gyur te/ bskal pa grangs byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rjes spa bsas pa/ rnam su sems shing / rnam par spyod pa
43a4(1): gyur na cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pas/ longs dpyod kyi mchog thams cad dang / cad shes kyi theg pa chen po'i sbyin par byed par gyur da cig
43a5(1): sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyis/ thor gtugs par mngon 'ang gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ theg pazhin tu mthol bar gnas shing rab tu brtan pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ 
43a6(1): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes dang rta cang shes bye khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed pa'i sbyin pa byed pa 'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad/ chags
43a7(1): 'byed pa'i theg pa la mngon par bskyod kyi mnon pa yongs su grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa myed pas 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches
43a8(1): ma ma sa snang ba'i rgyal por gyud dang / chos kyi pa byed pa'i na tu myed pa byed cing rgya nags pa'i mi sri pazad pa me rgya na pa pan me de'i khri gnas pa ra gyi gyu ra / nga rin po che'i rnam tu 'dus
43a9(1): 4/ gan regan bde ba grangs byed pa du ma gting ba/ rkyen 'khor spos kyi dam pa/ thams cad kyi dri zhim par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ rin po che bye khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i brgyan gyis brgyad
43a10(1): 5gser gi dra ba'i bla re bres sa gser gi dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs 'byung ba// rin po che'i 'bru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/ rnam par bye bas shin tu 'phags
43b1(1): shing brtan pa dzes pang/ srog chags bye ba drug khrig brgya stong grangs byed pas kun nas bsdus pa/ gdugs ka pa gcig gis sa chen po thams cad spyong bar dbang bsrung ba/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i phra cu
43b2(1): bde la 'jug cing ga 'khor lo thogs pa byed pas bsrud pa dang / 'chis bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad nyams pa byed par nyan pa / dpal rnam par snang ba dang / min dra ni la dang / nor bu chen po che'i snying pos sras pa nyi ma dang
43b3(1): rnab dang / nas melas rurab tu gyum brgya rnam pa chogs can du 'byung bas brtson pa/ na pa'i byad pa zla'apags pa brgya mam smras pa/ rgya mo / rgyas pa dadang / gas yu
43b4(1): tshogs yongs su pa gang ba dang / dga' ba 'byis pa'i rkyen su tshogs kyis mas par rgyud pa/ 'anam bu'i to/ ru klung gi gser gyi byim pag drim phyed cing chul dang bral bas bkab pa de la 'jas bu'i zing thams ca
43b5(1): bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskur pas mngon par dbang sprad pa'i bsod nan shes kyi stobs dang ldan/ byams pas dbang dbang bskur ba/ pha rol kyi 'khob bcom pa dang ldan pa/ bka' la zlog pa myed pa 'dug tu dwags sa
43b6(1): de ltabru'i bstan gyi rnam pa tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag gi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed pa la khri stan bzang po'i rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyid pa byed cing yongs su
43b7(1): gtong ba dang / yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyid pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa la gsol ba dan/ skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ chos smra ba 'am/ chos la dpa'
43b8(1): ba'i phyir yongs su g.yog pa'i sems kyis sam/ pa dang nim dang bla ma'i skye bong pa/ rang rgyal ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas sam/ byang chub so sad pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/ de bzhin
43b9(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten mchod pa'i phyir ram/ bod pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dpag tu myed pa dag gam/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yang rung ste/ sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i
43b10(1): che/ dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan
44a1(1): bar gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang / dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i phyin chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ri rnam pa thams cad du thub pa myed pa'i lus dang ldan/ 
44a2(1): kha zhing/ 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i san rab tu thob par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta bar khros shing sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i gdan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams
44a3(1): cad/ 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis spyong pa'i phyir/ san gyi rgyan dang / 'khor lo rnam par dag pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa rab tu thob par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs
44a4(1): chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil kyis myi non pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad/ bskal pa grangs myed par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug pa myed pa
44a5(1): dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten gi khams brjod du myed pa'i yang// brjod du myed pa bstan gis rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / ldan par gyu rang cig/ sems can thams rnyed chos kyi dbyings thams
44a6(1): cad lus kyis rgyas par byed pa'i phyir/ gter chen po 'tshogs kyi stan la gnas par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad ji ltar bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad A kyi sbyin pas ril mo byed
44a7(1): pa'i phyin/ rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan rab tu thob pam gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gyi/ 
44a8(1): mthu' byung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i stan la rab tu gnas par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams
44a9(1): cad dang / rna mchog gi margya' byung ba yang dag par ngon pa'i phyis rin po chethams cad kyi bstan dang/ spos thams cad kyi san dang / me tog thams cad kyi stan dang / gos thams cad kyi rlung / phreng ba thams cad kyi stas dang / 
44a10(1): nod bu rin po chernams cad kyi stam dang / beru bya sna tshogs thams gyis kyi khyab pa'i stan dang / 'jig rten gyi lams rnams cad brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i ltar chad byed pa'i cad dang/ 'gro ba thams cad sa lus par rgya
44b1(1): dkyis rnam par dag pa'i gan dang / rA re rje'i gdan thams cad la 'khod pas spyad cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bstan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par bsrung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pas mi
44b2(1): byang chub byin na rab tu thob cid sangs rgyas rgya byas thams cad rnam par 'chab rgya ba'i phyi yongs su mAn// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed cing dbang phyug kyi lus la dga' ba'i gdugs ring po chem/ 
44b3(1): rgyan zad mamashin tu brgyan pa / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kyad par du 'phags shing / rabang men gyi ma byad du bya ba'i rin po che'i rtsa bca pa/ dril bu'i dra bas kun nas bsod pa// rin pob che'i srad bus gser gi dril bus sbyangs pa'i
44b4(1): sgra 'byung ba ma rin po che'i bye du r+ya'i phreng rab tu sbyangs pa/ nye 'khor nas rnga'i sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba gse dri'i brnam par dag pas g.yogs shing brgyan pa / rin po che'i dra ba brgya phrag stong gi bla re bres pa nor bu rin po che'i
44b5(1): 'bru grangs byed smras pa/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums sna tshogs su bres shing brgyan pa/ a ga du dang / tsan dan dang / spos kyi dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nyen dgor rdzi
44b6(1): zhim par bsngos zhing gtugs pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gyi gser ltar 'od gsal zhing dag pa/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya slong mtha' yas bas brgyan pa/ de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig
44b7(1): brgya stong grangs myed pa dag kha nam tho ba skyed pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byed cing sems can gi gtso ma mngon du 'gyur pa'as/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa'i phyir ram / chos
44b8(1): brtsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bags gnyen dang // byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba btsun par bya ba dag g.yepa dang / ba 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ sangs rgyas thams can
44b9(1): ldan padang/ drin nanam kyi gang thag tshogs pas/ slong ba nas/ tham dang/ rgyang chub kyizhin pa ya dag par sman pa la/ de 'azhugs padag 'brangs pa dang / kren pathong pa dang / 
44b10(1): dag la dbul pa 'am yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su stsol ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi g.yog pa rab tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag pa
45a1(1): sa / yog par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'das te/ yom tan dang ye shes kyis mngon par bkab par gyur dacig/ sems cad thams cad 'dzin
45a2(1): kha rten gyi rdul dang / su' ba dang gang yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ lus shin tu bkab par gyur dacig pa/ sems can thams cad/ khrogro ba thams cad kyis bstan sdug cing / sangs rgyas khams cad lamada' pa'i ye shes
45a3(1): kyi snying po can du gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la log pa myed par 'jug paras brtson pas ma khrugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu bkab par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyis lus kyis// sangs
45a4(1): rgyas kyi sku'i mthar gtugs te/ mngon par bkab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyu rang cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob pas gdugs su red bar gyur cig/ sems can thos cad
45a5(1): khams gsum lams cad las shin tu 'phags shing chags pa skyed pa'i she ye shes kyi snying po dang / ldan pas ye shes kyi rnam par sdang par / gyur dacig sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa
45a6(1): bzod nams thams cad kyis mchong ba'i phyir gcugs su 'os par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ldan myed pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs na sa par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi das pa bgyud da cig ces de ltar Tha
45a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis chos la dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par bzung bar thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sgol
45a8(1): bdugs gcig gis mkha' thams cad kyis dbyings kyis klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyis mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog mthu' phyung ba yang dag par bstand pa las phyir
45a9(1): myi ldog par yongs su sngo'o/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs cig gis rgyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan yid du 'ong pas de bzhim
45a10(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi skug mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su spol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gdugs kyi rgyan gyis kun tu g.yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs sngor sangs rgyas kyi ra
45b1(1): mtshan la mos pas sems can thams cad dang // 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad gdugs thams cad kyis dga' ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs sna tshogs brjod du myed pa'i yang rjod du myed pa/ 
45b2(1): sangs rgyas gcig la phul pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la brjod du m+bu'i gdugs phul bar sems shing khongasu sngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi du byang chub mngon par byang chub pas 'phags pa'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas bamag pa
45b3(1): dga' ba'i phyir yongs su n+da ma/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na bzhugs pa thams cad la gdugs kyis dgapa pa'i phyir yongs su
45b4(1): tsArdzaT/ nod bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad phreng ba brgyas shing klubs pa dang / spos thams cad kyis chog gi dri zhim po dang 'byung ba'i gzugs dang // rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par
45b5(1): blas pa'i gdugs dang/ rgyan pa des pa rnam par dag pa'i gdugs das/ brgyan can byed pa yadas shing rgyache ba dang gang gser mi drubs sa gnas sog pa margyan pa'i nil bu'i na bkun das smras pa'i rna
45b6(1): chu 'od pa zhing snyan pa 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / leshes sgrib paTIng chags ba skyed pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon padu'i dgab pa'i gdugs yongs su btang ba'i phyir mongs phu 'o re ste/ 
45b7(1): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgya
45b8(1): thams cad kyi yon tan gyis kun nas g.yogs shing rab tu brgyad pa'i phyir yongs su mA Sha sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab yon tan dang dgongs pa dam pa rnam par pang bzhi phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems rin po che mtha' yas pa la/ 
45b9(1): dbang brgyad pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i yongs su spo'o/ chos thams cad la ye shes kyi dbang brgyur pa kun tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par g.yog khar yongs su sngo ba'i don tu yongs
45b10(1): su sngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcus bla rer bres pa'i gdugs su 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad
46a1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis gsog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su ldan / chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu rab bsgyur ba'i dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs pan/ mthu' chen po dang / dbang chen po'i sems kyi rgyud
46a2(1): gadzub yang bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ blo sangs pa dang // sems rgya me ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ yon tan chad byed pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' pa'i phyir yongs su sde'o// yon tan thams cad kyis sos
46a3(1): mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// seMs can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// ye shes chen pos mnyam par dga' ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ sems
46a4(1): can thams cad kyis bsngo ba'i tshul ma lus par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems dang bsam brnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su sngol byasas pa dge ba dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya
46a5(1): ba'i phyir yongs su stsola'agro ba thams cad yongs su spro ba chen pos mngon par drug pa cing yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su so'o/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched po rgyal mchu
46a6(1): dang / ba da ring po che ba tshogs rnas pa tha dad pa'i chu ba can ring mo che'i dril bu'i dra ba la khrol pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba byung ba sAm bu rin po menas pa sna tshogs sbyangs pa// kha dog dang mchos ma sna tshogs kyi snga
46a7(1): bus brgyan cing bsgreng ba/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas daskyangs shi klubs pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i 'byung ba dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas shin tu g.yogs shing brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong
46a8(1): kha dog tha dad pa mom tha dad pa shin tu tho ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcug padz+ra/ 'od zer rnam
46a9(1): bcwa chogs blang ba rgyal ma cas kyi rgyan gyis sathams cad kun tu yog pa/ rgyam bcan kyi rgyan nam 'du ma 'od dang ldan pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed pa'i rgyun de lta bu dag 'jig rten gyi 'ams/ 
46a10(1): thams cad kyims kyi rnam par smi pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dam ma pa'i dbying sa thams cad
46b1(1): 'byam zas pa la gnas pa/ yangs pa kus tu rgyab mtshan gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bar mos pas/ 'di ga nyen gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang / thos pa'i khyad
46b2(1): par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyu rad pa rnams la dbul bags/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan rten nam/ chos dkon mchog mchod pa la/ 
46b3(1): dge 'dun dkon mchog ya phul pa 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen byung chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jom gyi tshogs su gyu dad pa 'am/ gsu nag gi rnam pa gnan
46b4(1): du'ang cung ste/ spong ba thams cad la rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dam sbyin pas yang dag 'am bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa
46b5(1): pa 'dis sems can thos cad/ ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gdam la thub pa myed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams thams cad yang dag pir sbreng ba'i rgyal mtshas can du gyu ra cig/ sems cad thams cad
46b6(1): bar 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur date/  rin po che'i zhi la sangs rgyas kyi chos bris pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems cadan thams cad 'gro ba kun la mar me snang bar gyur te/ rgyal mchas shin tu 'phags par gyud da cig
46b7(1): sems can thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir ka' thub pa myed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan can du gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis kyi srus ba pa'i chos can du gyur na te/ ye shes dang
46b8(1): stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng bar gyu dad cig/ sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi ltung ba'i sdang ba can du 'gyur te/ ye shes mthul po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi
46b9(1): dkyil khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/ ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil khor 'od zer rab tu 'byed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyu da cig// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la martson zhing
47a1(1): byed pa'i mi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su ma'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi myod ba kyi
47a2(1): rnam par 'phrul bdas/ 'byung ba'i rgyas drung ldanan mamapa dag pa sa rnam pa sa dag pa thob pas bya ma gyi 'ongs sa son// 'di ga yang byang chubasasas dpa ma sa dpa dzin pa ni thamam
47a3(1): mam pa dang / semam can mas ca nod kyis byug par byed pa dang / bco'i don dmas padu byed pa dang / rgan ma che'i rter thamasacad gtong ba dang / nang bache'i 'byung gnas thams cad mngasas
47a4(1): tong ba dang / nod bu rid pa ma'i mas cad kyi sbyin pabyed pa dang / rin polabs kyis thos pan thams padus khyab par byed pa dang drin mama'i tshogs sas pabang tho pa 'am/ na pa sems da
47a5(1): yongs su gtong bar sems bskyed pa'i che/ srogs chags bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong grangs myed pa la/ rin po me sbyin pas yongs su brngub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su thA ste/ sems cad thams cad dran pa'i rgyud
47a6(1): rmongs pa skyed cing sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pas/ chos dkon gachog gi spang gdang tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang / yongs su
47a7(1): gtong bzhin du brten pas// dge 'dun dkon mcheg yongs su 'dzin par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub /  rgyan gyi pos rnam par dag ras// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ring po che
47a8(1): rab tu thob par gyu dang cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la songs pa myed pa la zhel pas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rim po che tshad myed
47b1(1): da par na par bya 'i gyibyang chub mem mam mam nan po'i mangs ched badran ga sum gas pa gyun ci// thede sanamams cad gasnongs bcu'i pa na tshan pa mamangon par ma yi rgyas / 
47b2(1): bas/ yon tan ring po chemam 'ayas pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che na tu yangs pa'i mang thug pas/ e shes rin po che bcu drug gi stongs par 'jug pa ra rab tu
47b3(1): thob par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che la rnam par sangs rgyas pas rin po che'i dam pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa
47b4(1): phyi zad pa'i mdod kyi chos rin po che bar tu bston pa la brtson pa zhis po che'i dbang po das par gyud da cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po med ga yongs su gtong zhing bsgyir 'byed pa'i tshe/ sems ca
47b5(1): thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi spyad rin po che rnam par dag cing nyams pa myed do/ na pas ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngor 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
47b6(1): bo lus dang yan lag dang / nyin lag thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pag ra lus blta na sdug pa/ rnam par dag cing myi mthun pa myed pa'i rgyan gyis lus shin tu brgyan pa rin thams cad kyis rab
47b7(1): tu rgyan pa// rin po me'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya bstor gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rkyen gyis brgyan par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis 'jig
47b8(1): rten gyi bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde sa thams cad stobs pa/ dga' ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ de rgyan sna tshogs rnas pa tha dad pa dag/ sems can thams cad yongs su spyod par bya ba dang / 
47b9(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir sbyin zhing yong su gtong ba'i tshe rgyan yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgya rnas
47b10(1): ba bdag pas lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du red par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi 'chas rnam pa dang ldan na zhing mchan gyis lus shin tu brgyad par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cadas
48a1(1): bsod nams rgyu ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lus can du ded de lus mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur dacig/ sems can thams cad lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa dang ldan ning sum sa chad byis
48a2(1): shi tu rnam par bris pa sun gsum tshogs par spyad da ci// sems can thams 'dam mo yang dag rlig pa kyi zad pa'i mthod dang ldan zhing cig gi rgyan gyi rtsa ba shin du brgyan par byud da cig/ sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi
48a3(1): yan lag yid du 'ong zhing rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rmyil rnam par dag par 'gro ba kun ma gul bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi
48a4(1): chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong bar brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun lta bas snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi rgyan kyis brgyan par gyur dacig/ sems can thams cad
48a5(1): chos snang ba thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu thob cing gzugs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyu dad cig/ sems can/ thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis rgyud shin tu brgyan pas/ 
48a6(1): thems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par mu rad cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rgyan de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis/ sangs
48a7(1): rgyas kyi chos tshad byed pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang yon shes kyi yongs su rdzogs te// sems can thams cad kyi ris na nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa myed par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar ya
48a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po dbang phyug la sI na nas dbang bskur pas mngon papa dbang bskur rtsod mad dang / gtsug gi rin po che'i sbyid pa byed cing yongs su gto pa dang / mngon par stobs pa dang / 
48a9(1): sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang / ltos pa myed par yongs su gtong ba'i sems rnam par 'brel byed pa dang / sbyin pas bsgos pa'i rgyud yongs su sgom pa dang / sbyin pa la dbang bsgyur bar/ 
48b1(1): rabab tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i gtong ba'i dbang po yongs su skyed pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i blo rgya cher byed pa'i che/ cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che yongs su
48b2(1): btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ 
48b3(1): dbang thams cad la shin tu dbang bskur bar gyu da cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas bkyi po gtsug tor can gyi mgo dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad 'dra
48b4(1): ba kun gyi yod tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar phyind pas// ye shes rin po che mchog gis sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing / ye shes
48b5(1): ri po che'i mchog pa yang dag par gnas par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi ste phra la dbang sbyar pa rab tu tho ba ste/ ye shes kyi cod dpan shin tu bcings par gyudad cig/ sems can thams cad/ 
48b6(1): 'jig rkyen sbyi byis bas bar gyi nus pa'i chos can tu 'gyur te/  te ye shes bya'i zhon bu rin gri rgyam mtho rab tu rgyan par gyud cin sems can thabs cad skye bar byu dad pa'i seshes kyis
48b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i chos can du gyur te/ spyi bo shin tu gtsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yo shos rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing / 
48b8(1): stobs bcu'i spyod pan gyis mgo' rab tu brgyad par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang 'o nas/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'dom pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur dacig/ sems
48b9(1): can thams cad stobs bcu'i mthar thug ste/ chos kyi ye shes bya spyi bo rnam par dag par gyu rid cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyend pa'i tha dbu' zild kyis myi non pa'i sdang ba rjecu thob ste/ rgyal po'i mchog
48b10(1): dam par tu gyis des kyang dru ba zhems rtses pa da chen po pan dang / gcas denirna ma ma 'ongs pa ga ba'i mi/ dge ba'i ma ba de 'dag sems pa dam da bya sa nam macan gyi 'byung gan rnam pa
49a1(1): ma pa'i sems can ldag sa/ b+han nas kyi/ rgyam gyis brjos pa/ gang sdug dpa/ lcags sdeg dang / srung gi bcing bas bcings pa/ sras byags tag gis brtags s+ho/ ma bzhin du rgya sa na
49a2(1): byi bde bas lus shin tu mnad pa/ sbubs myed par spang pa/ bkres pa dang / sgom pas nyen pa/ gos byed pas mun pas g.yog cing khebs pa// shin tu ne la/ bcwa su pa sgrog gis bsgrogs pa de lta bu dag mthong ra bya
49a3(1): chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / rgyal po myig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du/ bdag dang 'khor du bcas/ nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang sbyin nas/ brtson ra de nas sems can de dag yongs su
49a4(1): bdad par byed do// res bcon de nas sems can de dag tha dad par byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad mngon par byin nas sman dang / spras pa pa dang / sngags kyi rnam pas lus nad byed par byas te/ 
49a5(1): bde ba dang / yid dga' ba la rab tu bkod nas/ chos rin po che chos par byas te/ dga' ba'i gtam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod/ nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las byinyams par byed do// 
49a6(1): de de ltar brtson ranas bkye bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa 'dis sems can thams ca sred pa'i bcings pa dang / zhags pa las shin tu grol bar gyur
49a7(1): cig/ sems can thams cad le she sa sanong pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind cing 'khor ba'i rgyud shin tu chad par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad pag la nyal shin tu bcom ste// kun nas 'khor ba dang // rnam pang bral bas
49a8(1): mdzag pa'i mun pa dang / ra rib dang / yid tog rnas pa mas ci ra ri byed pa'i ye shes ya dag pam mthapa'ar gyur ci// semam can thams cad 'gros bur gdod par chu ba shes kyi mthar
49a9(1): thug par gyun te/ khams gsum pa'i bcings pa'i thams cad dang brgyan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa ste sum+ba ye shes pasgribs byed pa ma no khwa'i pha ro lad tu phyin pa thob cing
49b1(1): nyan ma ma pa'i danangs pa thams cad shin tu shigs par gyud cig/ sems can thams cad rlom mos kyi gso ba rnas par smra ba thams cad yang dag par zhom pa'i phyir/ g.yol ba skyed pa'i ye shes la yangangs
49b2(1): par gzhol zhing / g.yol ba dang / rlom sems kyis bcings thams cad bral bar gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad du chags pa myed par gnas shing / 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad
49b3(1): dang bral te/ 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad rnam par spangs par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu grol bar gyu dad cig/ sems can
49b4(1): thams cad chos kyis dkris pa/ nam mtha'i mthas gtugs pa dag sems chags myed pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa myed par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad/ 'jig rten khams thams cad du/ 'gro ba thams cad
49b5(1): yongs su smid par bya ba dang / gtul ba dang / theg pa chen po la dod da pa'i phyir rnam par rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod par gyur da cig ceg
49b6(1): de 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can thams cad brtson ra dang / brtson canas bkye bas/ yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu dgrol
49b7(1): zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa la gnas par gyu dad pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang sems can la la zhig srog dang bral ba'i phyir/ gsad du khrid pa'i bsdug sngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan
49b8(1): gyis myi zad cing 'dar pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa/ skye bo brgya phrag skyong gis kus nas bskodad cing / 'dzam bu'i gling gtogs pa sna tshogs bkal zhing bkri ba/ dz+ra gnyen bshes kyi rgyud dang / 'dra ba'i rgyud bas
49b9(1): cad bral bar gyur da pa/ ral gyis gcab cing gsheg gis gsal zhing bsgreng pa la/ lus thams cad kun nas dkrugs te mye 'bar ba'i napo du dod pa 'am/ sdug sngal gyi rnam pa myi bde ba thams cad kyis kyi bde bam
49b10(1): bya ba/ gtse ba sna tshogs thams cad du bsgred pa zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong bar gyur na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gsad par lus yongs su gtong ste
50a1(1): de skar byang chub sems dpa' phyem mar pas chen po gyi 'pham pa'ing zla khyad par du 'gro bas ri ltar byas pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po gzhan rnams kya na
50a2(1): sems can gsang pang bru ba'i don du lus gtong zhing / sdug sngal gyi tshor pa thams cad nyams su len pa de bzhin du rab tu gtong ba byed bcing 'di skad du smra'o// khyed kyis/ kyi bde ba 'di dag bdagal gyis shig/ lus 'di dag
50a3(1): yongs su btang kyis nga'i srog gcad par gyis shi gang la ni ci byas smras so cog kyang myi mnyan pa gyis/ khyed kyis kyi 'di la ci bya bar 'dod pa de las grangs myed pa'i bar du sdug sngal gyi/ rnam pas gcer thams cad kyis kyi
50a4(1): bde ba sna tshogs su byis shi gces te/ 'di bla dag gis gsad par ba mthong yang / bdeg lus dang / srog gis kyi bru ba'i zhi tshul bdag la tshul dang myi 'dra'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la myi gas te/ mo rdzam
50a5(1): srung ba'i ning thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed do snyam nas/ bdag gi lus dang srog tu yongasu btang ste/ gsad par bya ba lus nas/ dge ba'i rtsa po de 'di ltar yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad gzhan gi gtse ba
50a6(1): sdug pA la nye bar byung pas/ lus dang srog shin tu skya phrogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las / thams cad mkhyend pa'i byang chub stobs bcu su phrul stan pa
50a7(1): pa'i gnas rab tu thob par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad ngan/ song thams cad snyem las yongs su 'das te/ 'jig rten pa thams cad las rab tu zad par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i myed pa'i
50a8(1): ye shes kyi dbyings su zhugs pas/ 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skabs rab tu rnyed par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i shes gnyen de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su bzung bas dgras 'jig pa thams cad dang bral
50a9(1): bar gyur na cing / sems can thams cad kha nas tho ba myed pa'i las/ dge ba thams cad dpyod pas ral gyis gcab pa lnga'i gyi bde bde ba thams cad 'das pas gyur da cig/ sems cad thams cad byang chub kyi shing nga
50a10(1): pa'i drung du phyi nad cing 'jigs pa myed par bdud kyi sde thams cad rnam par thor pas bag tsha ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang bral bar gyu rad cig/ sems cad thams cad bla na myed pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa
50b1(1): byes rnas dog cing / zlum ga dang / seng ge bar ro 'byi pas 'azod kyi 'jigs pa dang /  lag ma tha thams cad dang bral bar gyu da cig/ sems can lanas tho ba byed pa'i las la yang dag par byed cing 'gro las
50b2(1): zad kyi nang na bsgrib pa byed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i seng ger gyu dang cig/ sems can thams cad skye bo kun yongs su sbyong ba sems dang ldang zhing / 'gro ba kun tu 'jigs pa myed pa'i khab par zhugs par gyu rang cig ces
50b3(1): de ltar gamad pa ma gyur dra ba dag/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus dang / srog btang ste sa dbu ma nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khod pa'i btson ma'i sdug sAl kun spangs pa
50b4(1): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde gyi spang ba'i phyir yongs su ma/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' nga sems dpa' chen po ma mgo las gtsug pur dang / thor dpag tu bcas pa spongs na/ rgyal
50b5(1): po gtsug na rin po me dang / byang chub sems pa' yan lag das te ma shin tu'i'aphags pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpang/ gzhan dag gis ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du/ des spong ba de dag mthong hraH
50b6(1): nas gtong bar mos pa'i tshig dge bas thong bag dang gtsug phred du chos to khyer cig ces stobs shing / kye chung sheg/ bdag gis mge la/ gtsugasapudang / thor pag tu long shig ces nas/ byang chub sems
50b7(1): 'dzam bu'i gling na btsun pa myi'i dam pa des yid rtse gcig tu byas te/ yid sa 'khrugs pa dang / yid ma 'dres pa dang las gzhan la myi sems pa'i yida'ajig rten las 'phags pa'i yid dang / rab tu zhi ba'i yid
50b8(1): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yid dang / dge ba'i yid dang / drang ba'i yid dang / rigs pa la/ brtson pa'i yid kyis gtsug phud dang / thor pag tu bcas pa de spong ba la gtong ba'i chetshe/ gtsug phud par tho pag/ 
50b9(1): bcas par mchon gis phog ste/ mgo las pa ba nas/ pus so g.yas pa'i lha bas la 'bab ste/ rim 'gro dang bcas par lus kyis so mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar dam/ 'das pa dang / sa byond pa'i rang / rad ltar byung ba'i
50b10(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyang spyod pa rjes su dran pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dga' bas rnam par spol pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i yid kyi dbang po dang sdug sngal gyi tshor pas rengs
51a1(1): bar gyi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi mdabang po dang / sdug sngal gri tshor pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /  ba/ tha dad par khong du chud pa dang / tshor ba na gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag thams cad byi rten
51a2(1): rga zhes bya ba rab tu thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i thams cad dang/ rgyud kyi myal gcig tu 'gyur bya'i gtong ba'i sems dang // sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
51a3(1): bskyed pa las phyid myi ldog pa'i sems dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i skrag pa'i bsam pas/ rnam pas thob pa gzhan gyis drid myi 'jog pas dge ba'i rtsa zhes gnyen gyis bstan pa'i tshul la gnas te/ gtsug sung
51a4(1): dang / thod pag tu bcas pa mgo las phog ste/ yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo'o ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug rngugyi mchod rten du 'gyur te/ gtsug gto
51a5(1): ltar gyi sdang bar gyun cig/ sems can thams cad sA ldam pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rnams khar pas lad cing sna rdo rje rtag pa'i dam pa lta bur gyudad cig/ sems can thams cad sA sdug cing / sgra ma rnams/ 
51a6(1): gas pa dang / swa smras par myad cig/ sems can 'ams ca pa legs par skyes pa'i sarab tu 'das pa dang ldan par gyud cig/ sems cad thams cad su dga' ba 'khyil pa ltad g.yas phyogs
51a7(1): yu la khyil cing / dpal kyi le'u dang 'grags kyi sgra dang ldan par gyund cig/ sems cad thams par rgyan mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam pa 'das zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mchad dang ldan pa'i rna thos pam gyur cin
51a8(1): sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par rang gi sgra las 'od zer rab tu 'byed par 'gyun cig/ sems can thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi dbu' shin tu rnam pa dag bltar sma ra
51a9(1): tu mdzeg par gyun cig/ sems can pams cad ma nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi dbu' sgra dang dbu lta bud mdzes pa dang / ldan pa spyi bo la bzhog pa'i mchod rten du 'os pa'i sgra dang ldan par gyur cis
51a10(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ltar chags pa myed pa'i sgra ma dzes par skyes pa'i mun pa dang // rdul gis myi chags pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phu
51b1(1): ma sa 'ongs sa ga yin pas pang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bded na/ sems can thams cad kyims sa sung nyi dun pa'i sems sangs su rjogs par byas pa dang / bsasasad bye
51b2(1): pa'i stobs bcu'i mthus gtugs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sde'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spong ba rnams la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba byed pa dang / rgyal po zla 'odra dang
51b3(1): dri la yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chad byed pa gzhan dag gis gtong ba'i myig yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems dang / ye shes kyi myig yongs su bsgyangs pa'i blo dang / chos spang pa rab tu thob pa 'i yid kyi gnas dang / bla na myed pa'i
51b4(1): rgyas rgyam mngon du gyu rang pa'i yid kyi rnam pa dang // mngon par dashes pa thams cad kyisathar drus pa'i yongs su bye ba dang / ye shes kyi skye mched la yang dag par btang ba'i sems dang // mnyas par byos pa'i sbyi pa dang / 
51b5(1): ma pa'i semasar / de sdang babyed pa'i myig gis dad pa kyi rjod zhi'i dbang dang / slong ba rnabasal pan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa gnor bas / byang chub sems pa
51b6(1): le pachen pa dang / byes dang /  mongs susmos pa / dbang po drug shi du mams phrag tho tha la gyig bying ba de dzi kyi/ de yang byug sa sa sras pa
51b7(1): chos de lta bu la zhugs pa'i sems kyis slong ba dang / 'dod pa dag la sbyin pa byed cing mchod sbyin gyi don la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi mthul shin tu skyed pa dang /  'jig rten thams cad kyi dag
51b8(1): bar lta dang / bag byed pa'i sred par rnam par bzlog pa byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs mthong pas rang gyi dga' ba zhong du chud par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
51b9(1): dga' ba pyod par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi myig tu gyur te/ byig gi dam par gyur na cig/ sems
51b10(1): can thams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin tu yangs pas nyams pa myed pa'i myig tu gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad snang ba myi 'phrogs pa dang ldan zhing sha'i myig rnam par dag pa yongs su grub pas gyu rad cig/ 
52a1(1): sems cad thas cad gi 'pho ba dang / skye bshes zhing / lha'i phyig rnam par dag par gyud cig sems can thams cad de bzhi gzhigs pa'i seshes kyi nim bu na pa ni chos kyi rtsi ga rab byathob par gyu dang cig
52a2(1): sems cad gtong ba thams cad rnam par ston pas shes rab kyi byig bor par gyur cig sems can thams cad chos thams cad mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems can thams
52a3(1): pad chags pa byed pa'i myig gi mthar thug ste kun tu lta ba'i phyag dang ldan par gyu ra cig/ sems can thams cad sems cad gyi khams yongs su shes shing rab rib byed pa'i myig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can bams ca
52a4(1): D+ha stobs bcu bda' ba'i de bzhin gshegs khang phyin pas bsgribs pa byed pa'i myig dang ldan par su rung kyi cig/  'byi sa ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyig yongs su gtong ba da / thams cad khyen
52a5(1): ba'i tshad kyi byig gi chas sems can thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la bye byado/ nga dra god do// dum bu gnyis pa / bram po drug pa/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar rgyal po byang
52a6(1): gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang / ldan par byung bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i spyod ba la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang
52a7(1): chub tu 'thun par bskyes pa dang / dbang po dpe'/ ye shes dang / yon tan gyis shin tu btsun pa par khams gsum ma dag cing snying po myed pa la snying po rab tu rtogs pa dang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
52a8(1): dba'i blta ba rab tu thob pas rang gi lus la chags paSh+Ti sems dang / gnas myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su dran pa mi gnas pa dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba'i sems dang / dbang po'i rgyu ba shin tu zhi ba dang
52a9(1): 'gro ba'i mya ngan thams cad nas/ sems can thams cad gang don par sems pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi 'byung nas dang / rgyud ched du brjod pa brgya ba chos gtong ba'i sems yangs par byas pa dang / 
52b1(1): dopa dam par rnam pa'i chos dang / mgon poms cad kyi lu' du 'jug pa dang / kyi dbang phyug la migs kyis pyod pa dang / rang gi lus la sgrib po byed pa las snying po blang ba'i blos yongs su gtong / 
52b2(1): ba'i che/ rna ba dang / sA yongs su btang pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'de 'di ltar yongs su sngo'i ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par rig par bya ba la chags
52b3(1): bskyed pa'i rna ba dang ldan pa gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad kyis smra thams cad skad ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir bsgribs pa myed pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyu ra cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa/ 
52b4(1): ldan pas/ thogs pa byed bzhin pa dang ldan par gyur de cig/ sems can thams cad rna pa'i skye mched shin tu bsgom pas na ba rnam par dag par gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad rnam par shes pa zhi pa skye ba'i byin bsgribs
52b5(1): pa byed pa'i rna pa dang ldan par gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung khong du chud pa'i phyir chos dri byings la gzhol pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sgribs pa myed
52b6(1): ba'i chos rnam par rimag par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa byed pa'i rna ba dang ldan bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs pa'i phyir rgol pa 'jig par byed pa'i shes pa la gyi byed pa'i rnam pa dang ldan par 6
52b7(1): gyug cig/ thos can thams cad na bzhin tu dag pa par bang bsgyur bas kun tu 'dug pa'i sa dang ldan par gyud da cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi stan rab tu thob par bya sa ma du thob pas ldaben pas rab tu rdzo
52b8(1): par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched pos rna ba yongs su btang pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad kyi rna ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
52b9(1): bsngos nas/ bsna rnam par dag par yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par po'o ba'i sna dang / dpel byad bzang po'i rlung/ mtshan bzang po'i sna dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sna dang / rnam sa bar dag pa'i
52b10(1): sna dang / ris gyis gzhol ba'i sna dang / mdzes pa 'phags pa'i snga dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i snga dang / ngo bltan sdug pa'i sna dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi shangs rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su shA na
53a1(1): 6na ma#// sems cad thams cad rol gyi sdug pa myed pa dang gamatshamathams cad kyi ngo dang / tshogs pa myed pa'i ngo dang / blta na sdug pa'i ngo dang myi mthum pa'i mye ba'i do dang // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo dang
53a2(1): kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i ngo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'i ro dang kun nas lta ba'i ngo dang / yid bu 'od bzhid chad myed pa'i do dang / ldan par gyu rang cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
53a3(1): sems dpa' chen po rna ba dang / sna yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad las yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
53a4(1): thams cad la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu 'dus pas 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tham ma ca
53a5(1): shin tu shes par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kying sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu
53a6(1): tu mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas gseg zhan kyi chos kyi sgo khong du chud par 'gyur/  pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu zil kyis myi
53a7(1): non pa'i yongs su dag par thob par 'gyur ba dang / ci nasakyad sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgya sams cad la snang ba'i rab tu thob par gyur pa dang ci nas rnas kyang sems can thams cad
53a8(1): kyis/ sangs byos kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dge bar 'gyur ba dang / ni nas kyang sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i
53a9(1): rdza ba de dag yongs su blo'o/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyid pa'il gyis myi non pa'is langs te/ mu dum bA ra ltar shin tu dkon par sems pa'i sems rnam par dag pa dang / gtong
53a10(1): myi zad bcing 'byam klas pa dang / dad cing dkrung srugs te gtang ba'i sems dang / yongs su gtong ba'i blo mtha' yas pa dang / rtul ba dang yongs su dul ba'i yid kyis gtong ba'i dbang po dang gtong ba'i thams cad
53b1(1): ma thong bshes nga mjug pa'i thams cad sa byed pa'i sto lab dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gtong ba chen po dang gshi du gtong ba dang / rlub rgyu gto ba dang / 
53b2(1): gi shebs kyi pa dang shes dang / bad pa da dang / ning rgyas la mogs pa dang /  skrod pa gang tsa'i sems kyis nam bdes dubanam lanas cags ri rgyam pa'i thog sod du/ 
53b3(1): brtan 'as sa gang byin pa ban du dad gisas / ldanas sangs ma pa // dge ba'im pa de dag 'di sta 'odas sun/ sems can mas cad 'grob kun gyis batshad nyin du chong
53b4(1): thos pa gyur te/ 'che ba dgar zhing rdo ba dang ldan par gyur da te cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rab tu thob pas/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems
53b5(1): da pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par zhugs shing dul ba'i sem gas kyis nye bar spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnod byin kyi la 'khor bstan mug cing 'a'i nang dang / so nas pa dag par gyurd cig/ 
53b6(1): sems can thams cad kha dang po dpe' byed par rnam par dag cingabazhin dran pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur da gcig/ semasacan thams cad so bzang po 'i seb nas spos zhim po'i klungs myed pa yid
53b7(1): du 'ong ba dga' ba skyed pa'i rang 'byung bas rjem su ga ci ngas rdol cu sa rgyu gyid/ sos can thams cad shin du dul ba'i so bzlon cing / bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pa dang / pad ma sna tshogs kyis
53b8(1): mdzes par bris pa'i so dang ldan par gyu rang cig/ sems can thams cad gdong kyi kyis 'kho nas tshad myed pa'i/ 'od gzod sdang ba 'byung pas 'od ze re bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba'i so dang ldan par gyur cig
53b9(1): sems can thams cad la'as la sa chagasas zhen cing / kha nas tho bskyed par spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas das pa'i babar drug par gyur te/ so'i thags legs shing 'bras chas 'bye ba lta bung byar cig sems can
53b10(1): cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam pa'i lung ston cing / so'i gsel kun nas 'od 'gro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par gyu rad cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bo'i sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba
53b11(1): rtsa ba de dag/ sems can ma lus par/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sa skyes pa dang / chags pa myed pa'i rgyan gyi chos thams cad shes pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sno'o'adi ltar yang byang chub so
54a1(1): / dpa' sems pa' chen po la lde bsrungs na ji ltar na bri blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir gyi ldog pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang skye ba'i mched nas pardzogs / 
54a2(1): dag la gnas shing che rabs bye khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed pa de rnyeg tu yongs su btang bar gyur pa/ gi/ de bzhin du// des kyang slong ba de dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i seng ge'i gdan dag la bkod cing / slong bas mos pa'i sems
54a3(1): kyis yid du 'ong zhing 'jam pa'i ngag dang / byams pa la spyod pa'i sems kyis rang gi lce gtong ba'i che/ gshe' pa myed pa'i sems dang / me myed pa'i sems dang / nyams pa myed pa'i sems dang / rigs chen po'i rigs
54a4(1): dang ldan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs su byung ba'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod cing gzhag pa'i sems dang / rgyud 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems dang / mthu' stobs chen po'i shugs kyi sos dang / 
54a5(1): lus la ma chags pa'i sems dang / tshig tu brjod pa la chags pa myed pa sems byas te/ pus mo'i lpa nga sa la gtsug shing/ bdag gi kha nas lce phyung ste/ lus thams cad la slob ba dbang byed du gtsug nas/ tshig mnyen
54a6(1): zhing 'das pa dang / sid du'ang ba dang / byams par spyod pas tshin tu brjod cing / cings kya byed dga' bzhing yid bde pa dang /  mgu' zhing 'das pa bdag gi khyi lo la gang tu dgos rje'i dgog
54a7(1): par bsgrubs cig ces nas de lce sbyin zhis yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ lci yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltan medzes su sngo'iste/ dge ba'i rtsal 'dis sems can thams cad/ tshig gi
54a8(1): tshul thams cad kyis shes par byed pa'i byir// ske shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig bden pa gnyis su bya ba myod pa dang / ldan par 'gyur te/ gdong gi dkyis
54a9(1): 'khor 'khebs pa'i lce dang ldan par byedad cig/ sems cad thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mo 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par spyodad pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i lce sa/ 
54a10(1): ldan par sbe na cig/ sems cad thams cad ro bro ba'i mchog shin tu rnam pa bdag pa dang ldan ning ni ti shi tu mra ba'i lce dang ldan par gyun cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi rig shes pas the tsol gardo / 
54b1(1): ba'i phyir nges pa'i tshig gi dbyangs mtha' yas pani yod pa'i lce dang ldangan par gyud da cig/ sems can thams cad sde'i marjod nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i 'byeng ba'i phyir
54b2(1): snang bas pa 'ams pa'i byung ba'i sde dang ldad par byed ni/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad rnam par nges pa'i skabs pa'i tshogs kyi zad pa mi ston cing/ brjod pas tshig shin tu ngas pa'i 'arjod pa'i sgo
54b3(1): dang ldan par gyur dacig pa/ sems can thams cad spyod pa kun brjod pa tshad myed pa'i mdzod kyi lce dpa/ ldan zhing 'dral ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sems can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang / smra ba thams cad rnam par 'grel
54b4(1): ba'i lce dang ldan par gyu dad cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa'i rjes su brjod pa'i tshig gi rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang / tshig gi rnam par shes pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig
54b5(1): sems can/ thams cad daspyod pa thams cad mngon par rjod pa'i ye mes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing // chos thams cad kyi tshig thams/ cad shin tu ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub
54b6(1): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen go thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dbyig ces pani smon las la rab tu brtson par de lce yongs su btang bas/ med dag par smras pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad kyis/ 6
54b7(1): bsgribs pa myed pa'i ye shes chags pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dam pa 'go lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug
54b8(1): cing sems can thams cad yongs su bskyas pa'i mgo// byang chub sems dpa' khong du slar byed par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mchog tshul gyi mgo dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par lta ba dang / ye shes rnam pan
54b9(1): dag pa'i mgo la yang dag par lta ba dang bsgribs pa myed pa'i mgo yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sa dam pa'i mgo rjes su lta ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes dam pa'i mgo lta bu 'dod cing tshol ba nga / 
54b10(1): khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bltar skyed paye gres kyi mgo'i dam pa yang dag par skrag pa dang / phyogs thams cad phyin pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po'i mgo la mngon par mos par byed pa dang // chos khams da
55a1(1): ga/ 'ang bang byed pa'i zil dkyis kyi don pa'i mgo yongs su grub par byed cing de lta bu'i chos la stod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi yongs su gtor ba'i chu la la bslangs
55a2(1): pa/ sangs rgyas la mos pa skyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/ slo pa mtha' yas pas dga' bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yid kyi dbang po shin tu gsal ba// rgyud rab tu dang zhing / sems dang yid shinatu
55a3(1): dang pa sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgal ba'i snang ba thob pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ shin tu rgya che ba rtswa rgyun myi chad par sems pa/ gtong ba chen po gtong ba shin tu gtor bas gtong ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu
55a4(1): dga' pas nye bar brtan pa'i chos can lhag pa'i bsam pas yangs shing dge la rgya che bas sbyin pa gtong bar mngon par 'dod pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog dang / skyes bu dam pa/ ka shi'i rgyal po dang / de ma yin pa'i
55a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs myed pa dag kyang mgo yongs su gtong par gyur pa de ltar mgo gtong ba'i tshe/ mgo yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar sems can
55a6(1): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi dbu bang tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yodangs su sngo'o/ spyi'i gtsug bltar gyi snang ba dang / skye mched de/ yad kyis ma non pa dang / zhing thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa dang / 1
55a7(1): bum pa rgyas pa dang / dga' 'khyil pa dang / swa dang / mgo shA'i 'od dpA/ 'od gzer sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rmad du 'byung ba dang / dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa
55a8(1): dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu dang ldan pa dang / ye shes kyi mgo rtogs par bya ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog tu phyin pa'i mgo dang ldan pa dang / mgo rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mgo yongs
55a9(1): su gtogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo ste ka/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyis chos kyis mchog yongs su rdzogs
55a10(1): pa dang / ye shes kyi yan lagadas pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// po slong ba rnams la dang ba'i lag pa thog mar 'gro ba de phan 'dogs pa/ 
55b1(1): cum dang / rnam byed pa la brtson par 'gro ni sreg pa dang / ngan pa che'i lag pa zlog pa 'gro bas las pa gtong ba das/ gyod pa na med par byang chub sems dpa'i las la myong ba dang / na
55b2(1): shin tu chung bzhing gtong ba'i sems ma 'arnanas pa / rim phrar myang ba'i chub min du nges pa dang / byang chub mi'am dpa' seng ge'i rgyal gyis gyud cing lag yangs pa gtong ba la sos pas lag pa yong
55b3(1): su gtong ba dang / rgyal gyi ba ni chen po rab tu brtan pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ses dpa'i mings dang / tshor bas mnyamams pa'i blo dang pa dang / 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba las byi ldog pa'i 'gro bas byang chu'i su byu
55b4(1): pas de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang / rgyal po dga' ldan dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan chad myed pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye gnas sna tshogs dag na gnas shing
55b5(1): ga pa yongs su gtong bar gyud pa de ltar byang chub sems dbus/ sems yangs shing / rgya che ba mad myed pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya ma mo mthong bar gyu da pa/ chos kyi rgyud kyi sgo rnam par bye ba/ 
55b6(1): 'jig rten gyi 'ams bams cad du khyab par gtong ba'i lag pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad ma khyend pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa'i spod las can/ sems paskyed pa rdul byed pa dang 'grogs pas sun
55b7(1): nas bsko dang pa byed pa ye shes dang / chos kyi lus rgyan gyi chad pa/ gyi thigs kyi med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis kyi sprul pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nye bar brtan pas/ sems
55b8(1): spel pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis pyang pa dpa / gcig tu gyur pa pa'i gtod pas byung ba de spong ba la rka lag gi sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems cad thams cad
55b9(1): kha 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du dmyigs te rgalag yongs su gtang ba yongs su sbyin pa 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su sngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba
55b10(1): 'dis sems pan thas sakyang rngu'i rmil gyi rkang pams sring ring po che'i lag pa dang ldan pam thu cig de dag rin po che'i las pa res sems cas thams cad la sbyid pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab tu rabasten pas chu
56a1(1): byi lus la rin po ches 'thor bar gyur cig/ mngon par thor bar gyurd cig/ rab tu thor par gyud cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi srin gyis sangs rgyas thams
56a2(1): da mchod par gyu ra cig rje/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun du zhe sdang ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su dong/ 
56a3(1): zhing 'jigs pa byed pa la gnas te/ mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa'i phyir thams cad lag ma rim po che thogs pa dang / lag na spos thogs pa dang / lag mgos thogs pa dang / lag na gdugs thogs pa dang / lags
56a4(1): 'breng ba thogs pa dang / lag na me tog thogs pa dang / lag mye sa sogs pa dang / lA ga na lAb lbu' thogs pa dang / lag 'a se rtan mtha' yas par thogs par gyu dang te/ kud das sgo dang ldan pa'i thams
56a5(1): la gnas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par brtson pa'i/ sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phruladang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thogs pa myed pa'i lag pa dang / 1
56a6(1): 'grothamams cad sa dag par 'dzin pa'i rna 'phrus dang / sa brje rgyalag pa 'an pang po dang dran pa'i lag pa dang / 'od bzhen gyi marjod pa pa mas shi dkyil mthor rab tu tong ba'i lag pa nga / 
56a7(1): thams cad la gzil gcig gis yog par byed pa'i lags dang / dra bar 'brel cing sem mo zangs ltar 'dug pa'i lag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyag shis tu yangs pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mched pa byed/ 
56a8(1): mar gyund cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mos dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / khas len pa'i dang tshul dang / slong ba thams cad la mdzod par mos shing 'dod pas
56a9(1): riga' 'dzad/ spro ba dang / dad pa ched po rab tu thob pa dang // spong ba 'thod par stonang pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgyam chothams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi
56a10(1): tshul gcig tu gyurd pas na lag yongs su gtong bar byed cing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub chol ba'i che/ tA lagayongs su btang bas/  yang dag par bslus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar thams cad gtong brji
56b1(1): don du yongs su ldon/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsam pa dang / sems dang yid du ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyis rab tu dka' ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
56b2(1): la mngon par dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshor bas dengs par myi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa// len pa thams cad la zhe spring ba'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub
56b3(1): sems shA par kyi pa sa ca ba tunags pa'i sems dang ldan / byang chub sems dpa' rnams cad kyis gtong ba sa sbyin par bya ba'i rnam mu srung ba'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyid pa rgya med zan
56b4(1): rgyal po yir bde bar sems dpa' dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub na sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs myed pa dag byung/ skye ba'i gnas de dang / de dag ni gnas shing khrag yongs su gartog/ 
56b5(1): bar gyu rad pa de ltar slong gi rnams la rang gi lus kyi khrag gtong ba'i che/ khrag yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'o/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su so'o ste/ nidage ba'i rtsa ba 'dig
56b6(1): sos can thams cad chos kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phun gsum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po drang 'brab dge sbyong kyi lus dang ldam
56b7(1): bar gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad lus nyams pa skyed pa cing dag dang ldan te/ lus ma myed par gyur dacig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun kyis phrogs pa'i sems dang ldan zhing stsal pa lta bu'i lus
56b8(1): dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad 'od da pa'i lus nyams pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / yid du 'ong ba'i lus dang ldan par gyu da cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgyas pa'i
57a1(1): ldan par gyu dad cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba myed pa'i dbyings su chos kyi skyid pa la dbang spyad pa'i lus dang ldan zhing ye shes dam pa'i lus dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro bkun
57a2(1): kyis bltan don yod par skyes pas/ rin gyi rgya mtsho lta bu'i// lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi rtse bas gos pa myed bcing bar snang gi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan par gyurd cig ces de
57a3(1): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las khrag gi sbyin pa byed pa de'i tshe/ ye shes kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po lam rab tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su sngo'o// dag pa'i yid
57a4(1): kyis yongs su sngo'o// yangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su sngon/ dang sa pa'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// spro ba'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// zhus pa byed pa'i yid kyis yongasasu
57a5(1): sngo'o// bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su sngo'o// dang ba'i yid kyis yongs su sgon/ mgu ba'i yid dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang / yid badre zhing rangs pa'i skyes pa'i dge ba'i cha de yongasasu sngo'o// 'di ltar yang
57a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems gnam du myed pa'i dga' bar rnam par 'phel ba dang / byang chub semasadapa' dang / mkhas pa'i skye bos bsten pa'i zla byed pa'i dge
57a7(1): ba'i rtsa dadang / lhag pa'i bsam pa zangs pa 'jig rten gyi dri ma khaseHlad pa dang / slong ba thams cad kyis zad par myi mus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar blangs pa'i yongs su gtong ba'i dang / yon tan ri/ 
57a8(1): po ches yang dag par blangs pa'i dge ba 'byam klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yi dam gyis nye bde blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang / spong ba thams cad kyi yid kyis 'dod pang bsams
57a9(1): rab btang yang 'gyod pa myed pa'i sems dang / sbyin pa'i la dmyigs pa'i dngos pos shin tu brtags pa'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pa'i rten dang / len pa rnams la sbyin pa cu yongs su gtong ba'i sems nyams pa
57a10(1): myed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon tu gyurd pa lta bu'i 'du shes su mngon par 'di nad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon tu gyu nad pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
57b1(1): khams thams cad mngon du gyu rang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad dang / 'gro thams cad la mngon tu gyur nga ba'i snying rje chen pos yongs su sgrub pad // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la
57b2(1): mngong du gyudad pa'i bstobs bcu rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngod par gyur da pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bathun pa'i yongs su rdzogs
57b3(1): par bya ba dang / myi 'jigs pa thams cad mngonas tu mya dad pa'i lha mchog dang / seng ge'ing ro bsgrags pa dang / dus gsum mngos du myu pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rgyas
57b4(1): gsu thams cad mngon tu bya rang ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa jug par zhe non pa'i byang chub ses rapa'i smon lam dang / na 'i kyi chad pa'o/  myed pas mngon du myu da pa'i sems bskyed pa grangs myed pas
57b5(1): de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phan pa chal pa dang / rgyal po rngams cad gtong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs myed pa dag kyang / skye ba'i
57b6(1): mjed sna tshogs dag na gnas shing / sha dang rked yongs su gtong ba de ltar slong ba rnams la lus las sha dang / rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe / shre dang rkang yongs su gtong pas yang dag par bsdus pazhi
57b7(1): dge 'di rtse ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad pa rdo rje snying po ltar 'jigs pa'i yan lag rab ldan zhing myi shigs pa'i lus
57b8(1): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sos can rnams nA da/ ga sol ba'i byed pa'i lus rab tu thog pas gsogam yin pa'i lun dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gi lus
57b9(1): nam med dag pa dang ldan ning sangs rgyas kyis rgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sos can thams cad mam na gsum bcurtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu grub pas bzod nams brgya ba'i
57b10(1): kyi lus dang ldan par gyu rang cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tha myi dad cing ma nyams pa dang ldan te/ dpe' byang bzeng po brgyad bcus rnam par bris pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig
58a1(1): sem can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spya bar cu thob pas/  las 'das 'tshad byed pa'i lus dang ldan par gyu da cig/ sems can rnams cad bdud kyi thams cad kyi thugs can na
58a2(1): 'jom pas kun tu khyab pa'i smon las dang ldan zhing grub pa myed pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas pas cad dang lus gcin por rgya
58a3(1): cig/ sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu chos kyi skus khyab pa lapyod pa'i phyir chags pa myed pa'i lus mngon par grug par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad sho pa'i lus dang ldan
58a4(1): zhing / byang chub kyi lus das pa dang ldan par gyu dad cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyend yang dmyigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa slong ba lag rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe
58a5(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' las 'das pa tshad myed pa rnam par dag par rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
58a6(1): chen pa/ sbyin pa'i rgyud la bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pan/ kha thams cad byin pas bapyod pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i rdo long tu phyin pa chen po thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ pha rol/ 
58a7(1): tu phyind pa'i sbyin pa 'grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad yid la bya bas mngon du gyu rang pas
58a8(1): gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ spong ba thams cad rgyan gyi chad las rgya ba rab tu tshos pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongasu skyo ba byed pa dang / rgyal che g.yong ba byed pa dang / de sa yin pa'i byang chub
58a9(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' ches po gzhan grangs myed pa dag gis kyang snying yongs su btar par gyu rad pa// de ltar spong ba kun nas 'ongs pa rnams kyis bslangs shing rang gyi lus las snying yong su gtong zhing skyid pa byed pa dag
58a10(1): spong ba dang / thob par byed par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i lasam pa rnam par sbyor ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir// stobs bcu'i byang chub la dmyigs par byed pa dang / smon lam chen pos nan tan byed rlung
58b1(1): byang chub sems de pa'i 'apyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang / smon lam yongs su myi gtong sa mas/ sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa 'dug sems can thams cad 'di ltar yongs su sde 'o sems can thams
58b2(1): cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bus yongs su bzung ba'i'i snying dpal gyi be 'us brgyan pa dang ldan zhing rdo rje'i ri'i khor yug thams cad ltar gyi shigs shing rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i snying dang ldan pa dang / bag ma pa byed pa'i snying
58b3(1): dang / thub par dka' ba'i snying dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang / dpal ba'i rgyal mtshan ye shes kyi snying po can gyi snying dang // mthul po che chen po dpa pa'i sems kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi snying
58b4(1): dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo lta bur gyi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang / mthu bo che ltar gyi shigs pa'i snying po can gyi snying dang / bdud kyi las dang / bdud kyi dpung dang / bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jom pa'i snying dang / brtan
58b5(1): ba'i snying dang / gseng mthong ba'i snying dang / dpa' ba'i snying dang / rtul phod pa'i snying dang / myi 'jigs myi skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i// snying dang / rdo rje'i go cha chen po yang dag par bsgos pa'i snying / 
58b6(1): dang / shin tu btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying dang / sangs rgya kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub srid pas gyud pa'i rti dang / byang chub kyi shing drang du 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi chog/ 
58b7(1): thams cad rjes su rtogs shing rmongs pa myed par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tsha rgya ba'i snying dang / stobs bcu mngon pa de byang chub rab tu thob pa'i snying dang / ldan par gyur dacig ces de ltar byang chub sems
58b8(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying gi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi gos pa myed pa'i stobs bcu mnga' ba'i thugs phung gsum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs
58b9(1): pa dang ldan pas yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spong pa mngon par dad par byed pa'i lta ba dang / gsal zhing dga' bar byed pa'i myig dang / byang chub dang mnyam par bya ba ni/ 
58b10(1): byams pa dang / ci 'dod pa yis slong ma phud dud du bya ba'i sbyin pa dang / rgyun myi chad par yid la byed pa'i gtong pa dang / lus la snying po myed par rtogs pas/ snying po bla nga ba'i sems dang / na bar gyur pa'i
59a1(1): lus rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang / s+yang ki dang / wa dang / khyis khaza bar gyurd pa'i lus su rab tu rtog pa dang / gzhan la rag lus shing lus myi rtag par yid la byed pa dang / lus kyi
59a2(1): rgyas thams cad khong du chud pa dang / gzhan la dad pa'i sems dpa'/ de lta bu'i chos de dag yid la bya ba la brtson pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' legs par byin dang / rgyal po sdig pa bas khang pa dang / 
59a3(1): de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs myed pa dag gis kyang slong ba rnams la rgyu ma dang / mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang / glo ba yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar nga rgyu ma dang / 
59a4(1): mchin pa dang / ma ngal sa dang / glo ba yongs su gtong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' slong ba de dag la myil 'gebs pa'i myig gis lta zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus myi rtag cing / 'di
59a5(1): ltar gyi gtsang ma 'on kyang rgyam dang / mchin 'das/ mkhal sa dang / glo ba lta bu dag kyang slong bdag la dgos pa ltas sbyin par bya'o zhes de lta bur yid la byed cing dga' ba'i rgyud dang / de ltar chos nyid shes
59a6(1): pa'i 'am gdangs / slong mthong bar go bloshes gnyen du 'atu shes pa ni byin gyis brlabs kyis lus snying po myed pa de las snying po blang bar 'dod de/ de lta bur med la byed cing rab tu rtogs/ 
59a7(1): dang ldan pa'i ses kyis/ rgyus dang / mchin pa dang / sa khal ma dang / glo ba de dag yongs su gtod ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo'o ste/ rgyu ma dang / 
59a8(1): mchin pa dang / mkhal sa dang blo ba yongs su btang bas yang dag par sdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi snying po'i lus dang ldan zhing / lus kyi phyin pa shin tu gtsang zhing dag pa
59a9(1): gyu cig sems can thams pa thams cad ma byed pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ste shes kyi lho dang yang dag par ldan par rgyun da cig/ sems can pams cad nang spos zhis pa'i mchog tham sar
59a10(1): dang ldan zhing phyi rol pa tu 'od gzer rab tu 'byed pas bltan bzang ba'i lus dang ldan par gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad rim gyis zhol zhing mnyam pa'i lus kyi yan lag dang ldan te gzhu lta bu'i lto dang ldan
59b1(1): pa'i lum sa myur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dka' bas lus shin tu bskyed pas lus chos kyi zas dang / ye shes kyis gso bar mudad cig sems can thams cad dga' ba'i lus dang / 
59b2(1): chos kyi lus kyis yang dag par spyod pas zad myigs pa'i lus dang ldan pa bgyur cig/ sems can thams cad sa so yang dag par rig pa'i chos snang ba dang ldan pas gzugs kyi snying pos sras kyi rang nus pa
59b3(1): dag par gyud da cig/ sems can thams cad gang gyi bsam pa'i rgyud shin tu sbyangs pas lus yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyu da cig// sems can thams sa cad ye shes kyis rims par byed pa'i chos kyi srin gyi ram
59b4(1): dab tu 'bebs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu dang / le ges rgyal 'byor nga khong du run par gyun cig/ sems can thams cad phyi rol gyi lus/ 'gro du lams cad la ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan mdzes shing snang bar byangs
59b5(1): bas/ na gyi lus dag cing zhi bar gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rgyum dang // mchin pa dang mkhal ma dang / gro ba de dag rang gi lus la sring ba rnams
59b6(1): sa la gadres pa'i sa pa de ga sas da sa ca kyims sbyidang yongs pa gcing bsgrims pa byed pa'i shes sa rab tu med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su mas
59b7(1): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyal po skar ma'i 'od dang / de ma yis gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
59b8(1): gzhan dag gis kyang / yan lag dang nying lag dang / rus so slong pa rnams la yongs su btang sa ma gyurang pa de ltar yan lag deng nyid lag dang / rus ma spangs na spong ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ slong ma thag tu
59b9(1): sems dga' rlab/ sems mos pa dang / sems dad pa dang / sems rab tu sros pa dang / sems tha rad pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang / chags pa myed pa'i sems dang / dgal ba myed pa'i sems
59b10(1): dang / slong pa rnams las ris 'gro bya ba'i sgos rab tu thob ste// de yan la ga dang/ nyid lag dang / rus pa de dag bablangs pas/ slob sa rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i me/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
60a1(1): thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ rang gi lus kyi yan lagadang / nyid las dang / rus pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad nus
60a2(1): ba dang /  ga dang / khrag myed pa'i lus dang / ldan zhing sprul pa lta bu'i lus can du gyu ra cig/ sems can thams cad lus thub pa myed cing zil gyis myi non pas rdo rje lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
60a3(1): thams cad chags pa myed cing grol ba dpa' bcings pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyis byung ste/ sems can thams cad mkhyend pa'i rdza stobs dang / chos su ldan pa'i lus phun rnyogs pa mi gyu rad cig/ sems can
60a4(1): thams cad dbang po pa myi dad cing gcad du byed pa'i rab tu thob pas ye shes kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi stobs dang / dbang gi pha rold tu phyind pa thob pas chos kyi stobs
60a5(1): kyi lus dang ldan par gyurd cig/ 1sems can thams cad lus shig shig dpor myed pas/ yan lag shin tu brtan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur na cig du/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongs su smyin pa mgyur da cig/ 'dul
60a6(1): mthunas pa gros rnam par di ltar mas pa'i yus dang / yanasanabyes kyi byirnam pa dang ldan pang rgyad cig/ sems ca ma phu po rtse'i san sa byang lags da pa nyin 'am tho na
60a7(1): dang ldan zhing ye shes la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par rgyud cig/ sems can thams cad can cing drug pa skyed pa'i lus rab tu thob pas shin du brtan pa lus kyi rgyud 'brelang pa dang ldan par gyuran cig/ sems can thams cad 'thu' da / 
60a8(1): brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa nyi lus kyis shin du brtan shing stongs dang ldan par gyu dad cig/ sems cad thabs cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyis khyu mchog gi mthul 'byidad pa'i lus dam khwas shi phyi na zhing // chos kyi lus sbyis
60a9(1): 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur da cig / sems can thams cad kha na ma zlo kha myed cing lta na sdug pa don yod pa dang ldan zhing / bsod nams kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyu rang cig/ sems can thas/ 
60a10(1): cad gan sa myed pa'i se shes kyi mthar drug ste // gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam pa byin gyis rlabs pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba lnga'i lus
60b1(1): ldan ra byas kyig / sems can thams cad/ thams cad du 'grog las kyi rjes su song bas 'gro ba thams cad ma ldan 'dogs pa'i lus dang ldan par byu cig/ segs can thams cad padas kyis gyo chos thams cad pa rgyan
60b2(1): rkyegs pabyed cing mngong ba sa pa'i spang bas sbro kun nas malta ba'i lus dang ldan par byam chog/ segs can thams can thams cad 'byen pa'i theg pa la gro bas bzod tha sa sngon pa'i bram zu na gsum tshogs par gyu
60b3(1): cig/ sems can thams cad me shes brtan par gnas pa thob pas nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rgyun chad rdzing rnas par dag pa'i lus dang ldan par gyud cig/ sems can thams cod tsams cad mkhyen pa'i theg
60b4(1): ba sa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du lus grub par bya son/ brtul zhugs das po'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thas cad 'jig rnyen du skyes pa'i lus thams cad las nam ba 'das shing de bzhin gnan
60b5(1): de gablams ca kyi nasasas byed pa'i mi shes byab par bya ba dang / srin rnanam pa ro dag pa'i phyi mongs su man/ 'di ltar yang byang chub 'i mos dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma 'i khris las song nas grib 'anog dang
60b6(1): ba'i lags pa bslangs pa'i me/ mnon mthogs pa'i slob sa mthob yang dga' bar byed pa'i dbang pos srong ba la lta zhing / slodro rnams la dris drug zo ba'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas legs par bting ba'i stan pa blo ra
60b7(1): la bkod de/ slong pa rnams la rim 'tho' 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa dang / len pa rnams la shin tu dkon pa'i 'du shes yang dag par skyed pa dang / thams cad la khyed du pa'i gzhir mya rad pa spong pam bye ba yang dag par mthong pa / 
60b8(1): sems shing spong ba rnams la lan 'dogs pa'i sems kyis rtog cing 'dzus dang ldan par lta bas spyod pa rnams la lta zhing / chur shog long shig ces bya ba'i tshig brjod pa dang / slong ba rnams la bdag nyid ci dgu' bar bya bar
60b9(1): gtong ba de 'i ltar byang chub sems dpa' dgal ba'i snying po dang/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po gser gyi rtsib logs ltar mdog dang ldan pa'i lags pa spong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe 'o dzidage ba'i rtsa brade drad phren
61a1(1): / can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su mo ste/ sems can tham mal cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis myi ngoms shing rnam par dag pas shing tu 'jam pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sem
61a2(1): can thams cad rdo rje'i mdog thub par dka' ba'i kha dog dang ldan bzhing \u0f7f/ ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi snyim po ltar dag cing / gser gyi mdog dang
