61a3(1): ldan par gyurd cig/ ses can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam par spyad pas dag cing / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad dge sbyong de bzhin gshegs
61a4(1): pa shin tu gnon pa'i kha dog gis rnam par dag cing stog pa myed cing dang pa'i kha dog dang mdog gi mchog dang ldan par gyurard cig / sems can thams cad rang bzhin gis kha dog rnam par dag cing kha dog dang / kha don
61a5(1): gi dam pa dang ldan par gyu rang cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dbye' byad bzang pos rnam par bris shing / sangs rgyas kyi kha dog rnam par drag pas mdog dang kha dog shin tu rnam par dag par gyur da cig/ sems can
61a6(1): bas cad kha dog dang ka mdog bzang po phun gsum tshogs shing/  'gro la kun tu mdog gyi sAng rlab tu 'byed par gyur cig/ sems ga can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dkyis pa rang mirjod
61a7(1): ku myed pa rnam par 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing mdog 'od gzer gyi dra ba can dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad gzugs thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dag ste/ mdog dang kha dog shin tu snum pa dang
61a8(1): bar gyu na cigag ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las mdog dang ldan pa'i pags pa slong ba rnams yongs su gtong ts+li kaM/ dge ba'i zla ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
61a9(1): dag par 'gyur ba dang / na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sgo la/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems la phyin ci log myed pa bzhin 'dzum pa cas/ 
61a10(1): yid bde ba thob pa/ theg pa chen po la legs par gnas pa// grags par 'dod pa byed pa'i sbyin pa can/ snying thag pa nas sbyin pa la gnas par gtong pa dang / gtong ba chen po la yid rab tu zhugs pa/ 'dzum pa'i dri ma la
61b1(1): gyiganam pas thems dang ldan pa / bla dog das 'drangs pa'i drim dang bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sa rab tu zhugs pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba'i brtson 'grus das 'das 'dru'i gling gi bdas kyi
61b2(1): ser gyi 'o /  rnam yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mad byed gzhan dag gis kyang son mo rnams yongs su bta par gyurang ba ltar spong ba la ga lag gi mer mi yongs su gtong ba'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems ldan thams
61b3(1): la 'di ltar meng su sgo'i ste/ sor mo byin pa dang / kyi baspangs pa'i dngos po bta pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sor mo thob par gyur me/ sor mo ring bar gyur dgyi
61b4(1): sems can thas sa cad mer mo nam gyes gnol ba legs par grubs pas sor mo hUMg la'i myur dacig/ sems can thams cad sen mo gang ba'i sor mo rnam sa dag pa dang ldan zhing / sen mo 'das kyi kha dog lta bu'i sen mo
61b5(1): ldan par mya dacig ga sems cad pams car ces bams pa 'din gang babyin pa'i mar mo bye byung babang po dang bla zhing / skyes dpa' pha sems pad ma byin pa'i sor so dang ldan par gyur cig na
61b6(1): ban mam pa cad spobs bama'i phyag so so na lkun byangad byu dang te dbyer byad pabang pos gyur ba'i sor mo dang ldan par gyud da cigasems can thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa'i sor mo chul dang 'thun par skyes
61b7(1): ba'i sor mo dab pa dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo'i chos nyid kyi yan lag dang bum pa gang pa dang / bkra shis kyis rnas par mdzes pa dang / ldan zhing sor mo'i rtse mo la 'khod ma yod pa'i sor mo raH/ 
61b8(1): ldan par gyun cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i phyag sor smin las kyi rnam par sbyin pa su mthum pa byung ba lta bu dang ldan zhing / pad ma pa'ang po dang dga' ba lakhyim pas so mo thams cad kyi rigs dang / srin
61b9(1): lag shin tu rgyan cing la dpe' byang bzang por mdzes par rnas par bye ba'i rgyan gyis brtan pa'i ser mo dang ldan par gyudad cig/ sems can thams ca sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjos su byed pa'i snang bar bya ba la martson 'dra zhiba'o / 
61b10(1): ze ki dra ba'i mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa'i sor mo dang ldan par myu rang ni/ sems cad thams cad sor mo shin tu mdzes pa dra ba legs par 'brel pa dang ldan zhing / song mo legs pa dang ldan par gyu rad cig ces de ltar
62a1(1): / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo slong ba rnams la/ sor mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i sems kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa
62a2(1): khapa de dag thams cad sems can rnams la yongs su sngo'o/ gzhan yang byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa/ la la zhig gis chos thos par bya bar bsams te/ des 'di skad du gal te khyod kyi
62a3(1): sha dang bcas pa'i sen mong byin ni ngas khyod la chos bstand par bya ba'i zhes zer ba zhig yod na/ de la 'di skad smras te/ bdag gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo ci bder khyer la/ bdag la chos bstan par mdzod cig
62a4(1): ces nas/ ci ltar rgyal po bapa po phyag tu gyurd par legs par bshad pa tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpal zad gyi shes pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' gzhan chad byed pa/ chos
62a5(1): kyi chos bzang po nyadaHla brtson pa/ 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi lo shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su btadra bar gyu dad par de ltar slong ba rnams la rang gi sha dang bcas/ 
62a6(1): pa'i sen mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag sen rab tu grub cing zangs kyi kha dog lta
62a7(1): bu'i sen mo lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad po dpe' byad bzang po'i sem so rab tu thob cing / mdog snus pa'i sen dang ldan par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo dam par
62a8(1): ldan zhing / 'od 'tsher ba'i sen mo dang ldan par gyu rad cig/ sems cad thams cad sen mo bzang po dang ldan zhing thams cad mkhyend pa'i phyag sen mo rab tu thob par gyur rad cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten
62a9(1): thams cad kyis kyi gos shing / mtshungs pa myed pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad kyis 'od kyis snang bar bya ba la ston zhing shin tu rgyan pa'i sen mo dpa ldan par gyur rang sems can thams cad
62a10(1): nyams pa myed cing rnam par dag pa'i sem mo gapa' dang ldan par gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes che zhing / sangs pa rngas par dag pa dang ldan zhing ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mtshan dang ldang pa rgya byin
62b1(1): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par sbyin pas rnam par dag cing ma rjes par skyes pa'i sem mo dang ldan par gyu da gcig/ sems can thams cad 'od gzer kha dog mtha' yus pa rab tu 'byed pa'i mdzod de
62b2(1): ldan zhing de mgon po thams cad mabyed pa'i phyag sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa'i phyim sen mo dang gang bcas pa'i yongs sul gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i
62b3(1): rtsa ba de dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spu dang phyag sen mo rgyan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thogs pa myed pa'i stobs kyi mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// / dum bu gnyis pa/ bam po bdun pa
62b4(1): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi don tu chos 'tsho ba ba lhur len pa shin tu dkon pa'i chos tshol ba la zhugs pa la chos gtor ba'i gzag la las mye'i rlabs su lus zhug par byas
62b5(1): 'di skad du gal te khyod kyi 'greng mdun du brkos pa'i me'i rlabs su mchod/ 'bod da/ ngas khyod la chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o// zhes nas de la byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sma de thos nas shin bu dag
62b6(1): ning mid bde ba dang rab tu 'dun pa'i yid skyes nas 'di bye snyam du se mas te ngan song thams cad dang mnad myed pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba dang yang sngo zhing bag gis dam pa'i chos btsal dgos na 'di ltar phyi'o/ 
62b7(1): mye rlabs su 'chod pa tsam gyis dam pa'i chos rnyed par gyur da na lta/ kye ma de ltar dkon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lta bu myed par myi'i mye rlubs tsam du mchod pas rnyed pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar
62b8(1): che'o ltas nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis myi 'greng bdun du brkos pa'i mye'i rlabs su mchongs par gyis// khyod lhas kyis bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad du gsol zhes nas da/ de ji ltar rgyal po legs par bshad pa tshol ba dang
62b9(1): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs myed pa dag gis kyang mye'i rlabs su mchod pa byas pa de ltar chos kyi don tu sdug bsngal ba gyi tshor ba thams cad dang / 
62b10(1): bsngo ba'i lus kyil bye'i rlabs su mchod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las shin tu bying
63a1(1): myi rtog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te ga thams cad mkhyen de pa'i gnas dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad myod par 'gyur te / ga yang sa thams cad las kyi
63a2(1): ldog par gyur do cig sems can thams cad 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag tsha ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan pas sbyi ra cig/ sems can sems cad bde ba dang yi de bA dang / chos thams cad rgyan rab tu thob cing / 
63a3(1): chos tshol po la brtson par gyur cig/ sems bcan thams cad skye gsum rab tu zhi bas gnas pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ngan song gi lam thams cad dang shind tu bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad
63a4(1): kyi bde ba'i rnam pa rab tu thob ste/ yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad me gsum dang bral zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zhi bar gyur da cig/ 
63a5(1): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i dga' bas yang dag par spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi bde ba rab tu thob par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thos
63a6(1): cad mnyam pa byed pa la rab tu gzhol zhing na shin tu thos pa'i chos can du thun cig/ sems can thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyikyi rjes su shin tu song la'i chos dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i
63a7(1): mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos tshol zhing mye'i rlabs su mchongs pas/ yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
63a8(1): de dag sems can pags cad kyis sgrib pa'i las dang smod pa'i mthar phyin cing le shes kyi bye shin tu rdzogs par bya ba'i khyod yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos kyi phyin
63a9(1): sdug sngal gyi tshor ba thams cad bdag gi lus kyis chod bzod par byed cing dam pa'i chos rjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las ston pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gsal bar byed pa dang / bla na myed pa'i
63a10(1): ye shes kyi phung po'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dang / stobs bcul brtson par byed cing / thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa yangs par byed pa dang / chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi phung po la kha dag mngon
63b1(1): rgya 'thun par yang dag par lta zhing sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dge pa dang gnas par byed pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul thams cad la rab tu 'dug pa dang / ye shes chedan po brtson
63b2(1): zhing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yong su srung ba'i che ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos bzang po chos nas/ rgyal po shugs chen po 'dzin pa dang / dem yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan chad byed pa dag gis kyang rje
63b3(1): ltar spyad la bzhin du/ de sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gcig ma yin pa nyams su 'bab pa dang / sdug bsngal tshor pa'i gnod pa rnam pa snga 'chogs myong ba dang / sdug bsngal gi gnod pa thams cad dang phrad par rang gi lus kyis nye bam
63b4(1): min cing bzod par byed pa dang / dam pan chos spong pa'i gang zag sesas gtum pa can/ sdig pa'i kyis sgribs pa mang bdud kyi las kyi byin gyi rlabs pa dag las/ sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa de dag thams cad nye bar len
63b5(1): cing bzod par byed pa de'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar das pa'i chos shes par bya ba'i phyin yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa/  ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'de ba'i nan tan gyis mngon par shes pa'i
63b6(1): rgyung dang ldan zhing ga sdug bskas pa dang byi de bayongs su byas cad par gyur cig/ sems can pags pad bde ba'i rnas ga masas cad sa tu thob pa gsas pa sdugasas kyi tshom pa thams cad dang bral dang
63b7(1): cig/ sems can thams cad myig g.yor lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob cing / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad 'gags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod pa'i mthar phyin te/ sdug sAl gi bu
63b8(1): brtson da nas phyir ldog par gyu rad cig/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi lam rgyud dang / gtse ba thams cad las phyir log cing bde ba'i las mthong bar gyur ba cig/ seMs can thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad
63b9(1): shin tunas par chad pas/ chos kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba'i rnas pas gis tu brtan par gyudan cig/ sems can thams cad pan chun du zhe phyi sdang zhing byams pa rab tu thob pas sdug bsngal las sprol par gyu dad cig/ seM
63b10(1): can thams cad 'tshod pa'i mas sa cang na yod pa'i sdug bsngas rab tu byang zhing gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i nan mthong bar gyur cig / sems ca thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mams cad kyis lus la san
64a1(1): 'argyang na'adra 'byed ngam bde sarnas par dag par nga ldan par gyud dacig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bsgribs pa byed pa'i mamar byin te/ bde ba'i phyid pa thams cad chus tu zon
64a2(1): pabapar gyur da cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi phyin/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad bzod par byed cing / nyams su les pa'i che/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cadas
64a3(1): sa las bsrung zhing / thams cad mkhyend pa'i rnam par tha dad pa bsgribs pa myed pa la rab tu bkod pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos btsal ba la shin tu bachos pa/ 
64a4(1): chos kyi tshig dang /  yi ge 'khor ldam yang dag par len pa 'das pa dang / sA byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bcal ba dang / rjes su dran pa la gnas pa/ chos kyi dga' bas spro nang / thos pa'i
64a5(1): sems dang ldan pa/ zad zing myed pa'i chos rab tu btsal ba la brtson la 'jig rten pa'i rgyal po'i srid dang / skyid pa'i ldan ljin thas sla rnam par 'das pa/ sang so rgyal srid dang / chos kyi skyid pa la mngon par mos pa
64a6(1): 'jig nyen gyis dga' ba thams cad kyis mgos pa'i yid kyis byed par ldan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' sems shin tu spel pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod bzang cing dang bral ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i spros pa skye
64a7(1): sangs rgyam gyims pa gdas pa ba tums ma dzin par zugs pades rgya mama'i yang jug pani/ mamen pa'i srid rnam kyis rgan khrig tu rgong de yul dang / bram zum pa zas khrig skyong dang / skye bo rnams
64a8(1): ga ba/ bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / skye bos rgyas pa'i khyim ma gyis gang la bza' zhing ra 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtse zhing dga' ba mi bya ba'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ chu klung yid du 'od pa sna tshogs dang / grib gi/ 
64a9(1): dang / bza' shing mdangs dga' bas shin tu rgyan pa/ 'khrug long byed/ cing shin tu bde ba/ gzham gi khams shin tu bcom pa/ bdag gi/ kham su lha nyams pa myed pa/ gser dang rim po che'i mdzod dang / bar ba bye ba
64a10(1): khrag khrig brgya stong gis rgyad pa/ bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / chung ma'i 'khod sna tshogs yod pa/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang rna rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dngang pho brang chon po
64b1(1): ba de ltar bu chos kyi dod dang gang chos bcal ba'i phyir/ tshig dang yi ge 'bru cig gi don du yang rgyal ze'i srid snying po sbyid pa las snying po bskyed cing chos la dgon pa'i 'du shes rab tu bskyed nas/ 'gro ba nga
64b2(1): don tu/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thard pa bsgribs pa myed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i las rnam par dag pa tshol zhing ji ltar byang chub seMs dpa' mthu' chen dpal dang / rgyal po khyad par dpal rab te de ma yin
64b3(1): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis kyang ji ltar spyad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du yongs su btang bar bya ba'i sa chen po rgyam mo'i mthar drug pa yongs su btang ba'i rtse/ mo thasal pa sa yang dag par bsdus
64b4(1): pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su po ste/ dge 'a'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad lag shin tu me lam gto ma tho ga pa me mngon pa mo su shing shin tu yangs pa'i gtong ba dang ldan par byedad cig/ sems kyin
64b5(1): thams cad 'byor byed pa myed par sbyin pa'i bdag por byur te// gtong ba'i thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad lus dang / srog dang / yo byad la myi lta bas tshon
64b6(1): kyi chos la yid dga' ba rab tu thob cing chos la mngon par dga' bar gyur da cig pa/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i sems chen pos spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chang byed pa rnyed pas lus dang / 
64b7(1): grog dang / 'jig rten gyi skyid pa yongs su gtong bar gyu rang cig/ sems can thams cad lus/  dang srog la gyi lta zhing kyi dga' mjur drug pas/ chos kyi dga' ba dang / mthar thug pas/ chos kyi rim 'gro dang
64b8(1): sring nu rab tu thob par gyun cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos shinang tu dkon pa mnyan pa la brtson zhing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang dran dam 'dzin par gyurd cig/ sem sa man thams cad byangs
64b9(1): sems dpa'i spyod la gzhan gyi dring kyi 'jog pa'i sa par phyind cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sdang pa rab tu thob par gyun cig/ sems can thams cad brnyes pa'i yid kyis the tsom gyi zug rngu dang bral zhing / sangs rgya
65a1(1): kyi chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa mang par mya dang cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad gyi don tu chos btsal ba dang
65a2(1): chos thams cad kyi don dang / de bde ba'i lam gyi ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngol/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sebs dpa' chen po chos kyi dbang phyug byed cing klog gcu spangs pa la/ sems
65a3(1): can rnams rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'dzas bu'i gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho khrang khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad kyi zhen pa dang / gsad pa'i gnas thams cad du rnam par gcod pa dang rkang
65a4(1): gnyis pa dang / ker bzhi pa dang / ri dgas mang po la myi 'jigs pa'i sgri ba byed pa dang / lhod pa byed pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang / 'khon byed pa'i sems kyis rgyal pos srid
65a5(1): thams cad la gnas pa dang / semasu myi bde ba dang / sdug sngal bams cad sel pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bde bar byed pa'i rin po che skyed pa dang 'gro ba thams cad ring po che dang 'dra ba'i bsam/ 
65a6(1): ba rin po cher ba tu bsgrub pa dang / spros pa gsum rnam par dag pa la bdag gnas shing / gzhan rab tu 'dze ga pa'i tshe/ grod khyod tu de gcod pa spangs pa dang / bslob pa lnga la sems can rab tu gzhan tu
65a7(1): bas/ yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems cad thams cad byang chub ses dpa' sems so so la thob cing / srog gi dbang po gcad
65a8(1): du byed pa dang / che ring zhing shes rab the za bar thob par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe dang ldan zhing tshed bag tu myed par rgyu red cig/ sems can bas
65a9(1): cad gzhan gi/ gnod pas srog 'gag par gyi 'gyur zhing / gni myed pa'i chos la rab tu brtson par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad che ji srid du 'dod cing / bsam par gnas la mkhas shing nad myed bzhi
65a10(1): lus dang ldan par rgyu dang cig/ sems can thams cad phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye ba brgyam/ byang chub sems dpa'i daspyod pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su ru sbyin par bya ba dpa
65b1(1): 'dul ba la zhugs te/ tshe 'gag pa myed par gyur da / sems can thams cad bstobs cu'i dge ba'i brtsa pa yang dag par brtsegs pa 'byung gnas su 'gyur cing che'i ro 'dzid da par gyurd cig/ sems
65b2(1): can 'ams cad tshe'i man 'gag pa byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khasas pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyu dad cig/ sems can pas cad chen
65b3(1): cha zang gyi nas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la rtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad mdzad pa dang mnyes par bya ba'i dus dang mnyam par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu
65b4(1): thob cing / srog gi dbang po 'gag pa myed pa dang / 26/ 'phags pa'i skye mched la bslab par bya ba'i shin tu bslabs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu' stobs dang / brtson 'grus rban
65b5(1): byi zhes pa rab tu thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dag bsgyur ba la rab tu 'jog pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba skyed pa'i che phun sum tshogs par gyur da cig ces de ltar byang chub
65b6(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems canathams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs ma'i ye shes kyi shin tu rdzogasabar 'gyur ba phyir/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / sdom
65b7(1): ba gsum rnam par dag pa lta tu 'god pa'i phyir yongs su sngol/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byol song gi skye gnas su gyur da pa// rkang bzhi pa dang / phyir gyurd pa rnams kyi
65b8(1): po mtshan gcad par gyudad cing skyes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral bar gyur da pa/ skyes bu'i dpe se po zhig par gyur pa pa/ nyung chum gyi dngos po la gzhag sha bar gyu rad pa/ lus gdod pa shin tu phyi zad pa
65b9(1): gyu rang ba/ mthong ba dang / skyes pa'i dadza ma bas// klog par gyu rad pa/ pos mos gnyis ka ma yin pa'i skye gnas gzhag par gyu dad pa/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor pas man par gyu rad pa// lus kyi bde ba
65b10(1): shin tu gzi dad par gyu rang pa/ skyes par tshul gyis dpa'ag pa tsam bu mya rang ba/ brten pa'i lus 'gag par gyur pa pa dang / sems cad thams can gyi gnod pa'i rnams pa de lta bu dag byang chub sems
66a1(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mthong na/ byams pa chen pos sems can rnams yongs su skyob cing / snying rje chen po sngon tu btang ste/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pas/ 'dam bu'i gling
66a2(1): gi skyes pa las nyams papa 'gyur pa thams cad rnam par zlog go/ rab tu rgyun gcod do// yongs su skye ga ze/ rnam par chad par byed do// chos 'thun pa'i mdzod dang / ba pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya song dag kyang gtor
66a3(1): nang tshig 'di skad du rjed de/ khyed kyis gang gi phyir ldog pa'i las rnam pa 'di lta bu bya bar gyu rang pa de'i bde ba dang / phan pa'i rnam pa thams cad nges sbyar gyis sdig pa'i las kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag
66a4(1): tshul bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug par sems skyes pas / bde ba myong ba'i don tu khyed la byed cig/ de ltar pha rol la sdig pa'i las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag byas shing / bdag gis tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni
66a5(1): gnas ma yin te/ de'i gnas myed do// 'di ltar sdig pa'i rnam 'di lta bu la skyed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'o// zhes nas de ma yin pa'i myi dge ba'i chos gzhan dag byed pa mthod
66a6(1): mngaca ma na rtog par byed cing sems can thams cad sbyin pa sa cad mongs su btang pas yang dag la snad do// yo byangs shes cad kyis kyang mngon par srung bar byed do// 'di lta lto dben
66a7(1): ba'i chos la yid ches par byed pa dang / dge ba'i las shin tu bsngags pa dang / kyai grel ba'i las yan tshun du byams pa'i sems kyis pyod pa dang / phan tshun du myi gnod cing myi gtse ba'i phyir legs dra'i
66a8(1): bshad pas kyang shin tu ngoms par byed do// sems can de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas sdig pa'i las de las ldang ngo // rnam par ldog go// myi spyod do// des de ltar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i cha
66a9(1): ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su spro ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gsang nga sbubs ldan 'dug pa dang ldan zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur pa cig/ sems can tham
66a10(1): cad brtson 'grus dang / lhag pa'i byasam pa dang / tshangs pa 'gyod pa rnam par dag pas spyod cing / skyes bu'i mtshan dang ldan par gyu nga / cig/ seMs can thams cad chags myed pa'i dpa' ba'i ye shes pa
66b1(1): yang dag par gnas las myi ldog cing shin tu rten pas dbang sgyur pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i dga' bas myi zlogs myi chags pa'i sems dang ldan par gyu dad cig/ ses
66b2(1): can thams cad smad pa byed par thams cad mkhyenas pa 'i byes pa'i ye shes bzang po dang ldan zhing / skyes bu dam pa dang ldan par gyund cig/ soms can thams cad stobs bcu 'byung / ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
66b3(1): zhing / skyes bu chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig sems can thams cad rmad du byung ba'i tshogs la gnas pa rab tu thob cing / dus thams cad du skyes bu'i dbang po nyams par gyurd cig/ sems ca
66b4(1): thams cad khrims gsum thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang blas dpang spyan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga 'i yon tan gyi dga' ba la ma chags pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa
66b5(1): byed pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cada'agro ba kun kis gling yid ches pa dul pa dang ldan zhing skyes bu mkhas pa'i dam par gyu rad cig/ sems cad thams cad skyes
66b6(1): bu dam pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa tshuskye ba thob pa'i ye shes kyi skye ba thob pa'i tshe gnas dang / rigs la yang dag par brtson pa/ skyes bu khyad par 'phags pa'i
66b7(1): dris shes pas pang dag pa gyid pa/ skyes bu'i tshul bdun sa dag pa mthong ni rtogaso pa/ skyes bu'i mju rtsa' de ladang / skye tham bu' mas kyis ci byung mni ba
66b8(1): sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa'i skyes bu'i mthul rtsal dang / dpa' ba'i sa la dang / rtan pa'i skyes bu'i mthu' rtsal gyis yang dag par bzung ba de skyes skyes bu'i dbang po bcad pa myed par byas pa dang / skyes bu'i dbang po brtan pa
66b9(1): byas par yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu mthul rtsal yongs su dag pa/ rab tu thob par gyur pa dang / mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bur 'grub
67a1(1): par yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du grags par byed pa dang / kye ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten du
67a2(1): la'abyung ngo // kye sa sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog cing / sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kun tu grags par byed cing pa dang / sems can gyi nga rgyal dang / bag myed pa dang / spros pa thams cad rnam par
67a3(1): zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar sems can rnams yang dag par stobs dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems can rnams rab tu gzhog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la gzhol bar byed pa dang / 
67a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi dmyigs pa la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad la rim gro byed pa dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rtog pa/ sems can rnams la ston pa dang / sangs rgyas rjod pa la/ sems can rnams yang dag/ 
67a5(1): bar gzung ba dang / bskal pa bye bar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga skye ba ni shin tu dkon no zhes bya ba'i tshig sems can rnams la rjod pa dang / sems can de dag gis kyang de'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur da/ 
67a6(1): pa dang / sangs rgyas la rim 'gro dang zhes byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgya bams can gyi mtshan nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas grangs byed pas/ 
67a7(1): shin gru bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ba gyogs pa dang / grogs chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs skyed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gter nas len ma spyong ba dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs byed pa/

67b1(1): shin tu mang bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad/ chos mnyan pa dang kyi bral zhing bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra 'byin par

71b9(1): ba job par gyu rang cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la ba dag yongs su bta slar dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / 
71b10(1): sems can thams cad kyis bla na myed pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa thob pa dun bya ba'i phyir yongs su sA ra/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad la dring bu gzo' ba'i sems/ 
72a1(1): bskyed pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ring/ ma 'gro bya ba dang / bu ltar bsam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams/ 
72a2(1): khacad la sems 'od snang zhing dang par byin kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes las bdag phyir log par bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas rigs su gtogs par bzang ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dpa 'thun par bzung sa/ 
72a3(1): dang / bdag bdud kyi yul las ring du bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos par bya ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du byin kyis rlabs pa dang / de lta bu'i chos la brtson par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
72a4(1): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad la/ 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i 'dis/ sems can thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas
72a5(1): gyur te/ sems nye bar brtan pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur da cigasems can thams cad sdig to'i las thams cad la zhe sdang zhing cad shes dngas du dag par 'grogs par gyur pa cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu bzung
72a6(1): ngam ches can su byad chen gyi byed pa min mos deng ldan par byu cin/ semasas cam mas cad dbang srung ba'i byang chub ses me pa'i sasong / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slobasar gyu
72a7(1): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongasasu bzub par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub semasad pa'i chos skyon myed pa la yang dag par spyod pa ning / sangs rgyas
72a8(1): thams cad dang mthun par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su lung bstan pa'i phyir sengs rgyas dmyigs pa dang ldan par gyu dad cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
72a9(1): dab sbyar zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag lus par gyurd cig/ sems can thams cad les pa myed pa'i les mdon par 'du byed cing // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nye bar bzung bar gyurd cig/ sems cad
72a10(1): thams cad ye shes kyi spyod pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtsod zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad la snyen/ bkur byed pa'i dam par gyurd cig cig ces de skar byang chub sa sadapa' sos dpa' chen rje
72b1(1): de bzhi gshegs pa'i rim 'gro byed pas/ yang dag par bzud pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub se ngon tu gyu dad pas yongs su sngo'o// 'jig rten thams cad yongs su spyos pa'i sems kyis
72b2(1): yongasu sngo'o// khams gsum ma thams cad las byung ba'i sems kyis yongs sngo'o// gnod pa myed pa'i rgyud kyis yongs su sngo'o/ chad myed pa'i byang chub yangs pa thob pas yongs su sngon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang
72b3(1): bar byas pa'i shes zam pangs su pa'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu bzus pa sa yongs su sngog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs pas yongs su na'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chom pa sa
72b4(1): sa yongs su spo/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa la gcig tu byas te yongs su pa'o cinas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du rud par bya ba'i phyir 'byin
72b5(1): babyed pa'i sems shin tu rdzogs pa pa'i gyur badri dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o dus bu gnyis pa'o// bas mo/ brgyad pa// 'di ltar yang bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
72b6(1): nga po yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par 'das pa// rgyal po'i srid la zhen pa'i bsam pa myed pa/ ma chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyi pas mchings pa/ rgyal po'i srid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa/ yon
72b7(1): bzung gal gyi gnas pa/ ma gtod pa gtong ba// dbang phyugs kyi chags pa/ gnod pa skyed pa'i las dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba ldasag pa de/ rgyal po'i srid yongs su gzong ba'i tshe
72b8(1): rgyal po'i srid byin pas yang dag par gzung ba'i/ dge ba'i brtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas kyang las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la ye brngam pa myed pa'i de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su sngo'o// ci nas kyang

72b10(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gnas la/ gnas kyi 'du shes myi skyed pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// ci nas/ kyang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la mngod par zhen pa byed pa de ltar
73a1(1): dge ba'i ma ba de dag yongs su sngo lnga'o// ci nas kyas byinang gyi chos thams cad du lus la gnas pa'i sems kyir skye ba de ltar dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su g+sa \u0f89\u0fa4/ cings kyang byang chu 'i
73a2(1): raba'i spyod pa'i thams cad la rmo nges par myi 'gyu da pa de ltar dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngol/ ci nas kyang dge khri shes gnyen thams rling du myi 'gyu rang ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// ci nas
73a3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i baspyod pa chen po'i smon lam la nyams par gyis 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su tsA na/ ci nas kyang dge bri shes gnyen thams cad ma dong bar mnyes par 'gyur ba ba de ltar dge ba'i
73a4(1): rtsab de dag yongs su stso'o// gzhan yang 'di ltar yongs su sngol ste/ rgyal po'i srid byin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug gi ras 'jo ba ste/

73a6(1): can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis/ sangs rgyasakyi chos rab tu brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal srid chen do//  la rab tu gnas par gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad

73b7(1): ma rab tu gzhol bar sems bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dbang rgyags shin tu brtson pa'i bsam pa dpe//  ai shes la dbang spyad pa thob pa'i yid kyi dbang po dang/ yon ta thams cad rnams khar sbyor ba'i

73b10(1): kyi spyod pa'i smon lam gyi myi dpa/ yul du bcas dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par rgyan pa thams cad gtang bar/ yongs su btang bas slong ba rnam la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/

77a10(1): mngon par chags pa byed pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ phyogs dang yul thams cad la gnas pa myed par gnas pa phyis dang gnas la gnas pas rtsom bai myed pa yongs su gzung ba thams cad sbyin par shin du bdapa

78a3(1): ma mtha' yas pa yan dag par skyed par shin tu stond pa dang / bdag khams gsum thams cad na chos dkar po skye ba'i sgor myu rang yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bdag 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dag sa

78a5(1): du 'du dang tan byeng dang / bang po 'bas gtsun khams cad na ye res kyi 'byung banas sa gyu rang par rab tupa dang / bdag sems cad gyi khams 'ams pa po byang gyi kyi
78a6(1): 'brel par rab tu gzhog pa dang / bdag smon lam thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma 'dra bar skyed par yang dag par bsgrub pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i kha'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi skyon gyis skyo

79a1(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing ki ra brtse ba dang / dka' ba dang ljongs khyod kyi gnas yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa la de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas mas cad kyi bzal shing ra pha rol pa'i

81a1(1): masras pas brnas pa yang dag par sta rnams cadas pan 'anags par byazas byung sangs su bya'/ sangs rgyas kyi cang nus mams ca sazum pam ma dang pan char rgyabar bya bas/

82b4(1): zing su byi po'o/ bsams pa yongasu kyi sngo'o// sems yong su myi tsA na/ sems byed pa yong su phyi 'o// de de ltar yongasu sngo ba'i sa nang la mngon par chags pa skyed do// byi drob lang mngon par chags pa byed do/ 
82b5(1): rkyed la mngon par chags pa skyed do// dmyigs pa la mngon par chags pa myed do// rgyu la mngon par chags pa myed do// rgyu 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa myed do// chos nyid la mngon par chags pa byed do// sems pa/ 
82b6(1): la mngon par chags pa byed do// bsams pa la mngon par chags pa byed do// de de ltan yongasu sngo ka'i che / gzugs la chags pa byed do// gzugs te mang len dpa lnga chags pa byed do// gzugs 'gog rjes
83a1(1): chags pa myed do// tsho pa la chags pa byed do// chor pa nye 'a send pa la chags pakhyed do// tshor pa 'gog pa la chags pa byed do// 'du shes la chags pa myed do// 'du shes pa nye bar mend pa'i la
83a2(1): chags pa myed do// 'du shes 'gog pa la mngon par chags pa byed do// 'du byed la chags pa byed do// 'du byed nye bar len pa la chags pa byed do// 'du byed 'geg pa la chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa la chags pa/ 
83a3(1): med/ nam pa shes pa pa bya brnapa lags pabyed pa rnas pa shes pa bsos pa byam pas byed do// nga de sa sus mams byed pa / dgagasugs pa 'isas da/ rdzum bye
83a4(1): byed do// gzugs kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa myed do// chod pa la bcings pa myed do// tshor pa'i skyed pa la bcings pa myed do// tshor ba'i 'gag pa la bcings pa myed do// 'du shes la bcings pa myed do// 'du shes kyi skye ba la
83a5(1): bcings pa byed do// 'du shes kyi 'gag pa la bcing ba myed do// 'du byed la bcings pa myed do// 'du byed kyi skye ba la bcings pa myed de// 'du byed kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa myed do// rnam par shes pa la bcings pa
83a6(1): byed do// rnam pa shes pa'i skye ba la macings babyed do// rnam pa teshes pa'i 'gan pa la bcings pa skyed dang / gang chos de dag la ngas pabyed pa deni chos thams cad rtabs pa byed pa skye/ deci'i byor
83a7(1): zhe na/ chos gang chos la 'dzin pa 'am/ chos gang la chos kyi chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu'i skyes pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba'i gang yang myed do// de yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang / 
83a8(1): bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin te/ gcig pa yin no// gnyis ma yin no// mang po ma yin no// tshad myed pa ma yin no/ su phra ma yin no// mang po ma yin no// dma' ba ma yin no// yangs pa ma
83a9(1): yin no// zab pa ma yin no// gsal ba ma yin no// zhib ma yin no// spros pa ma yin no/ gnas pa ma yin no// gnas myed pa med yin no// chos ma yin no// chos myed pa ma yin no// bsgom pa ma yin no// bsgom pa
83a10(1): myed ma yin no// yod pa ma yin no// byed pa ma yin no// de de ltar chos myed pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams la rnam par ltas te/ chos kyi tshig gi lam la gnas pas/ chos ma yid zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su rmyi
83b1(1): ga da bgyis sa na da par byagyur/ kyang sa sems dpa sa gyud pa yang nas par dgas par bye byed de/ mas cad mnyed pa nyid kyilas kyang byed phyagags/ rnapas rdza bku
83b2(1): cig no/ rnab sna lhan dang 'dra bar 'du dag bdagarig par gyi byed do// sems can du 'ang pas kyang rlom sems kyi byed do// chos thams cad dus dang ma nyam pa yang yang dag pa cis pa bzhin du shes ci
83b3(1): rnams kyi rtswa'i mthu dang yang gags par gyi byed do// las la gzhos par yang rab tu 'dug te/ chos rnams mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa'i las la yang rgyun gyi nacod da/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngos
83b4(1): gang gi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu 'gro bas thams cad mkhyen dra pa nyid thams cad du yongs su bsngo zhing / thams cad las ldog par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir/ yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya bya zhen/ 'di ni 'dzin
83b5(1): rtes khas pha rol du gyu dad pas na/ de'i phyir pha rol ces bya'o// phung po las gzhan du 'gyur bar byed pas na/ de'i ljongs su na sngo ba zhes bya'o// tshig gi lam las gzhan du gyu rad pas na/ de'i phyir
83b6(1): 'ongs su pa zhes bya'o// sems cad kyi 'du shes pa tshogs las pa rolas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o// 'din tshogs mang po las gzhan du gyu da pas na/ ra'i khyim mongs du shAn/ Tha
83b7(1): shes bya'o// mngon par 'du byed pa las gzhan gyu da pas na de'i phyir yongs su sngo ba zhes bya'o// srid pa las gzhan du myud pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba ba zhes bya'o// nye bar len pa las gzhan du gyund par na
83b8(1): ngas su tho pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gi chos las gzhan du gyu rang pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su ma pa zhes bya'o// de de ltar yongs su bsngo bsu sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba yin/ chos kyi rjes su song ba yin/ 
83b9(1): ye shes kyi smra sor ba yin/ byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin/ don gyi rjes su song ba yon/ yongs su sngo ba'i rjes su song ba yin/ spyod yul gyi/ rjes su song ba yin/ spyod pa'i rjes su song ba yin// rang
83b10(1): bzhin gyi rje su song ma yin/ rnam par dag pa'i rjes su spong ba yin te// de de ltar yongs su spobs chos shes par bya baSh+Ti thams cad khong du chud par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba yang
84a1(1): @// yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas gang yang thugs 'byung bar byas pa in/ chos gang la yang myi thun par byas pa myed byed pa yin/ chos gang yang chud zan pa myed pa yin/ chos
84a2(1): gang dang yang 'gal bar byed pa byed pa yin ga dngos po gang yang byams par byed pa myed pa srid/ chos gang yang bor ba myed pa yin/ rgya gang yang bshig pa byed pa yin/ rkyen gang yang gyi nang gi chos thabs
84a3(1): cad dang 'gal bar byas pa myed pa yin/ yum gyi 'bras bu yang rgyan gcod par gyi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches po rnams kyi yongs su sngo ba drug pa/ dge ba'i cha
84a4(1): pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste/ yongs su bsngo ba des yongs sngo ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / sangs rgyas tshad byed pas byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// snying po
84a5(1): thob pa yin no// chos nyid thob pa yin no// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson pa yin no// donas kyi chos dang ldan pa yin no// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su song ba yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa thams
84a6(1): cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no// smon lam chen po yongs su/ ge rdzogs par bya ba'i rjes su song ba yin no// rdo rje ltar myi shigasapa'i snying po'i rjes su song ba yin no// chos thams cad kyi dbade/ ca
84a7(1): byu ba la dbang sbyar bar rab tu thob pa dam pa'i rjes song ba yin no// / dus bu gnyis par// bam po dgul pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyabam
84a8(1): gyis phyogs bcud bltas te 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings la blta ba dang / dod dang / yi ge dang / tshig la 'jug pa dang / sems mtha' dang dpung myed par yangs pa yongs su bsgom pa dang / 'gro ba
84a9(1): thams cad snying rje chen pos rgyas par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi sems yang dag pas 'brel par bya ba dang / yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis b+ha rlabs pa'i
84a10(1): sus su yang dag par shes par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa thob pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / chos kyis lus kyi rjes su song ba'i gzugs
84b1(1): kyi lus mongs su dag pa yang dag par stonod pa dag byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas 'di 'ad ces smras so// de dag rgyal po'i rigs dang ldan par gyur cing / 'gro bkun
84b2(1): pa rgyal ze dang yong ba/ de dag zil gnon rgyal po 'gro ba'i mchog phan pa'i don tu rgyal po mthu chen 'gyuras / de dag dang ba'i yin du rab gyud cing / 'gro ba kun la dbang sbyar rab thob ste// chos dang ldan par rdzo
84b3(1): rgyal srid spyo// 'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba rab tu byed// do dag rgyal ba'i rigs sman nas dag pas// chos dang ldan par chos kyi 'chod la skor// de dag 'khrug byed rgyal srid stsol byed// phyogs nasas kun nam mtsham
84b4(1): lo byar gyi ldog// de dag yon tad gzugs dang rab tu ldan// elas pa'i blo dang shes rab ye shes sngon// de dag zil non mthu la ldog pa byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma khoms cad rab tu 'joms// de dag rdul khribs nas
84b5(1): par dag pa se/ bzod pa'i sto bas la bsnams pa'i sems kyis gnas/ 'khon 'dzin 'khro ba rnam dag yid gsal bas myal ba rnams kyi chos 'dir rtag tu 'chod// de dag zas dang skom dag sbyin
84b6(1): / gnan nas rjed pams dang thams dang /  bya brgya rten par med // rnas bas pa'i yam 'i snyed gangabyed cing khan pa'i sems kyis de dag sbyi bye ro// de bzhin tu da/ 
84b7(1): 'i gyisas gyu shing // bams bdag pasanasapas sangs paskyed// jig rte sus dag lasbyin pabyed// de dag pas semams padag bye ming// byi 'ang da ga das pa byed pa/ nga kya dang sa kyi
84b8(1): gtong // yin la zhus pa byed pa gang yang byed she mgo yang gtong zhi byig kyang rab tu gtong // lag pa gtor zhing gang de bzhin rkang pa gtong// sha dag gtong zhing de bzhin rkang yang gtong // bsas cad khrus kyang myi dga' byed/ 
84b9(1): gtor/ de dag bang bya shin tu yang sbyar zhing // rigs dang rus dang ldan 'gro ma rgya rje// kha nas lce yangs shin tu rgyang byas shis// slong ba rnams la myi dga' byed par gcod/ de dag dbang phyug shin tu yang sbyar cing
84b10(1): thong ba rnamasas kyi sbyi byis nas cang/ 'a mal ma ba ga ba/ rgyas pa'i lags pa ma bzhin papa 'gyur tho// ma po rgyas bus brtson par byed/ byi da byed kya rgya byed pa byed ni
84b11(1): dbang kya rgyas mi sbyi par cad/ ras kya kyi zin chu da/ khyi dos ma ni gas pa song babyed// kyi phyo ni phra gnyid babyed/ bra ba ma lams pa tsun pa
85a1(1): 'dapa da pas sa/ ma bya ca#// sems can da sasanacad da// bzhas tu byan sa kyi

85a3(1): dam kying// rnam sa ldan pan pa'i sems kyis nis 'a byed// dga' bar byed pa yad dang ldan 'gyur cing / snod du kun na tams rnams med par byed/ minas 'jig rten 'di dag der gyu cing / ci nas las
85a4(1): 'phreng ba lnga ba lbu brgyan dang ldan pa'i/ 'khor dang ldan par de dag rab su dad cing / sa las shing shes pa'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang // phan par sems pakra yid kyis gtor pa'i tshe/ bltos shing re ba'i sems myi 'byung bar
85a5(1): sems can par phyid byang chub ral tu chos// dge ba de la rjes su semasabyed cing // sna tshogs yangs su shing rgya che snre la zhi las/ 'gro ba kun la brtan pa yongs su bsngo/ las la gdas
85a6(1): byed pa gang yang byed// de dag rgyas rgyal srid yangs pa sbyin par byed/ sum dang gyis bcas grong khyer dam pa dang / rgyal ba'i pho brang gnas su bu rad pa dang / khyim dang bza' shing ra ba spyong par byed na/ bskal
85a7(1): pa brgyad yang sus kyang ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i 'jig rten gyi'i gtso ba 'bul// 'jig rten rnams kyi pha'is byin byas shing// 'gro sa sa pacom ston par byed// de dag phyogs brgyam spo ba mang po dang
85a8(1): rnam pa rnachogs mamed pan gyu danas kyang/ spar ba bams ca gin tusas rgyas zhing / shin tu ga 'gyur de bzhin spro bar byed// chus gsu' rgyab bdun gyis ba tho ma pa
85b1(1): thos rgya pas// de dgams das na ga nga/ na pa'i segs sa nam pa gas babyed/ nas nas/  gnas sa kyis bags pas/ se shes rnam gas ngan mongs pa mo/ 
85b2(1): dad pas sa so// da kyi she da song la 'o/ mas sa ras ya nas par rtog pa gyi/ na'ada' kyi gnas par gyi byed de/ byam chu nyin la sa kyang sa ba shes
85b3(1): chos nyid dbyings las 'gal gyi byed do// lus la chags par de dag kyi byed de// sems la 'di de dag gnas par myi byed do// las kyis de dag tho 'jug myi byed de// las kyis ye shes rten la 'jug kyi
85b4(1): byed// 'dam pa'i rlos la rtage bar gyi byed de// ma 'ong mtha'i chos la'ang blo ni gtod kyi byed// de ltar yod la 'ang gnas par gyi byed do// dus gsum kun sas rnam pas dben par skyes// de dag gzugs kyi
85b5(1): kyi pha rol phyin gyur de cing // ror ba 'du shes 'du byed yid rnams dang 'jig rten kun gyi pha ro la phyin gyur te// dag pa de dag dma' sa pa'i yid kyi 'grum/ phung po rnams dang khams la yongs btsal/ Thar+tha
85b6(1): cid// skyes med de bzhin lus kyi rnam pa dang // sems kyi rnam pa nyes lus nas gzigs kyid// byang chub dngos su gang yang kyi rnye do// rtag lanas yang chags par gyi byed do// zad pa la ya
85b7(1): de dag sems kyi 'drago// chos nyid yod pa byed pa ma yin te/ gcig nas gcig tu rgyud las kyang ma lus shes/ sems kyi chu yis byang chub zo myi byed// chos nyid la yang de dag myi gnas te// zhings
85b8(1): dedag gams pa mayin to// nus gsum pas na kya sangs kyin// de ltar byed pa la gdun tu gcig// deg sa pa kun kyis gags dadas// de ga das pasal sanas byed pa byed/ 
86a1(1): pa myed pa ste/ 'gro ba kun tu gang yang 'pho ba myed// chos rnams skye dang gi pho myed par yang // rgyal ba'i chos kyi tshul rnams rab tu rtogs// chos rnams gang gi rang bzhin rnam shes pas
86a2(1): de ni rang bzhin dngos yod kyi rtog te// dngos myed rtog byed de dag rab tu shes/ bde shegs ye shes de dag rnam par mthong // 'gro ba kun dang chos nyid thams cad dang // sems can rnam pa zhing gi rnam pa dang
86a3(1): chos kyi rnam gsus rnams ma lus pa'i// chos rnams mkhas pas gang yang brjod pa myed// chos rnams ma lus gzung bar bye bar byed// ji snyed sems can rgyal bas sangs rgyas pa// de'i chos la'ang chos kyi dngos byed de// de sa
86a4(1): dus dang chos su brjod pa yin// chos nyid kun tu 'gro ba ji 'dra ba// de bzhin de dag yongs su sngo ba byed// des kyang 'gro ba kun las bsgyur byas te// de la kun tu dpa' bo yongs su sngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid
86a5(1): kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste // yongs su sngo badrug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rgya mdam ramu sngo ba// 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ zhes bya ba 'dun
86a6(1): chub sems dpa'i yid dam phyir gyi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan to// thams cad gtor ba'i bzod pa dang ldan zhing rna la gzon pa'i rang tshul can/ bsam gtan 'byas daklas pa rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs
86a7(1): shes rab kyi tshul dang / sa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyis rnam par bye ba'i rtsang ba dang ldan pa yon tam mtha' yas pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rga ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub seMm
86a8(1): dba'i las la rab tu rtsen par yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs mngon par skyo bar de dge ba'i grwa chung ngu nye bar gro nas kyang rung /  dge ba'i brtsa 'a chen po nye bar tshogs kyang rung
86a9(1): dge ba'i rtsa ga yangs pa nye ba phyogs sa kyang chub/ dge 'i rtsa brgya na pa nye yar sogasas su kyang rung / dge ba'i mu rgya byed pa nye gas tshogs kyang rung ba/ dge ba'i za ba snga tshogs mang po rdul sa yan cad nye bar brjo ni
86b1(1): kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du byed pa nye bar mchogs kyang rung // dge ba'is pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa nye bar sachags kyang nga // dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs byed pa nye bar sogs kyang rung / dge ba'i rtsa ba su byed pa nye bar bsos/ 
86b2(1): kyang rung / sangs rgyas dmyigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa la nye bar batshogs kyang chung / chos la dmyigs pa'i dge ba'i ma khartse bar sotshogs kyang chung// tshul de bzhin du dge 'dun la dmyigs pa dang / dge ba'i bzhes rkyen la dmyigs
86b3(1): ba dang / sems can thams cad la dmyigs pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la dbyigs pa dang / legs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems bsgos pa la dmyigs pa dang / nang la dmyigs pa dang / phyi rol la dbyigs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam
86b4(1): pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshogs la dmyigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar brdzogs kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dag la yongs su dpyod pa dang / nye bar gnas pa dang / 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / nye bar tshogs
86b5(1): ba dang / tshogs su bya ba dang / mos par bya ba dang / rnam par spyad pa/ dang / rnam par stond pa dang / rgya cher byed pa'i che ga/ bzod pa'i rna tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa sems dmyal ba'i sgo shin tu gcad la / dbang
86b6(1): zo rgyu bshin tu bsdams pa/ bya ba'i tshul la rab tu zhugs pa/ byin ci log byed par 'gro ba sangs rgyas kyi chos chos thams cad kyi snod du gyurd pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi ni du 'byung sa/ sangs tu
86b7(1): rgyas thams cad kyis byin ba kyis rlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis shin tu gsos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las byubs/ sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
86b8(1): rnams cad yongs su snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin lam kyi rjes su 'brad pa/ rang gi sems kyi go skabs rnyed pa/ 'das pa dang / ba byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dang 'phras/ sadus
86b9(1): rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad du 'phrang dag par 'bya pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag gi stobs kyis phyung pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis yang dag lam 'bags pa/ mtho ris la chags pa myed pa/ skyid pa/ 
86b10(1): pa yongs su 'din pa byed pa mngon par 'du byed pa la rags pa byed pa / de dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngom pomams cad yongs su gro bar byed pa'/ 'gro ba lams cad kyi bsod nam sa gter du byud pa// dasus cad dang
87a1(1): / pa'i nan tan la rab tu zhugs pa/ khazob thams cad dgas pa'i gdugs su gyurd pa// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu nyend pa'i las kyis mngon gyis mngon par 'don pa/ sems can 'ams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa
87a2(1): pa brtan par byed pa/ yul thams cad du yongs su glo ga thams cad mkhyen byang chub kyi sgo rgyun myi chad par byed pa/ ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par 'jugs par byed pa/ lam chen po rnam par spyod pa la rtson pa 'gro ba
87a3(1): thams cad kyis blta na yod pa la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi dri ma spyod pa rab tu sbyin pa'i sems dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par bya ba// sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnam par dag pa
87a4(1): rab tu skyes pa/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur da pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su gyur nga pa/ sems can thams cad/ rnam par dag pa la
87a5(1): yang dag par gzhog pa/ dge ba yongs su bsdu ba la yang dag ban brtson pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byin kyis rlabs dang/ lhag pa'i bsum pa rdul byed pas yongs su gzung ba de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'byor
87a6(1): 'i me/ sems 'di ltar byed de/ dge ba'i ma babyang chub tu sems bsten pas yang dag par 'thung sa dang / bya chub tu sems paskyed pas thasams pa dang / cang chub tu sems 'byes pa
87a7(1): brtan pa dang // byang chub tu se mas pa skyed pa las 'byung ba dang /  byang chubu sems bskyed pas phan pa la zhugs pa dang / 'gro thamams cadag lus pa la snying rdzi bar byed pa dang / mams bdu 'i spyod yul bus hU~M/ 
87a8(1): dag par bsgrubs pa dang / stobs bcul daphyogs par brtsod pa dang / bsgobs bcu'i dbyings su yang dag par bsgrubs pa daT/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de ltar yang dag par bsgrubs pa de dag yas nas mi ma sbyin par byam pa ni/ 
87a9(1): byi ba'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par/ byang chub sems dpa'i baspyad pa spyod pa'i rje/ 'gro ba thams cad la yongs su btang bar bya ba yong su gtong ba'i phyi sems can thams cad la yongs bsngo ste/ sems cad gi
87a10(1): mas mam cad gas/ sems can gcig kyang sa chun pa byed par bya'i/ sems can gcig la ri ga ba de bzhi su/ sems pan mams cad ma lus pa yang yongs su sngo bar byed de// de 'di ltas langs su na
87b1(1): 'jig rten gi khas sa grangs byed pa 'in tha pa 'das su byas pa dang/ dang thabams cad kyis mal par gas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mas grangs byed pa gos kyis rnas par dag cid gags songs su gan pa dang / 'jig rte gyi
87b2(1): khams zangs byed pa/ thos pams cad kyis mid du nang rjinam pas yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mangs skyed pa rgya bsas pa kyis rnam par ma nges shi lbas grub kyi bu rgyas pa dang / 'diganye
87b3(1): zangs byed pa nor bu rin po me mtha' yas pas khyad par du 'phags shing / nor bu rin po ches yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed pa me tog sna tshogs kyis kha dog dum dang ldan par gyu nad cing / me tog/ 
87b4(1): legs cad kyis yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed pa kha zas nim po sna tshogs rnam pa sa dad pa dang ldan zhing zhim po yongs su sun gsum tshogs pa ba/ 'dig nyen gi khams grangs byed pa mer dang / ni
87b5(1): dngul dang / nor gyi dbyig gis dag cing / nor gyi dbyig gis yong du yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa/ da rim po che'i kha dan sna tshogs kyis rgyas cing / lha rdzas kyi gos thams
87b6(1): zad kyil kun tu g.yog te/ grags pas yongs su rgyas pa dgacig rten gyi khas grangs byed pa/ rin po rje sna tshogs kyi ste tshad lan gyis rnas pa sna tshogs su brgyan pathong / rin po che bzod pa
87b7(1): yongs su brgyas pa dang / spong ba re re la gyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin pas ngoms pams kyu rang cig/ rgyun gcod khrir mo gyu da cig/ slob pa gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du slong thams cad ma lus
87b8(1): yongs su gtol zhing nga / slong ba re re kar yang phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par shin tu chis par byed kyang yongs su skye bar ma gyur de cig/ phyir ldog par ma gyur cig/ de yang 'di ltar rgyu myed pa'i sems dang / 'dod cing
87b9(1): sred pa byed pa'i sems dang / rmugs pa 'dod pa myed pa'i sems dang/ 'gyod pa myed pa'i sems dang / bya ngam byed pa'i seMs dang / thams cad mkhyesas pa'i lam la the tsom myed pa'i sems dang / btang
87b10(1): shin tu gtong pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / yongs su smyid pa se smras dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ye shes ya 'a phre dgod// pa'i segs kyis yongs su gtor bar gyur cig/ ces de ltar
88a1(1): sa banas pa mazer kyirgyam macan dang / gshed gcan dang / ga rtson pas gsags pa dang na sa rgyan pacas byed kyis rab tu can byar bangs su gang byin pa byed par gyud kyi/ 'jig byed gyil pas
88a2(1): byed pa/ rta'i rgyal lo bzhin ces bya ba dang 'dra ba/ rta'i rgyan mams cad kyis brgyan pa rin go me'i sdug gu sna tshogs dang yan lag kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis rgyan mel yongs su chud pa'i sbyin 'byed pa bcu rad cig/ 'jig rten gyi
88a3(1): 'ams grangs byed pa bud byed dang / rol mo brdud pa dang / dgrol ba bang yid du 'ong ba'i sbyangs dang ldan pa dang bcas pas yongs su gdu sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed pa bu dang / bu mos gang/ 
88a4(1): ba byang chub kyi sems la gnas shing / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mung zug par slong ba re re la yang yongs su gtor bar gyur dang cig du / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed pa rang kyi lus kyis yongs su bkang ste/ 
88a5(1): byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs shin tu bod pa'i yoras gtor bar gyurd cis / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa rang gi mgos yongs su bkar ste/ bgayod pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bar gyurd cig
88a6(1): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed pa rang gi lus las byung ba'i myig gis yongs su bkang se/ myig byis sbyin pa byed par gyurd cing / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa sha dang rkang gis yongs su bkang ste/ 
88a7(1): spu bsngal gis nyams pa byed pa'i yid kyi dbang pos yongs su gtong par gyu rad cig/ 'jig rten gyi zhes mangs myed pa bdag dbang po'i rgyal po'i snying dang spyod pas yongs su bkang ste/ srid kyi sbyin pa byed/ 
88a8(1): byed par gyurd cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed pa bran dang / las kyis yongs su bkang ste/ btang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / ma 'dres par gtod pa chen po'i sems la gnas pas// slob
88b1(1): ba re re la yang yongs su gto par gyur dacig/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams thams cad sa lus par yongs su bzung ste/ sems can gyi khams bas sa cad las gcig kyang ba chung ba byes par blo bcu ga
88b2(1): ji ltar slong ma thams cad la 'ang de bzhin du sems can re re zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par tshim par byed par gyur da cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu phyi mi mtha'i bskal pa'i ur thug par tshis 'am
88b3(1): byed lnga gyu ma ci/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sgyu ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mumajug pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan pa spyod pacing/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du lnga 'jig rte
88b4(1): khams ches byin byings kyis dkrus pas/ nam sa'i'i dbyings kyimathas gtugs pa thams cad du sas/ snying rje ba chen po sa spangs pa yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang / sems can tham sa cad la sbyi
88b5(1): rde bas sems can thams cadas rim gro byed pa'i che/ de'i rgyas ma bdag gi sems sbyid b.las phyir ldog par ma gyud dacig/ gto pani sems kyis/ me gos gtogs pa mam yang skyo bar ma rgyas
88b6(1): des 'di lta cags pa byed pa'i thams dang / kaud tu gto pa'i thams dpa/ bdag nyid sangs pa'i sems dang / zab lamags sa dang / legs par yongs spyad pa'i sems dang / mngon pang sa zhedas/ 
88b7(1): pa'i sems dang / rnam sa mod myed pa'i sems dang / yid shi tu thul ba'i sems dang / sa khrugs pa'i sems dang / g.yeng bskyed pa'i sems dang / ni rdza che'i rigs shA tshogs thob pa'i sems sa dang / 
88b8(1): las kyi rnam par sbyid pa thams cad ma babyed pa'i sems dang / chos pas can ma lus par mngon par 'chang rgya bar bya ba'i seMs dang / bsngo ched po rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang / don rgya cas kyikon tu rtogs pang/ 
88b9(1): bems dang / phrin man po'i klu dang / sems pa bags padas byed pa'i se shes la dkor pa'i sems dang srung bachen po yang dag par paskyed pani sems dang / mas cad martson pa'i ye shes la 'dug / 
89a1(1): / spyod 'phongs pa byed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// de dag gi sod nams myi zad pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yong su sngo'o// de dag gis bde bar rtogs pa'i bde ba'i thams cad rab tu thob pa
89a2(1): bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngol/ de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' so sred pa la chen po'i las kyi tshogs kyi phyir yongs sngo'o// de dag gi chos thas cad kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// de dag theg pa thams cad las phyir gyi ldog
89a3(1): par bya ba'i phyi yongasasu sngo'o// de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ de dag sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyams pa myed pa'i phyir yong su sngo'o// de dag sems can thams
89a4(1): cad la sems mnyam pas rnam par dag par gyu red pa'i phyir yongs su sngo de na sems can thams cad kyi myi khom pa rnam par spong zhing thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i che/ yin
89a5(1): bde zhing sems rab tu dga' bas yongs su sngon b+he/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / de bAti phyir yongs sde'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam tha'i sems gnas te yangs su sngol// sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i sos
89a6(1): sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba bzlog pa'i phyir btang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su sde'o// sems can thams cad nor thams cad kyis bsdu bzhi phyir btang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad la
89a7(1): no grangs myed par btang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su sngo'o/ sems can thams cad la btang ba mtha' yas pa thams cad yongs su btab ba'i sems la gnas gnas te yongs su thA na/ sems can thams cad la phyi ma'i mtha' bskal
89a8(1): sngo/ sems can thams cad la dngos po thams cad sbyin zhing gtong ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi rjes su grol ba'i gtong ba'i sems la gdas te yong su sngo'o// sems cad thams cad la phan gdanas pa'i
89b1(1): phyir btang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su snga'o// sems can thams cad la nor blo rgya che ba yangs pa gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su sngo'o/ sems can thams cad la ngan pa'i sems la gnas te yongs su tsA 'o/ sems can thabs
89b2(1): cad la logs pa byed par btang pa'i sems la gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad la la ba myed par btar ba'i sems la gnas te yongs sde 'a / sems can thams cad la gobs chen po gan tu bde ba rdo res gtod 'di sems pa gnas
89b3(1): te yongs su sngo'o// sems kyan thams cad la nyi ma ltar snyoms pa'i 'od gzer gyis gtad pa'i sems la gnas te yongs sngol/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub pa'i myi tang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su po'o// sems
89b4(1): can thams cad kyi theg pa chen dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du gyurd pa la gnas te yongs sngo'o// sems
89b5(1): can thams cad dang bsas pa sa dad pa byed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ma / gnas te yongs su pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rma bzhin tu rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su sngo'o/ sems cad
89b6(1): thams cad kyi the com thams cad bsal shing dgag pa la gnas te yongs su ldo'o/ sems can rnam pa rgyad cad ye shes dang yon tan mnyas pas rnas par dag batsha bar 'gyurang bar bya ba la gnas te gnas yongs su tsA mo/ sems can thams
89b7(1): rad kyi mthod nams mas can yongs pa klogs par byab kyi thoms pa la gnas te yongs sra gan/ sems can thams cad kyis myi g.yol la'i ting nge 'din nas par dag slongs su sogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs dra na mo/ sem na
89b8(1): thams cad/ thams cad pa byen pa'i ye shes pa dad pa byed pa la yongs bu sngo bar bya ba la gnas te yongs ldam// sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rnam par 'phrul la mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par byan
89b9(1): la gnas te yongs 'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i cha ba gnas myed pa yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis dras pa dang / ma byon pa pa dang / da skar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad
89b10(1): dran pa rnam par dag par bya ma la gnas te/ yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa la dam pa mngon par skyes pas rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs pa'o// sems cad thams cad kyi bdud las dang sgrib pa dang
90a1(1): #// / bar du gcod pa'i chos thams cad bsaHlang zhing dgag pa la gnas su sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi yon tan gyi spyod pa mtha' yas mngon par skyes pa mnyam zhing / rnam par dag par yongs su rdzogs par gnas
90a2(1): yongs su sde chun sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa rlabs po che yid la bya ba dang / kyi bral bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su sA'o// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba la mgron ba
90a3(1): sems dang / kyi bral bar bya ba la gas te yongs su sngo'o// sems cad thams cad kyis go skabs rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa kha skyod myed pa dang / chos dkar po thams cad kyi mnyam nyid kyi rnam par dag pa yongs su thogs par bya ba la
90a4(1): gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems cadan thams cad kyis shin tu rgya che zhing mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / bsam ba rlabs po che mnyam nyid kyis rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su sngo'o/ sems can thams cad gtong ba'i seMs
90a5(1): rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du bya ba la gnas te yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / nan tan mnyam pa nyid kyisra rnas par dag par bya ba la gnas te/ yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams
90a6(1): cad/ bcom 'grus chen po la phung po dang / brtson 'grus thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa ba'i rgyud chog par bya ba la gnas te yongs su 'phro'o// sems pacan thams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa chen po ra/ 
90a7(1): bya chos par bya sa gnas te yongs su sngo'o/ sems can zas sacad bsam gtan mtha' yas pas rnas par phye ba'i ye shes dang / mngon bar shes pa dang ldan par byas gnas te yongs su zla'o// sems cad 'bas
90a8(1): makyis chos kyi su zhes ras kyim sa tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas lag 'i yongs su zlos/ sems can 'as pa dkyims kyi byongasasapanas sa sadas par dag ci mas kyid du 'ongs tha tshogs // 
90a9(1): pa rnal ma can gyi me pa pa rogs ca nyam pas byab rlog sa shes 'an das ma sa kyi ba la 'dug pas 'das pa chogs par byam sa gnas sas pa rjo
90b1(1): rung ba sas pa 'og byas bad bya mongs sardzogs par kyag shes sems canathams cad kyis zhi nas pa/  dag sa thams cad pa'od bdang / 'dug pa das/ thams pa myo sa ma
90b2(1): kyis 'arig sa bya ba dang / segs can pasas dkyis bsas rnam pasas cad sa bani sa la nyid mongs pa thogs sa na par bya ba dang / sems pa bams cad kyis bstan sa/ dab ca dang / 
90b3(1): rdo dang / bsod nams kyi rgyan rnas par sna rogs tshogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyams kyi rkyed phus gsum tshogs pa'i gsung da sa ga/ 
90b4(1): brgya stong phrag brgyad kyis brgyan pa dang / gsung gyi tshul mtha' yas pa'i yon tan dang / ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i rgyan chags pa/ 
90b5(1): byed pa'i sems kyis mnyam par 'grub par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyad gyi 'phrogs pa thams cad dang/ so so yang dag par rig par mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na myed pa'i
90b6(1): kyi 'jigs pas phywa mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro mnyam pa nyid sgrogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa byed cing phyir myi ldog pa tu bskor bas thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba dang
91a1(1): rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis dus thams cad mnyam pas dus gsum gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i yid mnyam pa nyid yongs rdzogs par bya ba dang / se zhes
91a2(1): can thams cadas sA rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'dong zhing ches bstan pa don gnyer ba'i skye mched mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad las sa cad mkhyend pa'i phan bzhi rim 'gro rtag tu byed par
91a3(1): shes pa'i rjes su 'dod par bya ba'i nab/ sems can thams cad kyis chos thams cad rnam par mthod pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad mthong ba dang ldan pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzos par bya ba dang / sems cad thams cad kyis myi mosas pa'i
91a4(1): las kyi lam thams cad kyi rnam par sbyin pa bsgribs pa myed pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can tham sa cad dbang po thams cad la 'jug pa'i dbang ba'i mngon par shes pa/ 
91a5(1): sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang zla shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems nan thams cad kyis rnam par dbye ba myed pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid gcig cing / 
91a6(1): nas pang dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dkyis dge ba'i lba ba myi 'thun pa myed cing ge 'thun pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams
91a7(1): cad kyis byang nga chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos 'phrul chen blon gyi rdzu 'phrul khong du chud pa rab tu thob pa'i mnyam kha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon ta zad kyi
91a8(1): pa dang / thams cad mkhyedad pa'i bsod nams gcig tu mnyam pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang myi bral zhing / byang chub tu sems skyed pa yongs su
91b1(1): rnams pa nyid mas bu rom sa ngabya ba da / thams cad sas pa kyis bskyed pa'i se pa dang srid pa salas pa sa rkyen bdas pa 'ogs pa bya ba dang / mas can mas ca bya chas 'argyas
91b2(1): macad pathogs pa byed par zhugs te yong du dran par bya ba dang /  sems can mams cad 'jig rten gyi'ams mas cad du dang 'ad gathem gcig su gyu tong byamanyas pa nyid la 'drag par bya ba dang / ses sa pas
91b3(1): cad thogs pa myed par byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus pa thams pa mthar byin par bya bar mnyam pa nyid la nam/ tan byed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis spyod pa gcig pa dang / bya tu
91b4(1): smon las gzus pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis brjod pa gcig dang 'byub ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs na par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' mam sa
91b5(1): cab kyi wAn/ rgyal pa'i bsum la mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyis dge bzhin kya ba shes gnyen thams cad mthong zhing mgu bar bya ba mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba
91b6(1): dang / sems can rams cad kyis byang chub sems rapa'i pyod pa thams cad das / sems can thams cad gsung brgyan gyi gcad pa mnyam nyi yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis banas
91b7(1): babyed par chos sand pa dbyangs kyi yag lag khams cad grags pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis sems dang / shes pa thams cad sems dang shes gcig tu yongasu
91b8(1): sngo ba'i dge ba'i cha ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis rnam par bral ba'i myi byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'aklags pa mnyam pa nyid la sems cad thams cad rab tu
92a1(1): dgod par bya ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par bya dang / sems cad thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams kyis spun mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis rmongs pa byed par
92a2(1): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tha ba bsngags shing yongs su sngo ba shin tu grub par 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par 'chang rgya ba mnyam pa nyid
92a3(1): yongs su khyab cing yongs su rdzogs par bya dang / sems can thams cad kyis 'byung ba thams cad kyi mnyes pa byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes can kyi 'byung ba thams cad stongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems cad
92a4(1): thams cad 'khor gcig rnam par dag pas 'khor thams cad rnam par byedam pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig dang / 
92a5(1): mnyam pa nyid du mdzong pa 'dang ldan par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis lbab ldug thams cad dang / lha grub brjod du myed pa dang / lba ba spyab rdza mtha' yas pa dang / lba ba sbub bu byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
92a6(1): kyimam can ma khongs pa tshogs pa da / mas 'ad nan pa/ 
92a7(1): mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa byas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis rnam par tha dad pagyed pacing nas ma tha dad pa byed cing rnam pa tha dang bral ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang / yon tan mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'o/ 
92a8(1): par bya ba dang / sems pan thams cad kyis chos kyi phyi mnyam pa byed pa'i dge ba'i sa la mnyam pa dang ldam pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dpa' 'askum du legs par dbang srur ba mnyam pa nyid yos su
92a9(1): rdzogs par khya ba dang / sems cad thams cad chus zild kyis/ nom cing / 'du gas zil gyis myi non pa'i sems can thams rgyas kyi ye shes dang / lus rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs bathob par bya ba'i byin
92a10(1): yongs su sngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po snying che ba/ dang ldan pa/ phan par ga' ba'i snying rje chen po can/ sems can thams cad rnam par bya ba la yang dag khar
92b1(1): zhugs pa ga pra dog byed pa/ ses myed pa// rigs dang ldan pa/ rab tu dge ba me pa nyid dang ldan pa/ yangs pa mos pa/ 'khrug pa byed pa/ rnyog pa myed pa/ rab rib byed pa/ khams dang / bas ga bzhin
92b2(1): tugs sa pa'i yid dang ldan pa / drang po drad pa g.yob pa byed pa/ mongs pa byed pa/ mchog tu bya ba byed pa/ 'da' 'a byed par spyod pa'i phyir gyi ldog pa sems cad thams cad la sems mnyam da / chos dgang po'i sto ngan
92b3(1): gyi shugs dang ldan pa mdud pa/ nyams pa myed pa// chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa// sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yang dag par brtson pa/ las ngan pa thams
92b4(1): cad 'gags pa/ dka' thub dang / rtul zhugs chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la yongs su pa sngo ba la mkhas pa/ rtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du spyod pa
92b5(1): sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyi ste/ len pa/ ye ges chen po'i gis yang dag par lta ba'i dge ba/ rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'byung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu nyan pa/ 
92b6(1): sems can thams cad la dge ba'i sa ba yongs su sngo ba sems cad thams cad yon tan rnam par dag pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i pa mnyam pang yongs su bsngo ba/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir dge
92b7(1): pa'i yongs bsdu ba la mkhas pa don gyi rjes su song ba'i khams kyi yom tan mngom par shes pa sems can thams cad dang / mnyam du dge ba'i rtsa la rnam par byang bar yongs su sngo pa// sems can thams cad kyi bsod nam/ 
92b8(1): kyi zhing rmyi rnam pa la/ chos dkar po'i sa bon lta bur gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gyod pa myed par yongs su sngo ba dang ldan pa// sems can gyi khams thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i skal pa yongs su sngo
92b9(1): pas/ yongs su bsngo ba 'dzind pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi skal pa dang shes kyi char 'bebs pas dbyar gyi chus su gyur pa/ yongs su bsngo ba'i rigs dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dge 'di ltar yongs su bsngos
92b10(1): ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde zhing skyid pa dang ldan par 'gyu rad pa cinas kyang sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyurar pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu 'grol bang 'gyur pa dang / 
93a1(1): cinas kyar sems panamams can ma panyid kun pa dang / cinas kyang sems pa mas pa dag tugs pa na pa 'gyun pa dang / rinas kyi sems can dgas pa chos dan dmas nyid du shod pa chu
93a2(1): stobs bcu'i 'dul ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yongs su sngo'o// ste/ de ltar yongs su sngo ba yang las kyi gnas su yongs su gyi sngo'o// rnam par smin pa'i gnas su yongs su myi sngon/ lus kyi gnas su ma yin no// dngos
93a3(1): po'i gnas su ma yin no// zhing gyi gnas su ma yin no// phyogs kyi gsu su ma yin no//  sems can thams cad kyi gnas su li yongs su myi sngo'i / sems can thams cad kyi gnas kyilas gu bu'aphags par yod
93a4(1): yongs su myi sngo'o// mngon 'am zhen pa thams cad las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su myi sngo'o// ste/ mngon gzhen pa'i chos yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs sngo'o/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams
93a5(1): cad la yongs su bsngo zhing / stobs pa 'jig rten thams cad desapar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa/ bsam pa nyams pas sems las su rung bar byas pa/ shin tu dag
93a6(1): shin tu brtags pa// shes rab dang / ye shes dang ldan pa/ nang mnyam par bzhag pa dang ldan pa/ phyi rol gyi dmyigs pa shin tu rtogs pa// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i mthar phyin pa
93a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi rigs zhin tu gsal ba ste/ yongs su bsngo ba des de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i che// chur zil gyis non la/ pas zil gyis myi non pa yin/ yon tan myi zad pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad du/ byang chub ses dpa'
93a8(1): thams cad kyi 'aspyod ga la kha rtson pa yin zhing thams cad la zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang tshogs chung dus myi ga las du snang bar mthong ba yis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa'i myang ba spyod pa
93a9(1): snang la yon te/ cig nab tu bye ba thams cad langasa'as pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyad tu tho ba cing khong du rud do// phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa'i lung thug par rgyun chad pa byed pa'i chos ldanang pa'i daphyir 'khor gyis ga sems can thamamaca
93b1(1): saka daklas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du zhing 'grangs par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la rgyun
93b2(1): myi 'chad pa'i smon las chen po ma ngos par bskur po// 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyob pa dang / stod pa myed pa'i dge ba'i thams cad bsags pa dang // byang chub
93b3(1): sems dpa' thams cad dang / dmyigs pa gcig cing mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpal dang rtag tu rgyun myi chud par 'grogs shing myi bral ba dang // sangs rgyas 'byung ba cing gar bstan pa dang / rang gi sems
93b4(1): bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang mthu dang ye she sa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sa nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes rab tu thob par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams
93b5(1): cad du rnam par rgyu bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs rnyan 'byung ba yang dag pa dar bstan pa dang / skye ba'i sgra nas thams cad du rang gi lus rjes
93b6(1): su 'gro bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po bsam gyis myi byapa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems rapa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa rgyun myi 'chad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings bkrus par bya
93b7(1): che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sathar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i khur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs phra thams cad du skyed pa 'grangs pa thams cad du theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la rgyun gyi chad pa'i
93b8(1): smon las chen mo mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khom lo yang dag par gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i myong myang pa dang / lus dang / dag drang/ yid dkyilas don nga
93b9(1): byab dang / mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi ches gdon gyi za bar zab par bya ba dang / dbyangs brjod ma thag tu ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / dad par 'gyur ma thag tu nyen mongs pa phyir/ 
93b10(1): ldog par bya ba dang / bsam pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu rab tu thob lam par bya ba dang / lus yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu 'thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
94a1(1): mau daM// // thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rnam par smis pa thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa yongs su
94a2(1): rdzogs par bya ba thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'dag pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas
94a3(1): rnam pa cad kyi yul gyis rnam par 'khrus pa yang de dag par bstan pa rnas par dag pa mnyam pa nyid thob pa lta ci smos// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mngon/ sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba'i las/ chus bu gnyis pa / bam tho bcub// 
94a4(1): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa rang chen po yongs su sngo ba 'dis yongs su sngo ba'i che ga yon tan gyi rgyud kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang / yon tan thams cad rab tu rgya par bya ba yongs su
94a5(1): rdzogs pa rab tu thob ste de de ltar yongs su sngo ba 'dis yongs su sngo ba'i tshe sems can rnams zhing dang 'gal bar myi byed do// zhing rnams sems can gyi las dang / 'gal bar myi byed do// sems can gyi las rnams zhing dang 'gal bar bya
94a6(1): byed do// bsam pa sems dang 'gal bar myi byed do// sems bsam pa dang 'gal bar myi byed do// bsam pa dang sems myigs pa dang 'gal bar myi byed do// dmyigs pa bsam pa dang / sems dang 'gal bar
