113a7(1): dgod pa'i ye shes shin grwa dang / byang chub sems dpa'is shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par pa zan dad pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba mngon par bsgrub
113a8(1): bzhis tu bra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gter rab tu thog pa yon tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rnam par myad bags tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshun
113a9(1): las rnam par 'phrul bshin tu phra ba dang / byang chub semed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshul shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems ba'i phyag
113b1(1): rgya shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig gis thob pa la dpar sbyar ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i chu
113b2(1): phreng ni gnas na 'dug pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su da dag pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i 'jig rten dga' ba gnas bzhin tu phra ba dang / bya
113b3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'od gzer gyi dra bar dgyes pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnams par bye ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dra ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba shin tu phra ba dang
113b4(1): byang chub semasad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par shin tu phra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcig gis shi 'pho rnam pa tha dad pa bstan pa shin tu gru ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i aral du 'gro
113b5(1): ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngal du song nas gnas pa shin tu phra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal na rnam par/ 'phrul pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig
113b6(1): par ma'i sto kod pa'i gis zhin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems 'i ma'i mngalan sangs rgyas kyi khyam chog gi sathu' phyang ba tha / cad yang dag pas bstan pa'i ye shes shin tubya pa dang / blang chub
113b7(1): sems dpa'i che shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gos pa bdun gyi seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo'i 'khom gyi nang na thabs mkhas pa yang dag par stan pa
113b8(1): 'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngom par 'byang ba'i tshul dang spyod pa'i rab tu sbyor ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing chung ngu 'dug pa shin tu phra dang / byang chub sems
113b9(1): dpas bdud kyi sde rab tu phas par byas ste/ bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i/ byang chub kyi gdum la 'dug ste/ 
113b10(1): 'jig rten ni khams kham sa cad du 'ong gzer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bzhin tu pA ba dang / de bzhis gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa shin tu pra la dang / de bzhin na gshegs pa'i seng zhe mar mi phyung bas
114a1(1): mya ngan las 'das pa chen po shin tu za dang / de bzhin she/ gas pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i 'khor rtswa 'thogs b+hU grin tu prA ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul bA bsam rgyas kyi khyang
114a2(1): bsapa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu yongs su shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad rgyas pa pa'i gengs pa'i de bzhin shegs pa'i byed kyis rlabs yongs su bstod pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams
114a3(1): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa phyi mo'i sa pa'i mur thug pasargyan gyi chad par shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyim gyis rlabs chos kyi dbyings mthar thug pa thogs pa myed pa
114a4(1): shin tu phra ba dang / nam a ba'i dbyings kyis zas gtugs pa'i zhing gi yul thams cad du sems can gdul bar sangs rgyas skye ba bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad
114a5(1): par rab tu spro ba'i shes bzhin tu phra ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs ga pa dang/ da ltar byung pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de/ dra bzhin gshegs pa'i gang ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyu mchog
114a6(1): gi mju dbyung pa'i ye shes shis tu za pa gang rdo snyed pa de dag rnams cad sems kyi skad ci re re zhing rnam par 'phel ba'i sashes kyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' zung ba #

119a2(1): lam la gnas pa yin / ma byon pa'isangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i lam myi gtong pa yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i lam dang / 'gal bang phyi byed pa yin/ 'das pa'i
119a3(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams rag la nan tan byed par gyur cigi/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdams ngag khong du chud
119a4(1): par byed pa yin/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid bsgrub par myur ba yin/ dbyung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
119a5(1): ya nan tan byed pa yin/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ya yongs su spyong pa yinapa/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la/ rab tu gnas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul dang
119a6(1): mnyam par 'gyur ba yin/ 'das pa pa dang // ma pyod pa'i dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid gcig pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma pyod pa dang / da ltar byub ba'i sas rgyas
119a7(1): kyi rigs thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa thob pa yin/ 'das dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi gno bo thams cad kyi yul dang myi 'gal 'thob pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di yi byang
119a8(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngos pa chags pa myed pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa byed pa'i sems shes pa bya ba ste dgu pa'o// yongs su bsngo ba de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
119a9(1): sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa kha'i thams cad de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ de de ltar yongs su bstobs// khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad kyi gyo mazas pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi thams
119a10(1): zod kyi gzugs khams panam lus pa dang nga bril kyis phyi ngad pa yis / bdun gyi sde dang bdun gyi dadung dang / bdung kyi las bsas cad rab tu 'ardzog pa yid/ 'jig rten gyi 'bras bams pad du byang chum tho
119b1(1): dpam myod pa ma lus par yang dag par bstan pa 'i 'artson pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad la khro bar byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ches thams cad kyi tshig dbye ba la yakhas pa dang ldan pa med/ sangs rgyas rgyam ma mas
119b2(1): la rmongs pa byed pa'i ye shes 'byam byas pa dang ldan pa yin/ gang dang gang drugi 'gro ba dang / bye ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'dug pa thams cang du byi byed bzhin mog 'khor dang ldan ma med/ 
119b3(1): 'das pa dang / 'byon pa'i dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'byung gnas dran pa yang dag par 'dzin pa rnam pa ma dag pa rab tu thob pa yis/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa thams
119b4(1): cad yongs su gzung mal gyi rtsa ba phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i lun thug par babyed pa rgyan kyi chun pa yin/ gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yang rab tu thob mas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun te bza
119b5(1): po'i 'apyod pa dang / smon las yang dag par bskyed pa yang thob pa yin thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi sadzad pa dang / byin kyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i myong ba dang / rnam pa
119b6(1): y-i m+b+hi rna'i gyi tshims su brtas pa 'di na ga smras so// de dag pol gyis gyi nan 'gyur byas shing / 'dra byed de dag phyogs rnas rnamams cad rba// mam rnamamatsho 'arje mdzes su sathal byas pa// 
119b7(1): de ma thas la brnyas pam med kyi byed// badrug gis byas pa 'as gzhan gyis byas pa'i// dge ba gang la'ang brnyam par gyi byed de// da sa nan tu mas pa'i rab bathud cing // de dag sems ca
119b8(1): byi sadas //  / nga la nga 'a ba da / rnamapa kyi ma ldan pas dang // 
120a1(1): sna tshogs ji snyed gang yod tshul// 'gro ba 'di ni tha dad kyi 'dra ba da/ rgya che yangs dang phra mo zab mo rjes// de dag bdag gis yongs brtsams shes par bya// ji snyed 'jig rten yangs
120a2(1): pa 'gro ba'i/ sna tshogs lus rnams lus su gnal 'brud pa// de dag shes byas 'apyod pa myed pa'i tshe// se shes sgo las phyir rdzogs kyu ra cig/ gang yang 'jig rten zhing gi sgo mang ba// pra dang rgya che skye'u chug
120a3(1): snrel zhi dag// sgra'i sbubs su kun kyang bsdu byas te// ye shes sgo nas thams cad shes gyuradacig/ gang yang sems kyi tshul mang gcig myin pa// de dag sems su yang dag bsdu byas te// ye shes sgo nas de dag
120a4(1): zhes byas nas// spyod las ldog pa myed par spyad par bya// 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po bsam pa dag/ rgya che de bzhin shin tu phra ba dag// zab mo sna tshogs ji snyed pasdu byas shing // thams cad rang bzhin ji bzhin
120a5(1): shes bya rang cig la gang yang las kyi rnam pas tshogs pa// rang dpa' bring dang de bzhin tha ma rnams// thams cad ye shes skonasashes byas te// bded gshegs stobs la tu 'jug gyur cig// bdag
120a6(1): gi las gcad yongs su gang brtsegs pa// 'jig rten bskalapa bsam gyis myi khyab pa// ji snyed de dag skad cig sems bdud cing // phyogs rnams kun tu de dag shes gyu rang cig/ ro dus rnams
120a7(1): snrel gzhir dus gsum gzud byas shing // skal pa mnyam pa dang mchad shes nas// de dag mnyam nyid de dpa' gal byed du// spyod bcing kun tu rmongs pa phyed gyur da cig/ 'gro ba'i spyod ba ri snyed gar yang
120a8(1): rung // 'jig rten dag na brkyang skum myi g.yo' pa// rnam pa tha dad thams cad shes gyur da kyang // mtshan dngos kyis rlom sems myed gyur da cig/ phyogs rnams kun na skyes dbang ji snyes pa// su bzhugs de dag
120a9(1): rnam par 'phrul sa ngan pa// tshul gis dkon zhing/ zungs pa rnams// de dag thams cad tshul bzhin shes kyu rang cig/ dga' ldan gnas na raba'abyung gang bzhugs pa// phyi'o seng dge 'dro byed chen po dang 'a/ phra dab
120a10(1): ya sa dpa nas dag rgya chen dag/ rang bzhin bzhin du tham sa cad mther gyu dad cig// yul gyi byal na dpe' zla byed pa rnams// rnam par 'bral ba ci bsnyes badzad pa dang // 'chang rgya mya ngan 'da' dpa'akhre rngam mi
120b1(1): mchog ka ba tho ba kun tu ldog pa byed pa dang / phyi'i seng ge lham par gyur da pa'i tshe/ kalA'i mchog dang tshangs pa'i gachog rnams dang // ye shes mchog dang shes la gnas rnams kyis// lag pa'i dam pas rim 'gro blangs pa
120b2(1): dang // de bzhin chos dbyings sa lus ji snyed pa'i// phyogs ma gang yod thams cad pa su byas shing // sangs rgyas nas 'phrul gzhi mtha'i dpung byed pa// de dag thams cad 'gro zhing shes gyu rad cig// skyes bu khyu ma chog 'di gnyen
120b3(1): 'byung gyu rad cig/ gshegs thabs bdun por gshegs par gyu rad pa dang // dpe' zla byed pas rnam par gzigs pa dang // thams cad chags myed sgonas shes gyu rad cig/ gang yang skyes dbang bzhad so bzhad pa dang // skyes
120b4(1): dbu 'di dag 'dod dbyings gzigs kyur cig/ sems can 'di dgra rab ris pasgribs dngos pa// srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun las grol bya zhes/ seng ge ro nam par spogs mdzad pa sa bdag cag 'jig rten 'banas
120b5(1): bzhin gyi yid kyis ye shes smon ma shis tu 'di bstan cipo// 'gro ba kun gyi skye ba dgag par byag/ gang yang 'od gzer brgya phrag mtha' bas sa/ bya'o seng ge skye me dpa' phrog pas// ngas song thams cad ni bar chungs
120b6(1): bdang // 'gro ba kun kyi sdug sngal zhing gyur dang // gang yangamatsun mo'i 'khor dkyi 'khrod bzhugs shing // phyi'i seng ge rnam par 'phrul mdzad dang // 'gro ba kun la lan dang bde thugs kyis/ ny+dzaT Tu
120b7(1): 'jig rten smon ma mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'gro rgyan 'dis me gan tu 'byung gyur da nis// byang chub shing drung skyes dbang bzhugs gyur nas// sa nams bye ba byas dben byed pa'i // 'od srung byog sa bcu du
120b8(1): tub rtse gyur cing // bdud kyi khyim nasas tu ldeg mdzad de// phyogs bcul 'jig rten thams cad sprul mdzad dang / sngon pyod kang rnams yongs su sbyin ma dad ying // gang dod skyes dbang rnam par 'chang rgya ba/ 
120b9(1): lus sgra'i sbubs su bsdu byas shing // phyogs rnams zhing rgyud de bzhin bsdu byas te// sems can mtha' yas rgyud kyang yongs bsdus shing // rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam 'phrul grub mu rad cig// rdul rnabs 'di dag sa
120b10(1): lus shes byas te/ 'jig rten byed pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang // ye shes mkhyed pa'i yon tan pa rjod pa// / thams cad myod la gnas te shes gyu rang cig// ji snyed bdud kyi dkrugs la dag// de dag dpung gis
121a1(1): dang // rangs pa'i sran sa na dang byung gang zhugs pa// bags byed sus da sa lus mthong byur cig/ gang nas su chos kyi 'khangam paskor pa das/ rgya'i nathu ba'i chu yul lapa' yas pa// dus kyi dus gsum bsrus
121a2(1): ba ji snyed par// gang rnams rgyal bas tha ma a bsnyes dang // dpe' zla myed pa'i gadran du gyu dad pa rnams// mtha' yas phyogs rnams gang gis khyab gyur pa// mtshan nyid ma dad brgyad kyis dag pa rnams// kun na rgyal pa'i bsam
121a3(1): mas bzhugs pa dag/ de dag rgyal sras mang pos yongs bskon cing // chos dbyings ma lus kun khyab mdzad nas// gang gis sas rgyas ma lus byang byung ba'i// byang chub dpyod pa kun tu bsun mdza thong// ye zhes
121a4(1): mabyed pa rnams kyi tshul gtsug gis// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad pa sdus zad cing / rgyal ba'i rgyan chul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gang gis nas kyi chom nyid yongs khyab dang // dpe' zla byed/ 
121a5(1): pa'i rnam pa ji snyed dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi sgra mul ji sted dang // ga sa pasu mo bzung ste skyes bya nad dang // gang yang markun mo'i lardo ra gyis bskor pa dang / gang yang mngon par byang bar bsan pa
121a6(1): dang / mkhas pas dbang po shin tu phra mkhyen dang // mya ngan 'das nas ring bsel kun bsdus te// bsgos shing rgyal ba'i mchod rten byas pa'i bar// 'jog rten dag na tshad myed ma lus pa'i / spyod pa mtha' yas de/ 
121a7(1): dgang ba baspyod cing // rtsul ba'i spyod pa yongs su gang rjod pa// de dag kun la spyod yangs 'dug gyu dad cig/ de ltar tshul rnams kus la yongs sngo ste// dge ni dag yongs su ba rdzo bag na// byang chub pyod pa de ngas/ 
121a8(1): cad ma lus rtogs par shes// de ltan skyes dbang thams cad ma b+hu // rang tu ba yum rnams rjes sutho ba 'gyud da te// ra dag ste cig gcig gis rtogs yu dkyun dkyang/ byang chub spyod pas ma
121b1(1): phyir myi ldog/ gang yang rgyal po la spyod yul phra mo rnams// zhing dad kyi rgyud rnams thams cad kun// de dag spyod mchog gis shes gyur da te// yongasu sngo ba pha rol da phyind pa thob/ bskab pa shin tu bra la 'jug
121b2(1): ba gang // skad cig gcig la grangs dang grangs myed tshul// de dag byang chub shes pas rtogs gyur da kyang // spyod pa dam pa'i de las phyir gyi ldog/ gang yang 'gro ba rnams kyi zhing chen dang // kus nas nyon mongs de bzhin rnas
121b3(1): dag rnams/ kun kyang yongs su 'gyod pas shes byas shing // de la yid gzhungs sems can dam pa 'khod// rus kyi tshul rnams rjes su sems byed cing / skad cig sems kyis bsam yas khaskal pa dang / de bzhin
121b4(1): dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyang // spyod pa'i mchog la gnas shi rab tu shes// sems la yang dag gzhol zhing 'jug pa dang // chos la yang dag 'jug pa'i rnams dang // zhing la yang dag 'jug pa mkha' 'di
121b5(1): la// kun kyang spyod pa das pas rab tu shes// ye ges mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yod dang // sems can bsgrub dang de bzhin chos bsgrub dang / rnam par 'phrul thob byang chub bsgrub pa'i rnams// mtha' dpung bzhi/ 
121b6(1): byed thams cadas lus pa// 'dug pa shin tu phra la mtha' dag bsdu byas shing // rnam par phye ba ji snyed yod rnags// rnadas kyi mthun / tha dad mtshan ldan pa// de rog thams cad 'apyod pa yangs pas/ 3
121b7(1): shes// phyogs kyi rgyud ma zhing rnams gcig sbyin pa// 'gro ba rnams mi sna tshogs gang yod dang // sems can 'gro rgyud sna tshogs tha dad pa// spyod pa'i stobs la gnas shing shes par byed// gang gis
121b8(1): yongs su sngo ba 'di shes pa// de ni ji snyed 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang // gang rnams ma byon gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams// de dag daspyod dang mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rgyal ba kun gyi bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur// 
121b9(1): rgyal ga kun gyi ye shes 'grib par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod pa'i rjes bslab shing // yongs su bsngo ba 'di dag thob par 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gyis thub par dkar myad tsos// 'jug pa kun tu bslag
121b10(1): bya ba slab pa dag// rgyal ba kun kyi rjes su sems pa rnams// thams cad 'jig rten smon ma mthong bar 'gyur// de'i spyod la chad gdab myi nus te/ yon tan rnams la 'ab tshad kyis gzhal myo rus// 
122a1(1): dpa' med de dag spyod la gnas panas shing // rgyal pa kun gyon pa 'phrul rab tugs// chags bskyed pa dang / zab zhing gatshangs ma byed pa'i sems shes bya ba snye/ yangs sus
122a2(1): 'o// kye rgyal ba'i/ sras das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenas po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chos kyi dbying sa tshad byed pa zhes byab bcu pa gang zhes// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la bya
122a3(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra ba ched por gyu rad pas drim byed pa'i go 'bang thob pa chos kyi sarjod kyi spyad pa rab tu byin zhing snying rje che po dang ldal bas/ byabs pa chen po thob cing / 
122a4(1): byang chub skyems la sems can rab tu dgod pa brtson pa sems can gyi don la zhugs pas/ byang chub kyi sems rgyun myo rnyed par dge ba'i lta ba nye bar kha bcags pa sems can thams cad kyi kha kho bsta ba sa
122a5(1): 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam yang dag par s+ho na// 'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi nyi ma dam par gyu dad pas / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad myed pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
122a6(1): bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la sems rab tu mnyam pa mas can thamasacad kyi dge ba'i thal mna' 'du gyu / rgyun gyi gzud pa'i shes yang 'ang 'i sgyu shing / ma
122a7(1): rnam par dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las thams cad nyams pa myed par smra ba ye shes chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi ded dpon du gyur pa pas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i khas yang dag par ston dal
122a8(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos bskyed pa thams cad la sems can thams cad kyis sngon 'dre pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dbyer myi phyed par gyurd pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba baspel
122a9(1): ba la zhugs pa'i dam pa'i chos basbyin pa sngon tu gtong bas chos dkar po thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas yongs su bzung bas lhag pa'i bsam pas ston
122a10(1): dang / shugs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thobaHlhag pa'i bsam khas shi nad tu rten pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems skyed pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i nye bar rtog pa'i myong ba mthu' chen po'i sems dang / 
122b1(1): ldan pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mos shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sgyu myed par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par basmra bas pa'i
122b2(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo'i dmyigs pa mtha' dang/ dbur myed pa'i sems dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmyigs shing yongs su bsngo ba rgya chen pos bsgribs pa myed pa'i yul thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba la zhugs
122b3(1): shing / rab tu bsgrub pa de chung ngu na sangs rgyas kyi gsung las tshig dang / yi ge gcig thos sam/ stond tam/ yang dag par 'dzi dad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon tu gyur da pa'i 'jig rten gyi
122b4(1): khams 'byab klas pa de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kar zhugs shing 'tsho ba de dag dras pas dbyigs te/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la byed/ ma pyod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yin
122b5(1): la byed/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yid la khyed/ 'das pa dang ma byos pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams can kyang yid la byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i tshe
122b6(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag 'di ltar yongs su kyo ste// dge ba'i rtsa 'dis sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis yang dag par dgonas te// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub kyi myang ba kyor rnam
122b7(1): gyur na cig/ 'jig rtes kyi khams cig tu ji lta bzhin du 'jig rten khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam ma khi/ wA zhes gtu gos pa/ sa lus pa thams cad du yang byang chub sems pa'i 'askyed pa
122b8(1): pyod par gyud cig/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sems cad gcig gi don tu byang chub sems dpa'i 'aspyad pa yang dag par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can gcig don tu ji lta ba de bzhin du sems
122b9(1): cas gyi khams mtha' dag ma lus pa/ lcug ma ma lus pa thams cad kyi don tu sems gcig gi phyir ya/ byi ba'i mtha'i bskal pa'i sumajug pa na go cha bgos te/ sems can gyi byi ji lta ba de bzhim du sems
122b10(1): ban thams cad kyi byims pa go ma sa te/ brang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang dag par 'apyod par gyur dacig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nas yang mdus rgyas dang bral pa'i 'jug pa dngon dge ba'i na na nye / 
123a1(1): #bral ba'i 'du shes skye bsam mya rang cig/ 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas thams cad mngon tu gyur te/ sangs rgyas skye ba gcig dang yang kyi bral zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems
123a2(1): dpa' tshangs par stsar pa yang dag par bstan pa pas/ brjod pa dang / bsngags pa de la spyod pa gyur dacig/ de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig/ tshangs 'a'i 'byung ba mnyams par mongs su
123a3(1): thogs par byed par gyur da cig/ chungs pa'i baspyod pa sa 'dres par yongs su sbyong bar gyur dacig/ tshangs pa'i byed pa rnyog pa myed pa la gnas par gyur da cig/ ltung ba myed pa'i rmongs pa'i dpyod pa la yongs su sbyor
123a4(1): bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i tshangs pa'i 'gyod pa la nan tan du spyod par gyur da cig/ myi gnas pa'i tshangs par rab tu bsgrub par gyur cig/ myi dmyigs shing byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i
123a5(1): tshangs pa'i 'apyod pa rnas par spyor par gyur cig/ 'das pa dang / sa rten pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis skyed pa'i rjes su 'askyor pa'i changs pa'i 'byod pa khong du ru par gyur pa cig
123a6(1): dayang ba ngas pa'i rung ba bdang da byed pa zhe tu sa pami byung ba gapa pa byed pa'i dang mangs par gyung sa byung ba myong sa ca mongs pa bye ma
123a7(1): tshangs par 'apyod pa nyams pa myed pa dang / tshangs par myong ba sdigs pa myed pa dang / tshangs par spyod brtan padapa/ tshangs par 'apyod pa gzhan gyi drob kyi 'jog pa dang / tshangs par 'apyod pa gyi sprul pa dang / changs

123a10(1): bar bya'o// mams can mams cang yangs su gadrab pa byed par bya'o// sems can thams kyad 'byung ba la gnas par byas// sems can thams cad 'thong thamams cad dang bral zhing / 'dod sems dngangs
123b1(1): bral ba'i pha 'omang tu phyidad pa thob par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems ngadaba'i tshangs pa myong ba'i rnas par ma dag pas gzhan gi tshangs par 'apyod pa rnam khar dag par bya bar gyi rus tho// byang chu
123b2(1): gro pa la #'o// kyang chus pa zang po sa pa bye pa da thal bas ga' tu ma pa ma pa'i ma sa kyi ston pa dang tan du byed cu
123b3(1): myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa las nyams pas/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa la sbyar bar gyi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i cho nges par spyod pa la mos pas gzhan
123b4(1): byang chub sebasang ba'i tshangs par 'askyod pa'i la mos par bya bar n+tanus so// byang chub sems dpa'i mang mu par spyod pa la rnam bab myi gnas pas gzhad byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par skyon
123b5(1): ba la gnas par gzhag par myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' tshangasapar 'aspyod pa la myi gzhugs pas/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par 'gyod pa la gzhug par gyi nus so/ byang chub
123b6(1): sems dpa' mar spyod pa las g.yos pas/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyod pa myi g.yol ba la gzhag par byi mus so// byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par 'aspyod pa ma spyad pas/ gzhan byang chub
123b7(1): sems dpa'i blangs par dbyod las ya dag pa gzung bar myi nus so// de mi'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa 'di ri skad smra ba de skang byed pa yid/ byang chub sems cad pa' dis nor ba lnga zhanas shing de mdzorje
123b8(1): bar smra ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' mi bde bar smra zhing / de bzhin du byed pa la gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi lam yongs sung gtsang nyon mongs pa bsan
123b9(1): cad bsal ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par thor zhing / spring ba myed pa'i spyod yul la zhugs pa yin/ byang chub ses dpa' mi lhag pa'i lasam pa dang ldan zhing / gzhan la lhag pa'i
124a1(1): @/ brisam padag pas chos snyan pas yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ni drang po'i batshul gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i la 'jam da 'i/ sems dang ldan zhing / gzhan drang sro gzhog pa yin//  byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byod
124a2(1): ba dang bral bar byas shing gzhan gyi 'byod pa rnam par zlog pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yid dang bar gyur nga cing / gzhan sems dpab dbyer byed pa la yang dag par basmra ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yang dag par
124a3(1): brjed par gyu dad cig/ gzhan chos la nye bar stobs pa yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su mA 'o// gzhan yor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin
124a4(1): las bzon pa dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis thams cad kyi sgo myo zad par rab tu thob par gyu rang cig/ chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo 'gro ba/ thams cad kyim ma / 
124a5(1): byed pa na gzhan gyis brgal ba thams cad las rnas par 'das pa dag ded pa dang / gzhag pa rab tu 'gags pa thob pam gyu rad cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'das 'a dang // ma pyon pa dang / da ltar byang
124a6(1): chos su smos pa re re dang // chos su brjod pa re re dang / chos kyi sgo re re dang / chos la 'jug pa re re dang / chos rnam par dgod pa re re las chos kyi phyi zad pa mtha' dang / dbur byed pa'i myi 'jigs pa la rab tu brtson pa
124a7(1): thob ste/ the dad pa yang dag par shes pa la zhugs pas btos dal cing 'gro ba thams cad kyis byin ma'i mthar thug pa myi zad pa dang ldan 'dang / sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i sa bsam pas bstan par yang dag
124a8(1): mam bsgrubs pa'i tshig chags byed pas byung ba dang / 'khrul pa myed pa'i spros pas 'gro ba thams cad dga' 'a byed pa'i ches shin tu bston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos kyi chog phye
124a9(1): tshul dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad kyi snang ba mtha' yas pa rgyun myi chad pa'i dga' ba'i shugs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / mos pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid la rab tu
124b1(1): gzhag par rmongs pa myed pa dang / chos sdang ba spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / tshig thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i byin kyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rab tu brtson pa dang / 
124b2(1): chos kyi dbyings su lus tshad byed pas byin kyis rlobs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings sems yangs tshad myed pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs thams cad rnam par dag pa tshad myed
124b3(1): byed pas na zags par rnyed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings sucad byed pad khyod gyi kyil 'khor yang dag mthun pa dang / chas rgya byings kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las can pa la brtson pa dang / no phyi byings
124b4(1): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa tshad blam rab tu rtog pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings su chos tshad zla mngon par bsgrub pa la skabs
124b5(1): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings su byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chad/ byed pa yang dag par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings chad byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khongs su
124b6(1): bzhin tu bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su stsol/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs sngo ste/ chos
124b7(1): kyi dbyings chad b+ha'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos dbyings mcha de rgya'i sems can 'dul 'dang / chos kyi dbyings chad byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byad kyis brlab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
124b8(1): tshad byed pa'i byang chub sems pa'i ye shes khang du rung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi ched myed pa'i myi 'jigs pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings chad byed pa'i mdad pa yang dag par zhen
124b9(1): pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshad myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs rab tu thob par bya ba dang / ches kyi dbyings tshad myed pa'i byang chub sems ba'i gnas ba
125a1(1): thob pa de dag panyam pa nyid 'di dang / yongs su rdzogs pa 'dis sems can thams cad bdag/ spyod pa mnyam par gyurd cig/ bsod nams mnyam pa dang / ye shes mnyam pa dang / stobs mnyam pa dang / gyi 'jigs
125a2(1): thamanyam pa dang / rnam par dag pa mnyam pa dang / rnam par 'bral mnyam pa dang / mdor byang chub pa mnyam pa dang / rjes bstan pa mnyam pa dang nga/ dod mnyam pa dang / rnam par nges la mnyal ba dang / mngon par shes
125a3(1): ba thams cad mnyam pa lta mnyam par gyu ra cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs/ su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
125a4(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ ri ltar chos kyi dbyings tshad myed pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag tshad myed pa'i ye shes/ yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// ji ltar chos kyi/ dbyings
125a5(1): mtha' dang na dpung myed pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbas bur byed pa thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo la// ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la mus gcad pa myed pa
125a6(1): de bzhin du dge ba'i rnam pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing sus gcad pa byed pa thams cad 'gro bar yongs su rdzo'o/ ri ltar chos kyi dbyings pa mtshams myed pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag 'jig rten gyi lamarma
125a7(1): mamams byed pa thams pad / byang chub sem sa dpor spyod pa kyang bang yongs su zi la/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings la dris su cadan pa byed pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa 'de dag sems cad thams cad pa
125a8(1): cang ma byed pa'i ye shes ris tha na pa byed par bya ma'i phyir yongs rma pA la/ ji ltar chos kyi dbyings smad kyi tshul gcig par gyur ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad ye shes tso
125b1(1): kyi tshul gcig tu myangs pa'i phyir yongs su sA ma/ ri ltar chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin yongs su dag pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su n+de na/ ji ltar
125b2(1): chos kyi dbyings 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i 'byed pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// ji ltar chos kyi
125b3(1): dbyings 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyan tu sbyar pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i 'apyod pa'i rgyan rnam par yongs sngo'o// ri ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jig pa byed pa de bzhin du ka dge
125b4(1): 'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i thams cad 'jigasamyed pa'i phyir yongs su spo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su mA~M la ste
125b5(1): gang gis thams cad ma khyed pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su stso la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad du 'gro bas na// thams cad du 'gro ba'i khyor dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ yongasanyan
125b6(1): nu mA dzag ci nas 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu snang bar bya rang ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su lnga'/ cinas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // sangs rgyas kyi sa dzad pa yongs su thob pa de ltar/ dge ba'i rgya
125b7(1): bde dag yongs po 'o// ci nas sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma dad pa thogs pa skyed par 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yos su sngo'ang/ cings kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / sems cad thas
125b8(1): bad rnam pa pa dag par bya sa la sa phyir gyi ldag pa de ltam dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su 'o// cinas kyab sangs rgyas mthos 'ayongs su zhes shing rab tu 'phel bar byed pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa pa re ngan/ 
125b9(1): gangasas su na/ tsams kyang sangs rgyams tha pa gnas sa kyi rnam par ltang dge ba'i ma ba deg yongs su snang / cinas kyang sa des rgyas mthong bachags pa chid par yang chud par gyu pa den pa'o/ 
125b10(1): rtsa ba dga'i bu ba tho min pa kyang ba sa rgyas 'thang bamig/ kun tu ma ga tu nga nyi yang dag par gyu bar 'gyur bar de sar dge ba bya pa de dag 'angs blam mig rtso kyi kyi
126a1(1): mthong shing mngon gsus byas brgyan gyi dang pa de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su grol / cinas kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i gabs dang / shugs skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge na
126a2(1): dun yongs su mAT// sangs kyang sangs rgyas mam dza ni dngas mnyams par 'gyur babams cad las 'phags par 'gyur re lta skye ba'i brtsa ba de dag yongs su mA ma/ 'di ltar yad rjes kyis kyis
126a3(1): byed pa myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rnga za nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings nyams pa byed pa myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbes pa
126a4(1): dang / chos kyi dbyings zhi ba dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings myi blo ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tha dad byed pa bzhin du gyu dad pa yongs su sngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ches po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dpa 'di ltar
126a5(1): yongs su sngo'o// ste/ dge ba'i ma chos snyan cing brjod pas yang dag 'angagazunapa pa dang // chos snyand par bskul pa dang / de la dmyigs pa la brtson par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de dag le sogs pa'i dgye
126a6(1): ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa gzhan dang / gnan gyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing / byang chub sems bar 'gyur te/ chos smra bar gyur dacig sems can mas pa'ang
126a7(1): chos kyi dbyings kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la/ sems can thams cad 'god pa'i tshul gyis bla na byed pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig/ sems can thags cad 'jig rten kun gyis chos yongs su dris pas zad par myi 'gyur bas
126a8(1): phrogs pa'i chos spro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi snang ba bsgribs pa myed pa thob pa'i phyir chags pa myed pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rmig dang sa yi ge
126a9(1): brjod pa la A las/ shi ye shes kyi snying po'i chos smra bar gyu rad bcig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye ges ston pa la mdas shing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i chos smra bar gyur pacig
126a10(1): sems can thapag cad gzhan gyi dring byi 'jog cing / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas myig dang 'dra ba'i chos lnga smra bar gyu rad cig/ sems cad thams cad rig pas bzung ba'i tshig dang / yi ge chung ma zos par shin du ston pa
126b1(1): rgya kyi mams cad rnan pas yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chom smra bar byed cig/ sems can thams cad bcan gyis nin tu brgyan pa'i bus dang ldan nas/ 'od mtha' yas par 'gro ba chas yang dag par spyod pa sa
126b2(1): thabs pas nye bar gyi dmyigs pa'i las chu thugs pa'i chos spa ba gyur da thog/ sems can thams cad chos rgyun gyi chad pa la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi nam bsam pa dag mas dpa' pa'i byin gyis
126b3(1): brlabs kyis ma sbyin rab tu ston cid/ mengs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa la lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos smra bar gyun cig sems pan bams pad gzhan gis 'bas par gyi num pa
126b4(1): mtshan dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba'i marjod bdog pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos chud kyi gzod pa'i chos smra bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa la ya rtson zhing chos
126b5(1): thams cad yang dag par brjod pa la mkhas pas / chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma'i chos smra bar gyu dad cig/ sems can tham sa cad kyi dbyings mtha' yas pas shin tu bstanang pa'i chos kyi 'byung nas
126b6(1): dang / mdzod rab tu thob cing / chos kyi 'byung gnas dang // rigs kyi rdul dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar myar da tshig/ sems / can thams cad chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'phye ba'o ye shes mngon za
126b7(1): shes pa dang ldan zhing / chos kyi spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thob pa'i chos smra bar gyud dwa cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bstan pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing
126b8(1): dbyer myed pa dang / gnas byed pa nyi ye shes dang ldanas rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad yon tan dang bsngags pa mu myed cing zad kyi shes pa dang ldan te/ chos thams cad lod dra
126b9(1): chud pa'i cho ga smra bar gyurd cig sems can thams cad bden pa'i mtha'i tshul gyi rjes su zhugs pas 'gro ba thams cad la gyi slu ba'i chos smra ba gyu rang cig/ sems cad thams cad sakyi bdud kyilas thams cad
126b10(1): khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing // bdud thams cad rnam par mthor ba'i chos smra bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdag gi byed pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems rgyas
127a1(1): thag sa// thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos smra bar gyud cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rgyas kyi stobs kyis smon las rab tu jo bcing / 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i smra bar gyur na cin
127a2(1): de yang 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ nyams pa byed pa'i las kyis yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa'i byed pa'i rnam par spyod pas yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa myed pa'i sems kyis yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa byed pa'i chos la yan
127a3(1): su sngo'o// nyams paskyed pa'i dngos po la yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa'i rgyurnams kyis yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa myed pa'i chos kyi lam gyis yongs su sde'o// nyams pa myed pa'i phyir mang po dang / tshig mang po dpa yin
127a4(1): mang po'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa myed pa'i yongs su sngo ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// nyams pa myed pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngoste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs
127a5(1): su sngo yang gzugs kyi tshul la chags shing yor smai su sngo'o// 'dod pa la gnas pa'i sgra'i don tu yongs su myi sngo'o// dri'i phyir yongs su m+b+hanaro'i phyir yongs su mya sngo'o// reg bya'i phyir yongs su myi ster
127a6(1): 'dod pa la gnas pa'i chos rnams kyi phyir yang yongs su myi sngo'amatho' ris su skye ba'i phyir yang yongs su phyi sngo lnga/ 'dod po spyang ba'i phyir yang yongs su gyi sngona'adod pa'i yul lda
127a7(1): chags pas kyang yongs su kyi tsA'o/ g.yog 'khor gyi khyim yang yongs su myi sA ra/ rab pa myag dzin tu gnyer bas sangs su myi thA'o// 'khor ba'i dga' ba'i don tu yangs su rgya lnga'o// 'chi 'bo ra skye ba la gnas
127a8(1): dring / yongs su myi mAn/ dngos po la mngon par mas shing yongs su sngo'o// 'dod pa dang ldan par bya ba'i bsam pas yongs smis/ ku ni la mos khas yongs su myon/ bsnyen pa'i sems kyis yongs su rgya bas
127a9(1): dge ba'i ma ba gzhig pa'i don du spongs su bya thA/ khabs gsus pas kyang yongs su rgya bu'o// bsam gtan dang / rnam par 'a ba dang / ting nge 'dzin/ snoms par 'dug pa sdom chags pas kyang yongs su rgya sngon/ nyan rlom
127a10(1): dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas ging yang yongs su kyi snol/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad yong su smyid par bya ba dang // gdul ba'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzogs pa de bya mang na zu 'i
127b1(1): chags pabyed pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// bsgribs pa myed pa'i dge ba'i la ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba nas rab tu gdon pa'i ye shes chen tshe
127b2(1): khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo sa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu/ bsam pa brtad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// yun tu 'chi ba myed pa'i chos bsgrubs pa'i phyir yongs
127b3(1): su sngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rgyan pa'i rgyan du ma dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phral pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yongs su sde'o// chos srung ba thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdzu 'phral gyis byang
127b4(1): chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa grub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// chos kyi dbyings kyis bklas pa nam mtha'i mthas gtugs pa'i zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po pa spyod pa'i gzhi yongs
127b5(1): su rdzogs pa thob cing / phyir myi ldog pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i go cha don yod na pas/ sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po las la rab tu dgond pa la gnasu shing yongs su so phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i
127b6(1): bur thug par sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol bar bya ba'i rgyun gyi mang pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs pa byed pa thams cad 'jig rten du yang dag par bstan pa'i spyod pa rgyun gyi chad pa la rab tu ga tAr+ya
127b7(1): par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas shing yongs sngo'o// de de ltar yongs su sngo ba yang rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su yongs su sngo'o// chos nyid dang mnyam pa sems kyis yongs su sngo'o// 'gro ba chad byed pa thon
127b8(1): cad dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su spo// nyon mongs pa myed pa'i rang mnyam pa'i sems kyis yongs su sngo'o// byed pa myed pa'i skyesus+ya kyis yongs su sngo'o/ zas 'khrugs pamyed pa'i yongs su shes pa'i sems kyis
127b9(1): yongs su sde'o// dus gsum pa nyim bu nyid du zhugs pa'i sems kyis yongs su sngo'o// 'dres pa dang / ma khyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhi gshegs pa'i rigs su phyung ba'i sems kyis yongs su sngon / mngon par shes
127b10(1): ba nyams la thob pa'i sems kyis yongs su sde'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa la grub pa'i sems kyis yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad thams cad dmyal bdas phyir bzlon pa'i yongs suM thA za// sems can thams cang
128a1(1): byol song gi skye gnas su myi dgod pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad gshin rje'i 'jig rten na// gnas pa dgag pa'i phyir yongs su sngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos spang ba'i phyir
128a2(1): khA yongs su sngos / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dge ba'i tha bas shin tu 'chim par bya ba'i phyir yongs su ma Sha/ chos kyi 'khor lo dus la bab par bskongang pa dga'o bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo / stobs bcu'i 'khror lo ma
128a3(1): sems can thabs cad gzung ba'i phyir yongs su po 'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i tsham dang / spong las mtha' dang dpung byed ma thob par bya ba dang / rnas par dag pa'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo'o/ byang chub sems sa
128a4(1): shes bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas dge blo shes gnyen grangs myed pa thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i sems kyis yongasasu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la gnas par bya ba'i lhag pa'i khamam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
128a5(1): ba dag par gzu da seshes kyi mang bzhin tu 'bags pa bya ba'i phyi song su rjo/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas bsgribs pa byed pa mngon gsus na 'gyur bar bye ba'i phyir yongs su ston 'a sangs rgyam mas
128a6(1): da mngon tu lta bar mngon pa thos pas yongs su bla ma zos sna sa sacad la mdzan par thos pas yongs su / dgas pa byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis 'jigs pa la mngod par thos panasangs thaca
128a7(1): su sngo/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i ye shes la mngon par mos pas yongs su sngo'o/ sems can thams cad snying rje chen pos rnam par dag pas yongs su bskyab pa la mdod par mos pas yongs

128b6(1): kyis yongs sngo3/ yon tan gyi cho ga thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ye shes kyis khyad bar du 'phags pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i la mos shing dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su mAM 'o// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

128b8(1): pa'i sems kyis yongs su sngo'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis ye shes kyi nyi mar ba dang / phul khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer brgya stod gyis brgyan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chen po'i snad pa 'gro ba thas/

129a1(1): skyed pas phyi ma'i mtha'i srar spyod ba chen po'i rgyud rgyan gyi chad cing / rnas par dag pa dang / snang ba dri ma myed pas rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / nga rgyal shin tu gcad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon

138a2(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'dini byang chub sems dpa' se bas dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chos dbyings chad myed pa zhes bya ba bcu pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa las 'tshogs pa'i dge ba'i ma

138a4(1): kyis zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis dkrus pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang rab tu thob par bya ba la brtson par byed par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad
138a5(1): 'jug pa'i ye shes mama' dang dpung myed pa thams cad yongs sum rdzab par 'gyur ro// sems skyed pa mtha' dang dpung byed pa thamasacad kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas skyed pa thams cad mthong ba rab tu rdom

138a7(1): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kham samams cad byin gyis rlob cing btas par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ shin tu bstan pa brjod/ 
138a8(1): dri myed pa'i rnas par 'phrul pa dab / dus thams cad su rnam par 'bral pa'i mngon pa mashes pa dang / ye shes dang phyir myi ldos pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed pa thams cad 'a lus dam/ 
138b1(1): gnod pa byed par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyas suba' dang / dpung byed pa mams cad la 'dug pa'i ye shes dbyas klas pa yongs su rdzogs pa mob cid khong du chun par 'gyur ro// thom tha' dang dpung byed pa las / 
138b2(1): da rnam par dag pa dang /  sems can tha'as cad rnas par dag pa sa/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / skyem ched yongs su zhes pab migs thams cad rnas par dag pa dang / nil ma pa'i sapa'i dang
138b3(1): byen pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i rgyas pa 'gengs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / sem sa can gyi ris dang / skye gnas rnam pa sna tshogs su gasgyu rang thams cad nas byung pa'i sgra dang / smra ba dang / skad thams
138b4(1): cad la zhus pa la mngon gsum gyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rnam par mtha' yas pa'i 'od gzer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong zhing mtha' dang dpung

138b9(1): par byas rjes su thob par byed do// denas de'i ma sangs rgyas kyi byed kyis rnams kyis phyogs 'asu 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya stong du nus srin tu pa zhed kyi 'jig rkyen ge khams nas pa drug tu mas

142b2(1): sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chags pa myed pa'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas dus gsum thams cad du chags pa myed pa'i sems dang / ye shes
142b3(1): kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / nan tan yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad bskal brjod du myed par rgyun myi chad par na yang dag par bstan pa la yon tan bsngags shid brjod pa zad myi shes pa
142b4(1): she stag ste/  'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenachen po rdo rje snying po pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dang po rim po che'i snyingam po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
142b5(1): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gcad / A'i snying po dang // byang chub sems pal sems ba' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen
142b6(1): bo zla ba'i dI ma myong ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal sems pa' chen po rgyan rnam par dgod pa thams cad rab tu sA bar ston pa'i snying po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par
142b7(1): snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' rmed po pa lnga yid du 'ong ba'i snyid blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches po can dang dpal gyi snyib po dang / byang chub sems sems dpa'
142b8(1): chen po me tog dbul gyi snying po dang / byang chub se byas dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog rgyas pa dpal gyi snying dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lnga'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' so
143a1(1): / dpa' chen po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsgribs pa myed pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ze yon tan dazan gyi skang po
143a2(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu' chen dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma myed pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri hUM bral ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
143a3(1): dpal sems dpa' chen po spos pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem ze 'ad gzer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'od dri ma myed pa'i ngapal gyi ka zi brji
143a4(1): 'amang ba'i stong pa dang / byang chub sems thebs dpa len pa gserd lazang nyi ma sa byed pa'i dbyis kyis smras pa'i gzig brjid pa nges pa'i snying bdang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chad po macan thams cad kyis brgyad par rnas par dag sa
143a5(1): byatang panas/ kyang chul mas pa thams nas can padapa/ rgyabanam na thams can pa nyid po dang/  la yin pa 'ad napa lnga 'dzin bya sto pa dang / 
143a6(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' ched po skam pa'i rgyal po rlab tu snang pa'i snying po ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa mkha'i mdzan po kyis zhes bsgribs pa rgyad zab byung po dang byang chub sos srad pa' sems dpas
143a7(1): chen pa mas cad bya mad sa rmyinas pa byed pang spyad sha nang ba dang / kya chu ze dpa mas dang can pa gzungs kyin tan gyi 'brag ma can kyi 'a lam ya dag par 'dzin pa mang po dang / byang chub mam pa
143a8(1): mamang pa can po rgyam chos rgyan gyi rnying po dang / byang chub thams dpa' sems dacan chu po 'badapas kyi nyid po dang / byang chub sems brem padapa' khyen ma son tan rnams cad nas pa sadag pa'i spyod mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen
143a9(1): can ma bya gnas du byed pa grangs byed pa / mams kyis kyi khyab pa/ bzungs 'byed pa nga dpag byed pa/ rma byed de/ sa mam pa byengs/ brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa byang chum sems dpa' sems dpas ched ba rjen
143a10(1): b+hi po la mtshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pag stag dang thabs gcig tu zhugs so// de nas de'i byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po// / sangs rgyas kyi 'thus theg pa ches rab tu snang ba zhes bya
143b1(1): 'di kyang rigs kyi sa tsu pa phyogs bcu'i ba sa rgyas bcos ldas das sangs rgyas rgyan kyi ba bcu drubashin tubya pa ste kun kyang yang 'thus stong pa zhes bya bar 'thun pag gag kyis thos ldan das de 'di theg pa pa nga na
143b2(1): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams par snabs dang 'di byad kyi bu ram rgya byin kyi rlabs dang / khyod nyid rgya'i shes kyi khyad par gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams padas / sangs rgya phyi sa sa su segasas kyis
143b3(1): khyab par rab tu rjod cing / yeshes kyis la drug par bya ba dang // dge ba'i ma ba lasas cad yang dag par 'asdu ba dang / sangs kyis kyi cis lams pa rab tu dbyes la sakhas par byar dag zas kyi
143b4(1): cad la ye shes shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / shin tu legs par gar so'ab gnas pa'i chos rab tu bstan pa dang / ye shes bu dad pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis gos par byed par bya ba dang / 
143b5(1): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i khra ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ye shes ba sam gyis myi khyab pa'i yul khong du chud par bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud par bya la dang / 
143b6(1): 'di ltar byang chub seM sad dpa'i sa bcu brtsams pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mnod par rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag pa pa myis
143b7(1): par bya ba dang / zag pa'i chos kyi bye brag rnam par sgom pa da// rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan thob par bya ba dang / shin tu rtags pa'i ye shes / 
144a1(1): sgo la 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas kyi rnam pa ci rigs su rjod dang / spobs pa'i sngang la dpa' ba skyed pa lob par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa chen po'i sazhin du rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub rgya
144a2(1): sems la dran pa nyams pa myed pa bya ba dang / sems can gi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / thams cad du song ba'i blo rnam par gdon myi za ba la mkhas pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byin kyis rlob pa mdzad do// 
144a3(1): de las na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba la 'as par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ldang ba'i byin kyis rlabs kyis rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
144a4(1): su dag par bya dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu spyad pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan gdags pa bya ba dang / chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi lus la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang skur ba
144a5(1): yang dag par bablang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu/ de'aphags pa'i lus 'byung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi lam kyi rgyud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / 'jig
144a6(1): rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi mub yongs su dag shes bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba phyir spongs skyed cing / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de thaTha
144a7(1): gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyis myi non pa'i lus nye bar basprul par mdzad do// thogs la myed pa'i spobs pas shin tu bston pa'i nye bar sbubs pa mdzad do// shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes
144a8(1): rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// dran pa nyams pa myed pa'i byin kyi rlabs nye bar bsgrubs pa mdzad do// blo gros shin tu des par rtogs khas mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// thams cad kyi
144a9(1): rjes su song pa'o tho'i rjes su 'gro ba nye bas bsgras pa mdzad do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs bum pa myed pa nye bar ba smrab pa sarbad do// de bzhin gshegase ba'i gyi 'jigs pa che zhing zhum / 
144a10(1): myed pa nye bar bsgrubs la mdzad do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pas rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi tshul shin tu rtogs par bya ba nye bar bsgrub pa sA dzad do// de bzhin gshegs
144b1(1): mas na kyi bu dang / gsung dag dgangs pa stan ga tunas par bye ba sa ngan par babyas paci ba bsgrub pa sa dadang / can kyi shen/ dan tang ba da byams ci 'asbyin pa dang / zin pa
144b2(1): gyis 'den par smra pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu na ma khar sbyangs pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa dang / chogs shin tu bsags pa dang / yongs su sbyangs pa'i shin tu byas pa dang / dran pa
144b3(1): snod chad byed pa dang/ mos pa rnam pa bdag bcing 'od shin tu gsal ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo tha myi dad pa thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye ges phyag rgyas shin tu btab pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom lda/ 
144b4(1): 'da' de dag gis/ de dag na bzhugs bzhin du rdzu 'bral gyi mthus so so nas phyag g.yas bgying ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po'i mgo la byug pa 'dzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
144b5(1): 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg sa zag tu/ de chos nyid kyi me ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la spras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
144b6(1): byang chub sems dpas thun las 'di'i shi tu rnam par gdan rgyas bste bgyi dad pa/ bltar byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sa klas par yangs pam yangs pa gnas mapa'i dbyings kyis pa/ 
144b7(1): thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yong su skyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyi
144b8(1): ge brlabs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyis la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// mabyon
144b9(1): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldas 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ron/ 
144b10(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi ye shes kyis rnams te// gapal bsal te bdag gis de skad du smras pa de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma pyod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
145a1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po dang / dri ma dang bral
145a2(1): ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / 'od 'byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa dang / rgyal bar dka' ba
145a3(1): zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa dang / mngon gsum zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa dang / ring du song pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa dang / gyi g.yo' ba zhes bya ba/ byang
145a4(1): chub sebs dpa'i sa brgyan pa dang / legs pa'i blo gas shes byab bya chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa dang / chos kyi smon zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de rnam sani byang chu
145a5(1): gsung par 'gyur ro// kye rgyag ba sras dag bdag gis ni/ sangs te rgyas kyi zhing gang na yang de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag 'artse rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpayis/ 
145a6(1): bcu po de dag myi gsung ba de lta bu ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su spyod pa chos sdang ba'i sgo
145a7(1): 'di ni yang dag phul zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gnas 'di ni bsam gyis kyi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa
145a8(1): rnams kyis zhes pa'o// de nas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu 'di dag gi mying cab zhig brjed de/ cab kyi zer khab 'dug nas de las rab tu phye zhing myi stong pa de
145a9(1): rgyu ni khab/ rkyen ni ci zhig yod snyam pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po// rnas par grol ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba 'dus shing 'dug ste/ de nas
145b1(1): ngadu shesas napa'arnas par thos pa'i tha bas/ bya chub sems pa'i 'thang de dag gi sems byas songs su rtogs pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas byang chub sems dpa' de nas stongs bu'i mam

145b7(1): ban//  zhi bstadaka' rnam pa rtag pa yangs kyis ma byas k+Sha ShA ra shA ya// sabs rnams kyi nga khyed par gyu to// 'gro ba rnams rgyas de rnamams par gyur// 'ji
145b8(1): ba rab bzhag ste// sangs rgyas ye shes mchis la mas byas shig/ bdag myed pa'i sems kyis shes na// e ges bras pa 'di la zed mnyan par rus// ri ldar bar sngang tshon mis phri ba dang /  ras pa tu
145b9(1): la rlung gnas ci bzhin du// de ltar ye shes zag pa skyed pa yang // shin tu blta dka' thug pas rnam par byed// de la bdag gis sems ni 'di snyam byed// sangs rgyas ye shes dpa kha las ma yas la// 'gro
145b10(1): bkang rnams dad par byed dkon zhes// de'i phyir mam smras ma bshad do// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpral rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras
146a1(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'khor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa/ kun tu rtog pa yongs su sbyangs pa spyad par bya ba shin tu 'aspyad pa/ chogs sa chags
146a2(1): pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig rgya stong bsnyen bkur ba yon tan dang / ye shes tshad myed pa dang ldan pa the tsob dang / nem nur myed pa// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/ gzhan
146a3(1): rgya drang myi 'dzag pa ga stag tshogs pas yongs su dag pa yin gyis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshes pa'i byin kyis legs par bshad pa mdzod cig/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ni gnas zab
146a4(1): lo la mngon gsum du gnas pa she stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bab bslabs pa'i phyim byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 
146a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'apyod pa bla myed pa/ sa rnams/ rab phye nam dgod brtags pa'i// ye shes skyong zhing byang chub thob byed pa// / mchog dpa dam pa'i zhi ba'i chos rnams go dang / 'khor na dag pa nyom

146a8(1): 5/ nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam bskal rab tu gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring kyi 'dog bge stag tshogs pas shin tu dag g.yang yin na/ 'on kyang sems can mos pa chung rtsa gzhan dag gyis thas
146a9(1): zo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i gnas dag thos par gyur da la/ thos nas kyang the tsom dang / yid gnyis su gyur de na// de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang/ don myed pa dang / myi bde ba'i rgyur gyur du nas
146b1(1): byas kyang gaganas byabs pa chus panyid drab sa na danas byang chum mams das nang 'dung ba na 'byed gsas las tan nga bya tshigs su gyur pa 'di dgasrab so// 'tho na
146b2(1): shes rab sangs pa ste/ zab cing gsal ba'i 'askyod ldan tog shes shing // gzhan gyi dri myi 'dog ri rgyal bzhin gyi g.yol// bsam rtog myi 'khrug rgya mtsho chen po 'dra// 'on kyang ma rtogs khyogs a s+yad pa// rnam shes yul gnas
146b3(1): don la shes byed pas// thogs shing ma ches 'phral du ngan song ltung // de dag snying brtses ye shes dmams shad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ yang na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la gzon
146b4(1): pa btab pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag legs par bshad pa mdzod cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis myi khyab lnga'i gnas 'di dag kyang gzhan du myi 'gyur ba dang / legs par yid ches
146b5(1): bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal bzhi sras de ni 'di ltar nga shin tu bstan pa/ 'di bshang pa'i tshe/ chos nyid rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'

146b7(1): bzhi yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper ma so go dang 'bru 'grangs pa ci snyed du bstan pa de thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba 'dzem ges rgya za' / tha mar yang yi ge'i khyo mo kha thug ste/ yi ge'i rgya mo
