146b9(1): 'gro ba'o// rang byung gyi ye shes kyis mthar thug khaba'agyur bas sa'i mthar thug pa'o// de bsun kye rgyal ba'i sras shog dIng / de bzhis gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
146b10(1): rgyas rnams kyang yongs su srung ba'i phyir byid kyis rlob pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bslab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
147a1(1): #/ rdo rje snying po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sa skyong 'dreg byang chub 'bum po nyi le shes smrab byed pa'i myod 'ja sa thags cadang mkhyen pa'i bras kyis mam ldanas/ rgyags
147a2(1): skyes pa bde gshegs lus mgon 'dren pa ci snyed pa/ b+h+ya mchog de kun ye shes 'byang gnas ston la dgongs pa mdzad// 'di ni dang po bzhugs pa'i shes spyod mthar thug ste/ rgyal ba'i chos ngag gzhal yas rdzi
147a3(1): snyed de dag 'byung gnas 'di// yi ge 'grangs pa phyi mo'i rjes 'gro sngon tu de 'gro ltar// de bzhin sa mchog blo'i yul du tha ma thug 'dod ra // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ dbyangs
147a4(1): kyi nga ro gcig tu klu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la/ don 'di nyid kyi phyir gsol ba kadab pa ka// / blo yangs dam pa'i phul mnga' ba/ spobs pa mtha' yas rnam pa
147a5(1): bye bas mkhyen pas / yid du 'ong ba/ gsung dbyangs kyis//  te kun la yin don dam pa 'ashad pa mdzod// dran dab dga' des spyod// dag pa// stobs brgya stangs kyi thugs margyags
147a6(1): yon tan ldan pa'i// sa'i dam pa'i mchog pa rnams// rbad yad dag don mkhyen skyed rgod/ zhing sdos bsgrub pa'i ya ldan pa// nga rgyal dregs dpalta la'i nyan mongs zhir gyur pa #
147a7(1): 'khor 'di'o the tsom bral pa ste// khyod kyis legs par bshad du re zhing sdod// smos pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bzhin// kres pa kha zas nad pa sman rab 'dod pa dang // dung ba sbrang rtsi 'dod pa ltar/ 
147a8(1): de bzhin 'khor 'di khyod kyi tshig la sdong // de bas shin tu zlo g.yas pas// rdul byed rnams la sa'i dam par 'jug bkod// chags byed stobs bcu'i tshogs gyur dpa// bde gshegs spyod pas lus
147a9(1): bshad pa mdzod// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gag kya thub pa'i mdzod spunas/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs sdad la zhes lnga rjes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor kyi 'od gzer brgya stong grangs
147a10(1): byed pa dang ldan pa 'byung ngo // de byung nas phyogs cu thams cad kyi 'jig rten go khams kyi dbya ma daklas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas pa'i ngas/ sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gyi
147b1(1): byug pathas mams cad chenas par byas te/ badrus kyi byos thams par mas kyis panan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mams cad kya mar gyud byas mapar snang bar byas ste/ sangs rgyas kyu sa
147b2(1): ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i mthu bstan nas/ phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam daklas pa thams cad ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan pa'i
147b3(1): byin gyis rlabs kyis byin kyis brlab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa bstan nas/ steng gi bar sngar la 'od gzer stug po srin
147b4(1): gyi dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'dug go// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldas 'das de dag gi mdzod spud ga nas kyang byang chub sems ngaba'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer 'khor ba gyi 'od
147b5(1): grangs myed pa dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar gyur du to// 'byung nas kyang da de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam daklas pa kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
147b6(1): 'khor du chos bstan pa'i byin pakyis byin du rlabs pa'i byang chubs sad dpa' rnams snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa ma 'bral kha khasam gyis phya ga la bstan nas/ 'jig rten go/ 6
147b7(1): khams myi mjed 'di na yang sdang bar byas// bcom ldan 'das zhag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di yabo spong bar byas te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjeb
147b8(1): snying po'i lus kying snang bar byas nas/ steng gi bar sngang la de bzhin du 'od gzer sdug pa'i srin gyi dra ba'i khong pa khartsegs pa chen po rnam stsa yi/ byas te de khrod do// de nas 'od gzen
147b9(1): stug po yin gyi dra ba'i khapa pa kha tshogs pa ches po de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis sA'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di 'byung / kyi mnyam la mnyas da dang / mnyam kha mams kha lo rang mnyam pa dag na
147b10(1): stobs cu'i khyu mchog mthu ldan chad myed yon tan can// 'jig rten kun mchog myi'i dam pa yul gyi rnams// shag kye se ge'i chos la byin rlabs ngam pa mdzad// bde gshegs sras po 'dren pa'i bying
148a1(1): kyis bgan lar gyis/ chos rgyal khyu mchog rnams kyi mdod rnam pa bye// sa'i ye shes nas phyed spyod mchog rab yangs pa// stobs bcu 'byin gyis ma thogs gyur du 'astan par gyis// gang gi
148a2(1): rnalas bsam par chos dmaHrin cen 'di/ song bar 'gyur ba de dag bde gshegs byin kyis brlabs// rdul myed sa kun rim gis rab tu rdzogs byas nas// stobs bcu ldan pa'i rgyal ba dam par grub par 'gyur/ 
148a3(1): rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung gyur da cing bskal pa'i myes gdungs kyang // gal te snod 'gyur sems can de dag 'di la nyan// gang rnams rje macom za zhing yid gnyis byed pa ni// de dag rna bas rnam pa kun tu thos myi 'gyur// de'i phyir/ 
148a4(1): sa'i ye shes lam mchog bstan par gyis// gnas dang rgyud dang phro ba rim gyis rab tu shod// spyod dang yul dang chos dang ye ges tshul rnams kyis// chos kyi tshul yang 'gro ba kun la phan phyir shod// de nas byang chub
148a5(1): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas nas// 'khod/ thams cad de bas kyang dad par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phra la shes dka' drang srong chen po'i
148a6(1): /  rtag/ rtog yul mi yin la nag la// rang bzhin ni nags byed 'byung ba byed// mkhas gas la shes pas thong du chun pa yid// nga ba nyid stong ni gang sdug bsngal zad// rgyad la
148a7(1): rnam grol mnyam par mya ngan 'das// zi' dbang bur byed tshig gis brjod du myed// dus gsum grol ba nam mkha' 'dra zhing tshungs// bder gshegs spyod yul zhi zhing nye bar zhi// smra ba'o lam rnams kun kyis
148a8(1): brjod par dka'// de dag sa dang spyod pa de 'dra bas// smra bar dka' na bstan par ga la nus// de ni bsam yas sems las rnam par spangs// ye shes mngon pa sgrubs rgyal ba'i spyod yul te// phung po
148a9(1): skye mched khams kyis skyed pa sbyin// sems kyis myi shes yid kyis rnam myi brtags/ de ltar bar snang gnas kyi bya'i rjes// shin du smra dka' bstan par myi m+b+ha// de ltar ba de gshegs sras kyis rnams kyang
148a10(1): yid dang sems kyi yul gyis shes myi nas 'on kyang byams dang snying rje'i smon las gyis// de las phyogs tsam rim pa'i tshul bzhin du// bshad par byas te sems kyi spyod yul byin// ye shes tshul gis rdzo
148b1(1): bar bya ba'on/ de 'dra'i 'aspyod yul phra zhing blta dka' ba// rang rig yin pas brjod par myi nus kyang // 'on kyang ba de grashegs pa'i mthus brjod kyis// thams cad mthur bar nan tan gyis nya nyon// ye shes pa dang spyod 'jug ji/ 
148b2(1): 'dra ba// bskal pa bye bang zad par myi nus te// yang dag don dngos gzham sbyin gnas pa las// mdo tsam bshad kyis mnyam par gyis// mthun zhing nan tan yod par sta gon gnos// bder gshegs byin gyis bdag gis bshad
148b3(1): bar bya// dpe' ldan pathad la yi ge mnyam pa'i// chos sgra dam pa bdag gis brjod par bya// 'di ni tshig gis brjod par shin tu dka'// de ltar tshad mye bder gshegs mthu' dag las// chu thigs cig 'dra bdag gi lus
148b4(1): 'di la// de ring bzhugs kyis bshad pa mnyan par gyis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtsams pa/ spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ tshogs shin tu bas chags pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung bzhin
148b5(1): bsnyen bkur ba// chos dkar 'ozhon tu bsdus pa/ dge ba'i khashes gnyen gyis shin tu bzung ba/ bsam kha yongs su dag pa/ lhag pa'i khas su bshin tu rgya chen po cun/ gongs pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i snying rje dang / 
148b6(1): snying che ba mngon tu gyur pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa/ rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes mos/  pa dang / stobs bcu'i stobs thob pan par bya ba dang / myi 'jigs
148b7(1): pa chen po thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas chos mnyam pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sgrub par bya ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chem po yongs su dag par bya ba dang / phyogs
148b8(1): bcu mo lus par thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes mngon tu 'gyur bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad thogs pa myed par yongs su spyad par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gos
148b9(1): khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba la lha mchog gis thula' byung ba rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba shes rab
148b10(1): dang / ye shes kyi dbang du gyur dad pa// thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas/ rab tu brtan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad myed pa dang ldan pa ldanang ga sems cad gyi sto
149a1(1): / blo'i stobs dang / rnam par dbye bar bya ba shin tu rnam par phye ba chags pa myed pa'i ye shes mngon tu gyur pa pa/ rang byung gi ye shes dang mthun pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shes rab dang / ye shes
149a2(1): kyi sad dag yang dag par tshol pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad las gdas ngag yang dag par blangs pad/ chos kyi dbyings kyis dkrus pa dang / nam mkha'i mthar thug par gnas pa phyi ma'i mtha'i ur thug pa skye sa
149a3(1): 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de bskyed ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so'i skye bo'i sa las rab 'das pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed pa'i shin tu non pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs
149a4(1): ba'i rigs su skyes pa yin/ rigs brjod pa la kha na ma tho ba myed pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las phyir ldog pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam shin tu non pa yin// byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid
149a5(1): la gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa / rab tu gnas pa yin/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjesu song pa yin/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu gzhol bas de bzhin gshegs
149a6(1): pa'i rigs su nges pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i/ sras dag chosakyi rnam pa/ 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nibyang chub semasar pa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la/ myo sol ba'i tshul gyis @#
149a7(1): rab tu gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dgal ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rab tu dga' ba mang gra yi/ yid bde ba mang pa yin/ mos pa mang la yin/ 
149a8(1): rangs pa ma pa yin / mgul ba ma pa pa yin/ spro ba mang ba yin/ rtsol ba ma pa pa yis/ che ba myed pa rka pa yid/ 'gro ba myed gsab pa yim/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu
149a9(1): dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yis/ sangs rgyas kyi rnams rjes su dran zhib rab tu dgal ba yin// byang chub sems
149a10(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su dran zhing rab tu dka' ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i myo ba rjes su dran zhing rab tu dga' ba yin/ pha rol tu byid pa rnam par dag pa rjes su dran zhing rab tu ras
149b1(1): ba yin byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i khyad la rjes su dram zhing rab tu kakhra ba min byang chub mos dpa'i pyod yus kyi thogs pa rjes su dras zhing rab tu dgal ba yi bzhin gshegs pa da
149b2(1): dang lus rjes su dran zhing rab tu ba yin// sems can gyi don rab tu zab par bya ba rjes su dran pazhing rab tu 'ga' ma yin/ de bzhin gshes pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i zhabs rjes su dran ni ba
149b3(1): tu dga' ba yin/ yang 'di snyam du sems te bdag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul khra/ phyir log go zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / nye khar gyur pa to zhes rab tu dga' skyed
149b4(1): do/ bdag ni byis pa'i sa las ring du gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni ye shes kyi sa dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// dedag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa
149b5(1): cad mthong par 'gyur ba dang / nye bar gyur to zhes ra ba tu dga' bskyed do// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la e pa dag par da 'byung ngo zhes/ rab tu dag
149b6(1): bskyed do// bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang ldan par gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni 'jigs pa dang bag che ba dang / ldar po dang skyi g.ya' ba thams cad dang / bral lo zhes
149b7(1): rab tu dga' ba skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar byang chub sems bas byang chub sesad pa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di thob ma thag tu/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'di dag 'di lta ste 'tsho ba/ 
149b8(1): skyed pas 'jigs pa dang/ 'amyi bsngags pas 'jigs pa 'am/ 'chi bas 'jigs pa'am/ ngan song gis 'jigs pa 'am/ 'khor du bag tsha bas 'jigs pa de dag thams cad de la byed pa yin
149b9(1): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bas/ de la bdag 'phangs par sems pa'ang myed na// yo byad thams cad la 'phangs par sems pa lta ga yod de/ de'i phyir de la 'tsho myed pas/ 
150a1(1): 'jigs paskyed// dam// de ni su las kyang rim 'gro ba bya ba cung zad tsam yang re ba byed la/ gzhan du bdag nyid kyis sems can de dgo la mo byang mang po thams cad kyis bsrud par bya'i snyam du sems
150a2(1): pas/ de'i phyir de la phyi sngags pa'i 'jigs pa myed do// bdag tu lta ba dang / bral bas de la bdag gi 'du shes byed de re'i phyir de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed do// bdag gi nas kyang ga gyi za bar/ sa
150a3(1): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag dang myi bral bar 'gyur ro// zhes de'i phyir de la ngan sor gyi 'jigs pa myed do/ de 'di snyam du sems te bdagi bsal ba dang / 'jig rten na mtshungs pa'ang su yang myed
150a4(1): na/ lhag par lta ga lta yod ces de'i phyir de la 'khor du bag chab myed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar 'jigs pa dang / spar ba dang / bag cha ba dang / skyi g.yal bang / myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni snying tshe
150a5(1): chen po sngon tu 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pas mnyams shing gyi/ dma' bas de bas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag pard bsdu ba'i phyir/ rab tu brtson par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dang/ 
150a6(1): pal dbang bstan pa dang / thos pa sang bdang / yi pa zhi tharnas pa dag pa dang / rtogs pa yang bdang / bgyi ba dang / rlung rjes mdon par bsgrur ba dang / byams badzin pa/ 
150a7(1): pa dang ldan pa dang / yid skyob kye rA/ ngo ma shes pa dang / bral yod pa'i rgyan dang / bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
150a8(1): kyi snyan pa la rim 'gro dpa/ bkur sti dang / ri ma med dang / nyin mtshan du phyi ngoms par dge ba'i rtsa la batshogs pa dang / dge ba'i khashes gnyen la tel pa dang / chos kyi dga' bas dga' bar gnas paran
150a9(1): myi ngoms par mang du thos par tshol ba dang / di gad du thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhis du rtog pa dang / gnas byed pa'i yid dang / 'thoza pa dang/ bkur srid pa/ bsngags pa la chags pa skyed pa dang / yo byad thaman
150a10(1): ca la 'a phangs par sems shing chags pa myed pa myen pa dang / sems bskyed pa rin po che lta bus ngoms pa myed par mngos par bsgrub pa dang/ thams cad yang pa nyid kyis la mngon par mos pa dang / de bzhin
150b1(1): gshegs pa'i thobs dang / skyed 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bya mas sa 'dres pa la dmyigs pa dang / ma rna mang tu byon pa'i byung su chog pa dang / sgra dang gapar 'angs su spangs pa dang / ri skad du bya ba de ltar
150b2(1): byed pa dang / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par 'des pa'i tshig gi rjes su srung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la skyon du 'gyur bar myi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa myi gtong ba dang/ mi dbang po rgyal na
150b3(1): ches po ltar thams cadas khyed pa nyid kyi sems kyi skul pa dang / 'jig rten gi bya ba thams cad lha mngon pa mangs rno ba skyed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'ang pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las dang ldan pa dang / phyi rims par
150b4(1): byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs rab tu mtshogs pa dang / rtag tu rgyun gyi chad par thong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa'i las tshol ba dang / sa yongs su spyad pa'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub
150b5(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu 'ga' ba la gnas pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba de la shin gnas shing / rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgo
150b6(1): las chen po dang / bsgom pa ches po dang / mdzen par bsgrub pa chen po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas sa cad ma lus pa ldan pa byed pa mtha' dag ya mchod kyang rim 'gro
150b7(1): bya ba'i phyir rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyis dkris yang rgya che ba// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mazar thug pa/ byi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa gra
150b8(1): thams cad du/ sangs rgyas skye ba kras pa la rim 'gro dang // kha mchod pa ches po bya ba rgyun gyi chad pa'i smon las chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungasu pa rdzas
150b9(1): tshul yang dag par bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par blang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i khyor/ chos kyi dpyon
150b10(1): kye dkris par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa khagrangs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung bya'i/ chos yongs su gzung brgyan myi chad pa'i smon lam chen po
151a1(1): / mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams 'byas dak+Sha sa pa thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi dka' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na bzhugs pa na stsogs te/ 'pho ba dang / gshegs
151a2(1): pa dang / snyun bzhugs pa dang / skye ba dang / gno nu ro lad pa dang / btsun mo'i khom gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' spyad pa dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang bdud gtul ba dang / 
151a3(1): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi khor lo chen po bskor pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po son pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yang dag par gzung
151a4(1): ba'i sbyor ba la gatshogs pa thams cad dus gcig tu mngon par bsgrags pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis daklas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mur 'thug pa skal pa bgrangs pa thams cad
151a5(1): du sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'grangs pa'i drung du 'gro ba nas/ myangs las 'das pa ched po'i 'bar gyi drung du 'gro brgyan gyi chad pa'i/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// 'di lta ste byang chub sems da
151a6(1): spyod pa rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa tshad myed pa/ myi 'phrogs pa tha myi dad pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus pas yongs su sbyang pa'i yan lag dang / nye ba'i yan
151a7(1): lag tu bcas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / bye brag gi mtshan nyid du bcas pa dang / 'grub pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / byang chub semasad pa'i spyod par gartogs pa thams cad dang / sa ji lta
151a8(1): bzhin dang / ji lta bur bstan pa dang / pha rob tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang pa la gdas ngag dang / man dag sbyin pas nye bar bstan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis dkris par rgya che
151a9(1): ba sa kha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug dang bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du spyod pa 'grangs pa// sems bskyed pas mngon par 'grul pa/ rgyun myi chad pa'i smon las chen po mngon par bsgrub
151a10(1): bo/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa/ lhag ma myed pa mtha' dag gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs myed pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du shes yod 'did
151b1(1): yin/ 'du shes myed pa'ang ma yin/ ba dang / skor las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rgyas te 'byung ba khams gsum du gtogs pa/ 'gro 'a drug tu 'dus pa/ skyen
151b2(1): thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya la dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang / yam gyi rgyud 'grangs pa thams cad rgyan chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yenas
151b3(1): la dgod pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis daklas pa rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad dang / sems can rnams cad du sems cad gyi
151b4(1): khams yongs su sbyin par bya ba la rgyan myi chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon bangon par bsgrub po// 'di lta ste 'jig rten gi khams yangs pa dang / dog pa dang / rgya chen po dang / ched myed pa dang / phra ba dpo
151b5(1): che ba dang / snrel gzhi dang / spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba thams cad ma lus pa/ lhag ma myed pa mtha' dag gzhi mnyam par yang dag par 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'phrul gyi rnam pa ltar phyogs
151b6(1): bcu'i rnam pag dad pa ma lus pa'i rnas pa la 'dug pa rnasab bye ba'i ye shes khong du chud cing mnges par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis dkrus par rgya me ba nas
151b7(1): mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i sur thug pa/ bskal pa blangs byed pa thams cad du 'jig rten gi khams 'grangs par/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad la 'jug cing yongs su

151b9(1): sa po'i rgyad gyis rab tu rgyan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad babartsal dpas yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / sems cad ye shes kyi 'byung gan su chad daskye bas yongs su
151b10(1): gang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ka yang dgra par gzhol zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsam pa zhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par bstan cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis
152a1(1): saka daklas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du zhing 'grangs par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la rgyun

155b9(1): spyad par bya ba la brtsod par byed pa dang / ma yongs su skyong ngam chos kyi rnas pa 'di sa phra dag yang dag par thangs te/ gnas pa re lta de ltar de'i dge pa'i ma ba thams cad bakhyed brgyad 'ongs su

156a2(1): chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po de nyid kyi rnam pa dang / thob par bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongasu
156a3(1): dri bar bya'o// sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ro mus pas gyi shes par byas te/ des byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa

156a7(1): khongs su sbyang ba la mkhas par bya'o// gnas sar 'phar ba la mkhas par bya'o/ ga/ sa dang sa la rnam par gnas pa ye mkhas thar bya'o// sa rnam pa'i gnas bzhan du po'i bar bya ba la lakhas par byaman
156a8(1): sa nas so yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par gyi ye ges la mkhas par bya'o// sa nas sa thob nas phyir myi ldog pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa' yongs su sbyang bas/ de bzhin ma sa
156a9(1): pa'i sa rnan pa la salaso bar bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub brtsal mkhas dbang ni sa dang po las gyen tu ma spyod paras bcu pa/ 
156a10(1): 'i bar du gnon cing thob par bya ba thogs pa skyed de/ thogs pa myed par 'gro ba dang / sa'i ye shes snang bas sangs rgyas kyi seshes snang ba yang rab tu 'thob zo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na
156b1(1): ded zon chen tho mkhas pa las 'phrogs yong su 'don pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zong rdal chen po'i sar phyin par bya bar 'dod pa ni thogs nas las dang lam gyi yon tan dang / las las gol bar nyes pa dang/ 
156b2(1): byi bar la byed par dang / las lci bar 'phrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang / las du bya myi bya dang // brgyags bgam pa yongs su tshol zhing kun 'dri'o// thog ma'i bar gyi las nas ma 'phags pa nas/ grong rdal du byin gyi bar du
156b3(1): shin tu yalas pa yin te/  las ber las de nas ma'aphags par de nyid nas shes pas shin tu brtags pa'i blo dang / brgyags kyi tshogs chen po phun gsum tshogs pas las 'grogs mang rnams nyam nyes byed pa bzong rdal med zo
156b4(1): der byin par byed do// mya ngan nam dgon pa'i nyes pas bdag dpal ma grogs rnams la gnod par myi 'gyur bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dpon ma'as pa yang gang gi tshe
156b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sa dpa po la gnas shing / sa'i phyogs dang / kyi thun pa'i phyogs la mkhas pa dang / sa 'grub pa dang / 'dig pa/ sa la mkhas pa dang / ma'i rnam pa dang / rgya mthun pa'i babram bu la mtham
156b6(1): dang / sa 'thob par bya ba dang / rnam par rlom pa la mkhas pa ngas/ sa'i yan lag yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang / sa sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa dang / sanas sar rnam par gnas pa la ma
156b7(1): khas pa dang / sa nas sam khyad par du 'gyur ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang / sa nas sa thob pa las phyir myi ldog pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su sbyad pas de bzhin gshegs bzhi
156b8(1): sa gnod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i che/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags yongs su bzung ba dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po la rnam par dbye bzhin du byas pa dang / sems can gyi lam grogs mang za ma chu
156b9(1): gnon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas/ thams cad ma byed pa'i gro rdal ches por byin par bya bar 'dod cing thog ma nas sa'i las dang / ma'i lam gyi yon tan dang / so la ma gom than nyes pa dang / 'i
156b10(1): gyi bar lam gyi khyad par dang / sa lam gyi khyad par las khyal mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags pags zhing bsogs pa dag kyang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag
157a1(1): dge ba'i dges sbyin dag las yongs su tshol zhing yongs su dri ste/ de las kyi bar las dpa po nas rkyen tu ma 'phags par thams cad pa len pa'i gro rdzal chen por kying 'byin par bya ba'i rdus byas pa yin te
157a2(1): de ltar le mas kyi rnam par rnyog pa'i blo pa/ bsod rnams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i brgyags yum gsum tshogs pas/  sems can gyis la ye shes kyi tshogs chen po sangs su spyod pa'i tshul bzhin du
157a3(1): ba'i mya ngan dang / dgon pa rgal dka' ba las bsgral te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi grong rdal chen po'i bar du phyin par byed cing / 'khor ba'i mya ngan dang / dgon pa'i gnyis pas sems can lam grogs sa#
157a4(1): bdag la gnod par yang myi 'gyur bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dgra de bsam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasasu skyo ba myed pa'i yid kyis sa yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par la bzon pa
157a5(1): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis gnas do/ 'i bar du yang pa las par bya'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ 
157a6(1): byang chub sems dpayis dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sgor 'dug pa mdor spus te saman pa'o// rgya cher ni shin tu bas na brgya sto/ grangs myed pa/ rnam pa'i mur thug pa myed pa ste/ bskal ba zang
157a7(1): byed pa'i sasar thug pa pazhin tu bstan pa'i mur gyis yor du chud par bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mams dpa' chen zami pa me cher 'dzas bu'i gling gi rgyal por gyur te/ snyid chen po la
157a8(1): dbang ba spyan rab tu thob cing /  gyis yongs su bskyad pa dang / sems can rnams sbyin pa chen thos yongs su shes ba la malas shing macu yod pa yin/ thams can rnams kyi 'drangs pa'i drim bcwag
157a9(1): da// na na ma / tsun gas// dag tan se ma das shA la dang lum sa dag pa rnamasas@
157a10(1): de thams cad ji ltar na/ sems can thams cad kyi sa rtog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'thun// chu zor 'gyur/ yul 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ zlan sbed par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnas par 'dren pad rgya
157b1(1): 'angs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i la shes la nyen pos bar du smras ste/ sangs rgyam yi sa rgya ba dang / rnam yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun med sa bya ba dang byang chu bam
157b2(1): raba' med la bya ba dang / byang chub mas dpa 'byung ba yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / skyob sa yid la bya ba dang / myi 'dzugs
157b3(1): yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang / myi 'bral ba yin no// 
157b4(1): de 'dod na skad yud tsam zad cig tu khyim dang / chung ma dang / srid thams cad yongs su spangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung nas kyang skad cig yud tsam zang
157b5(1): cig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rab tu thob cing / snyoms par 'jug pu dang / sangs rgyas rgyu mthong pa dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams brgya spyod pa dang / 
157b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byab dang / sems can brgya yongasasu spyon par bya ba dang / bskal pa brgya gnas par bya lang
157b7(1): sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal sa brgyal rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya rnam par 'byed pa dang / lu sa la rgya langs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang sems dpa'i 'jor/ 
157b8(1): brgya yang bdag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus ni rnam pa de lta bu bzom mo// de yan cha byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthul can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus
157b9(1): sam/ 'ad dag/ rdzu 'phrul las myig gas/ spyod yul gyis byas sas/ spyod pa 'am/ rgyan tan/ byin gyis rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'bru byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du sa dang / bska
157b10(1): brgya lda ga dram dang /  ma skal la stong phrag drul Ta skal pa brgya stong phrag tu ma dang / bskal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang bzlas par dga'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying zes ma
158a1(1): rje sngon thomamasapa ldan zhipa// thos dang bsas pa rnam / grogs kyi / chags byed ma ngon 'gyur gzhan b+h+yarnanas/ de gshegs rnams dang sanyam 'a
158a2(1): kyi ma byed// bde gshegs sngas sems rin cin yang dag ste'aphral du// byis pa'i dmyong 'bral sangs rgyas ma spyod dang ldan na/ ska bas la su mdang rigs khan sa rdo skyed par
158a3(1): gyur cing / 'dod par bya ba'i gnas dang ldan 'byung dga' bskyed// mtho ba 'gyungs thag tu 'jigs pa lnga pa pral// 'tshe ba myed dang 'chi nga gyi sngags ngas 'gro dang / 'khor gyi 'jigs bral de labs
158a4(1): cha'i rnam pa byed// de tso'i phyir zhen/ de la bdag gi gnas myed do// de dag bag cha bral zhing snying rje byams dang ldan// sti skad dang ldan dga' ba yun gsum yon tan yang // nyid dang mchad du na chas rgyangs
158b1(1): ma sbed byed cing // sems can non tu chos 'artson 'dod srung byin ma yin// dge ba'i chos thes bsas la mkhas shing gams spyod spyod// 'thab sems sred bral byang chub sems la rtag par dag pa
158b2(1): gshegs le ge sa 'dod cing gzhan du sems dpa' byed// be ram phyin pa chos zhing sbyang nga na so lung spangs// ci smras de bzhin byed pas bden pa'i chog la gangs// rgyal ba'i ngogs gyon gyi 'gyu
158b3(1): chub slob la pyod// 'jig rten las kyi bas ma bral 'gro ba'i dan tu brtson// dam pa ma rnams pa skyed par phyir zhing ga du zil// de dag 'di 'dra'i chos bzlas yo rgyud don dang ldad// rgya ngas pa'i
158b4(1): don tu smon lam mngon tu basmra ba// dam chos yongs su sa bzung zhing drang srong drung 'gro dang// spyod pa mchog gyi don smon lam mngon par kha smra ba// sems can yongs su la smin bya sangs rgyas zhing sbyang ste
158b5(1): de'i zhing mchog rgyal sras kun gyis gapa'agyur zhing // rgyal snya ma rnams dang bsam pa gcig cing don 'thun phyir// ska dbu bas kun tu dron gyi dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya// de dag smin dzu mngon par bsgrub pa / 
158b6(1): byed// de dag mtha' yas yangs shing mthar thug myed dang ldananam mkha'i rnakhams dang chos nyid mya ngan 'das khams dnga'ajig rten mthar thug rgyal ba 'byung dang ye shes dang // sems
158b7(1): kyi yul dang ye shes 'jug pa'i sha thar thug dang / rnam gsum rgyud rnams mthar thug 'gro ba'i mur thug pa// rnam pa de tshul bdag smin mtha' nga yang thug gyur cig/ de dag mthar thug ji bzhin bdag 'apyod de/ 
158b8(1): 'dra gag// de ltar badzid pa skabs nyan ma zhing byams pa'i sems ldan pa// sangs rgyam man tan med chos sems can nas byar ste// sems can sdug pasnga ma can mams bdag gis bsdu thos rnye rten na
158b9(1): ga rdo rje byam sa dang ldad// de dag kyan kya sna nog pa skye ba yang rgyas// rgyam grod mchog das rnyed kyi sgra tshogs ma pa'i ta// theg dang lag byig dang de bzhin bdag gig/ khams
158b10(1): mdza mu gtang zhing zhus 'di yid myed do// gtsug lag sa tshogs tshul yang yongs su skyo ba myed// gtsug lag 'jig rten 'chung pa'i rjes kyang rab tu bsnyegs// 'jig rted shes dang ldan zhi ba brel
159a1(1): / dga' dang ldan// bde gshegs gcig byin rim 'gro rje sa mchod par byed// de ltar mkhas la nyin mtshan rtag tu rtson pa yin ni dge ba myer bcug gser bzhin shin tu dag par 'gyur// de dag sa rnams
159a2(1): bcu po 'di la ba sbyang byas shing // thogs pa myed par chags myed rab tu thob par 'byung // ji ltar de dpon lam 'grogs ma pa la phan 'artson byed// bdag gi yon tan 'dris shing bde ba'i grong du skyel// de bzhin
159a3(1): byang chub sems dpal dang ze'i sa gnas pa// 'gro ba'i rnon bsams chags byed sa bcu rab tu thob// 'di gnas yon tan ldan pa spyi'i dbang po 'gyur// byams pa'i sems kyis sa rnams yongs su gyu/ 
159a4(1): 'das bu'i rgyal mtsham srid kun rab tu spyod byed cing // sbyin pas 'gro ba sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la dgod de// khyu mchog dam pa 'dod na rgyal srid rab tu gtong // rgyal ba'i bstan par rab tu byung zhing brtson
159a5(1): 'grus bcom// ting 'dzin brgya dang sangs rgyas brgya rnams/ mthong bar byed// zhi ba brgya spyad cing rab tu sngar byed kun tu 'gro// sems can brgya skyong chos kyi cwo la 'go par byed
159a6(1): pa brgya ba 'jug lus brgya rab tu marten pa byed// rgyal ba'i sras kyang brgya'i zangs 'chab yongs su ston// de'i/ gong na smon mchog stobs ldan chad kyang byed// bdag gis don tu mdor bsdus
159a7(1): ste// sa rnams khyen la bshang par byas// rgya che bskal 'bye bar ya ba// thams cad zad par gyi mus so// 'de ltar sa'i dpa po 'dir/ 'jig rten la kun la phan sems pa'i/ byang chub sems
159a8(1): dpa' mchog rnams la// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin// rab tu dgal ba zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'o// sa mchog yod du'ong ba'i 'do gaganas kyi dam pa zos gyur/ 
159a9(1): ngas// de bar gshegs pa kyi sras kyi rnams// yid rtog dang zhing rab tu dgal/ kun kyang bstan las langs gyurang te// nam mkha'i dbyings las mngon 'phags nas// me tog si la sa rab tu thon
159a10(1): legs shes bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod// rdo rje'i snying po/ 'dogs byed pa// shes ra ba chen po len sa legs so legs// byang chub sems pa'i dpyod ste/ sa 'di khyod kyis legs par bshad// 
159b1(1): 'dzirnam pa dang zhing gsala'/ nas 'grol zla ba 'di 'dri// rgyal ba'i sras kyis gong du yang // sa gnyis rab tu brjod pa mdzod// yid kyi rtog pa ci 'dra bas// sa gnyis pani thob 'phyang ba// shes rabarjen
159b2(1): zas thand par mdzod// rgya la 'a'i sras rnams mnyam par 'dod// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos sprasas/ kye rgyal ba'i drug de ltar byang chub sems dpalas dang po la yong su srung ba byas pa des gnyis
159b3(1): sa la mdzan yangam ma ma yin bye pa de'i sems kyi ses pa bcu 'byung ba/ bcug zhen 'di lta ste/ rngas pa'i bamam pa dang / 'jas pa'i bams pa dang / sas su rung pa'i bsam pa dang / tshul bab sems zad
159b4(1): zhi ba'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa dang / sa dres pa'i bsam pa dang / byi ltos pa'i khams pa dang / rlabs pa che'i bsas pa dang / bdag nyid me ga bsas pa dang / sems kyi thamam pa bcu za 'a
159b5(1): dag zung ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma la gnyim pa ni ma dang bral ba gnas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub se sa dpa las dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
159b6(1): phan pa dang / bde bas phan 'dogs shing / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis te/ de yid kyi yongs su rtog pa tsam gyis kyang srog chags la// tshe myi khyed ya/ sems can gzhan la sems can du 'du shes
159b7(1): shing ched du bsal te lus la gce ba chen po bya ba lta/ ci smos/ bdag ga mag su spyod pa kyis/ chog shes shing / gzhan gi longs spyod la re ba myed pas// sa byin par len pa dang bral ba yin te/ de bzhid
159b8(1): gyis yongs su bzung ba'i dngos lngas/ gzhan gyi sa yongs su bzung pa'i gnas su shis shing / ku sems nye bar bzhag ste/ chung ngun rba dpa lo a yab ma byin par myi lem na// 'tsho ba'i yo byad gnan
159b9(1): lta ji smos/ bdag gi chung ma sa 'chog shes shipa gzhan gi chung lpa re la myed las 'dod pas log par g.yemakha dang bral ba yin te/ de gzhan gis rtsub pa'i bud gyed/ gzhan gyi chub ma rus dang mchas
160a1(1): ji skad du smram pa ni bzhin du byed pas/ bdun smra ba dang bral ba yin to// de na can gyis du yang la/ na gyi tshis ste 'ad// can byabasas pa khyod pa sus bras mi mos/ dasems can kyi dben gyi byeng tso
160a2(1): 'tshe ba la zhugs pas pra ma'i tshig dang bral ba yin te/ de de dag dbye ba'i phyin chu bi las khris shing la pir smod pa ma yin// pa bi las gos nas chur bi spyod pa ma yin// 'dus pa rnams dbye bar myi byed/ b+ha kha rnams dang
160a3(1): pal myi ston te/ myi num pa la dka' zhing / myi 'dus pa la mos pa ma yin pas/ bden nas rgyun yang rung myi 'dus par bya ba'i tshig myi smra'o// zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang bral ba yin te/ snyogs pa dang brlang pa
160a4(1): dang / rtsub pa'i dang gzhan la gnod pa dang zhe sdang pang 'thun pa dang // nye sra par rer brjod pa la gzhol ba dang nga / grong skyetshig dang / sa rabs kyi tshig dang / gzungs su gzung du rung
160a5(1): ma yin pa dang / nam gyi snyan pa dang / khro ba dang gshe sasas byung ba dpo/ snying na par byed pa dang / yid mongs su par byed pa dang / kyi snyan pa dang / yid du bya'ong ba dang / dang / 
160a6(1): dpa gzhan gyi sems sa rgyab par byed pa'i tshig gi rnam pa de lta bu spangs te/ gang 'di 'jam pa dang / yid rgya 'ong pa dang / sman pa dang / gzungs su gzus pa dang / rna 'ong ba dang / snying cu thug pa dang / 
160a7(1): 'ag khor gyi tshig dang / gtsigs pa dpe / gsal ba dang / 'gol ba dang / mnyam par 'os pa dang / myi gnas pa dang / skye bo mang po dgal bar 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mam po'i yid du 'ong ba dang / mangs
160a8(1): mas bsngags pa dang / sems can thams cad sa lan zhing gde par 'gyur ba dang / yid bde bar byed pa na/ yid tshim par byed pa dang / bdan ban nan gyi sems dpa par byed pa dang / 'dod changs sa
160a9(1): me nga dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i tshig gi nas pa de lta bu dge rjod no// cig kyal ba yin spangs pa yin te/ legs par lan glon pa'i tshig dang / n+yas su pA ba dang / bden
160b1(1): ba byas dang/  ca pa dang / tsha sa su dang / rigs par smra ba dang / byas par smra ba dang / dus la bab bang gan su mag pa 'i rtogs dang bcas pa slams de rgyang can band gang
160b2(1): tshig la yang yongs su spong na/ dgos la don tu gnyer zhi cig gis rnam par 'khrug pa lta ci smos chags sems byed pa yin te de gzhan gyi nor dang / gzhan gi 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang ba'i yo byad gzhan gi sa yo
160b3(1): su bzung ba la ji ltar na gang gzhan gyi yin pa de dag bdag gir 'gyur zhes ste/ chags sems kyi skyed de/ byi re myin/ smon cing 'dod pa'i sems myi skyed do// gnod pa'i sems dang bral ba yin te/ sems can thams
160b4(1): cad la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i semasas dang / snying rtse ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / 'dam pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa rtse gdags pa'i sems dang / 'byung po tham/ 
160b5(1): cad la phan zhing snying rje ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang 'di khro ba dang nga / mdun par 'dzin pa dang // za ba dang / dri ma dang / gnod sems dang / khong khro ba la ma 'gyogs pa de dag spangs te gang 'di la phan pa
160b6(1): dang ldan pa/ byas pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir rnam par rtog cing rnamapar 'gyod pa de dag la rnam par rtog pa yin/ yang dag par hA#
160b7(1): pa dang ldan zhing de mchar dang / bkra shis dang / dang mul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang bral ba yin te/ lta ba drang zhing g.yo byed la/ spyi myed pas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la khasas
160b8(1): nges pa yin te/ dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag tu rgyun gyi chad par srung zhing / 'di ltar sems kyi bsam pa mngon par smras so// sems can rnams kyi ngang so dang / ram 'gro dang log
160b9(1): par ltung ba yod pa gang rlab ste/ de dag thams cad myi dge ba bcu'i lam yong su blangs pa'i rgyu las 'byung gyis/ bdag gi ni 'di ltar bdag nyid yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas te gzhan ya
160b10(1): yang dag pa'i nan tan la dgod par bya'o// yang dag nan tan la gnas par bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag log pa'i nan tan la gnas shing / gzhan yang dag pa'i nan tan la dgod par/ 
161a1(1): bya ba 'di ni gnas myed skabs myed pa ste/ 'di ni srid do zhes nas yang de 'di ltar rnam par spyod de myi dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag yongs su bzung ba'i rgyus sems dra myal ba
161a2(1): khA ga dang / byog song gyi skye gnas dang / gshen rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi brgyad du skye ba rnams yod par gyurd to// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung bas ni myir skye ba la btsogs sbed pa'i rtse mo'i bar
161a3(1): du skye bar yod par gyur to// de'i gong du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyi che ba'i sems dang / khams/ gsum pa skrag pa'i yid dang / snying rje chen po myed pa dang / gzhan las thos pa'i sgra'i rjes su
161a4(1): 'brad pas shes rab kyi rnam par yongs su bsgobs na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yongasu sgrub zo// de'i gong gzhan gi drid myi 'jog pa dang / rang mngon par 'chang ba dang / snying rje chen po dang / thams mkhas bskyen
161a5(1): myed pa dang / rtend cing 'brelang par 'byung ba zal bar khong du chud pasu yongs su sbyangs na rang sangs rgyas zlog pa yongs su sgrub mo// de'i gong du yangs shing myed pa'i sems dang / snying brtse zhing snying
161a6(1): rje dang ldan pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yang dag par bzung / dang / smon las chen po gan du btab pa dang / sems cathams cad yongs su myi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi seshes
161a7(1): rgya chen po sa dbyigs pas yongs sun sbyangs na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su dag pa dang / pha rol tu phyinang pa rnam par dag pa'i 'apyod pa rgya chen po yongs su sgrub par gyur to// de
161a8(1): keng du dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi las 'do dag nyid rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par yongasu sbyangs pas stobs bcu'i stobs the za bam 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jis pa bzhi thob pa dasananas/ 
161a9(1): ba'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par bsgrub ze/ de lta ba gnang dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mngon par sgrub tu 'dra ba la rnam pa
161a10(1): thams cad du yong su sbyang zhing mngon par sgrub pa'o// la brtson par bya'o zhes nas de 'di ltar yang dag par bslom 'o// myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi las 'di dag bsten pa dang / bsgoms par dza
161b1(1): thab cu byas pa'i shas che bas ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud 'gyur ba'o// 'bring gis ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud 'gyur ro// tha mas ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ de la srog gcod pas ni/ 
161b2(1): sems can dmyal 'ang khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshen rje'i 'jig rten bya khrid do// de nas ji ste phyir skyes na yang rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di lta ste/ tshe thung ma dang
161b3(1): nad mang ba'o// ba byin pab len pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtsa 'khrid do// de nas ji ste phyir skyes na yang rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon
161b4(1): bar sgrub pa 'di lta ste/ longs 'aspyod chung ba dang / thun mong gi longs spyod du rgyu dad pa'o// 'dod pas log par g.yem pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig
161b5(1): rten du khrod do// de nas ji ste myir skyes na yang rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ ltod pa dang bcas pa'o la 'i chu byas drang / g.yog 'khor myo srun pa'o// brdzun tu smras pas ni sems
161b6(1): can myal bar khrid do/ byol mo gyi skye gnas su 'od do// gni rje'i 'jig nyid du 'ang do// de nas ji ste phyir skyes na yang rnas par spyo pa gnyis mngon par 'asgrub pa 'di lta ste/ su bsha
161b7(1): pa dang / gzhan gyi bslu ba'o// phra mas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khrid ngo // gshin rje'i 'jig du khrid do// de nas ji ste phyir skyes mas pa rnam khar sbyin pa gnyis mngon par bsgru
161b8(1): ba 'di lta ste/ g.yog myi dum pa dang / g.yog ngan par 'gyur ro// zhe gcod pa'i tshig gis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// byol song gi skye gnas su khri do de/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas
161b9(1): ji ste spyir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ yid du myi'ode thos pa dang / 'thob mo'i tshig go/ tshig khyal bas ma sems can par khrid dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su khring na
161b10(1): gshin rje sa'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ji ste phyir skyes na yang rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngong par basmra ba la 'di lta ste/ tshig kyi btsun pa dang / spobs pa ma rtags pa'o// chags sems kyis ni skye
162a1(1): / can dmyal bar khrid do// byol long gi skye gnas su khrid ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ji ste myir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ chog kyi shes pa dang / 'dzin
162a2(1): pa che ba'o// gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// bye la song gi skyi gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ji ste myir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par basmra ba la 'di lta ste/ 
162a3(1): gnod pas glags lta ba dang / pha rol gyis man dad pa'o// log par lta bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/ byol song gyi skye ga gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas myir skyes na yang rnam pa
162a4(1): sbyid pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub pa 'di lta ste/ lta ba ngan par ltar ba dang / g.yol sgyu can ne/ de ltar na myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po che zhing tshad myed pa sdud par 'gyur gyis
162a5(1): byi dge bsu'i las kyi lam 'di rlag gis spangs te/ chos dka' zhing mos pas dka' bas gnas par bya'o zhes te/ phyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas/ dge la 'acur
162a6(1): las kyi las la gnas shing / gzhan yang de nyid la rab tu \u0f7f/ so// de sems cad rnams la stobs kyang phan pa'i semadang / bde ba'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang/ rnying rjen
162a7(1): sems dang/ snying brtse ba'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i sems dang / slobs dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems bskyed bcing / 
162a8(1): de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye sa sems can 'di dag ni lta ba dad par ltung ba dag ste/ blo gros kyi mnyam bzhing bsam kyi banyas ka log pa'i thigs bor rgyab kyis de dag bdag bden pa'i las/ yang dag pa
162a9(1): lta bzhi lam/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'thun zhing / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa la zhugs pa rtag tu rgyun myi chad par khro ba dang / khon tu 'byin pas
162a10(1): shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa yin gyis de dag bdag gyis bla na myed pa'i byams pa chen po nye bar bsgrub pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kyel sems can 'di dag ni mchog rgya na / gzhan gi nor la mngon par zhen
162b1(1): te/ shin tu kyi zad par tshor bas rjes su 'byed pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gi la lus dang dag dang / yid kyi las yongs su zlas 'tsho ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kyes sems can 'di dag ni/ 'dod chags dang
162b2(1): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa 'i gzhi dang / ldan zhing nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi mye lce rtag tu rgyun myi chad par kun tu 'bar bar gyur kyang 'di las byub pa'i thabs yongs su myi 'chol pa yin gyis de
162b3(1): dag bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad shin tu zhi zhing 'che ba byed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye ba sems can 'di dag ni gti mug mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling ton
162b4(1): gis bsgribs shing / mun pa chen po thigs po'i nang du song pas/ shes rab kyi sdang ba dang ring du gyu ra te/ khor ba'i mya ngan chen po las shing / lta ba ngan pa'i mya ngan la gzhol bar gyur pa yin gyis
162b5(1): de dag bdag gis ci nas kyang chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid bsgribs pa myed pa khong du chud par 'gyur pa dang yin/ gzhan gyi drid myi 'jog pa 'thob par gyur da par shes rab kyi
162b6(1): kyi myig gyis bsgrib pa byed pa yongs su spyang dang bya'o// kye sa sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i mya ngad dang / dgon pa chen por las shing / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol so
162b7(1): gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi g.yang sa la mngon tu ltas pa/ lta ba ngan pa myi zad pa'i sras kun nas 'khor bas gti mug gi things pos kun nas g.yog pa/ log pa'i lam gog
162b8(1): bar zhugs pa/ long bar gyur pa/ dge ba'i mgon byA 'byung ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar lta ba bdud kyis zhags pas bcings pa yul gyi rkun pos zin du/ bdud kyi bsam pa thibs
162b9(1): bor nub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bsam pa dang / ring du gyur pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i 'khor ba'i dgo ba dang / mya ngan dang rnal dka' ba las bsgral te/ 'jigs pa myed pa'i
162b10(1): gnas sams cad kyi mong das chen nyi gci ba byed par ra 'a byar ged par bya kyis sems cad 'di dag ni chu bad rten pa'i phred dbyi zhing 'dod pa dang / thod pa'i gcig pa dang / gas chu tho
163a1(1): rab tu ga zhol ba 'thor ba'i rgyud du 'brang ba/ med pa'i chu klur gyis khyer zhing / dpa' rlabs rmed pos g.yengs pa/ sbed pa'i 'dod chags kyi mthus shin tu bcom 'ad+ma/ brtag bla'i sa gyul
163a2(1): byed pa 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba dang / rnam par rtog pa sang po'i rjes su dpyod pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i chu srin chen pos khrid par 'dod pa'i yon tan thibs po'i glong
163a3(1): pa/ smon pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'dam du thogs pa/ nga'i nga rgyal gyi bye chen por 'khyams pa/ rten myed pa skye mched kyi grong rnal nas ma 'phags pa/ dge ba'i sgrol pa myed pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag
163a4(1): gis snying rje chen po dang / dge rtse ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis bton ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rim po che'i gling rje gartse ba byed pa/ rdul myed pa/ zhi ba zhede ba 'jigs pa myed pa la rab tu dgod pa
163a5(1): bya'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mang po can/ chags pa dang / 'ong khro ba dang / sdug pa dang / myi sdug pas rnam par bcings pa
163a6(1): mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa'i rjes su bapyod pa/ sred pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa/ ma rig pa'i thibs pos kun nas yog pa'i nang na gyi thun pa gyur pa yin gyis// de dag bdag gis khams khwa'i gnas thams cad las
163a7(1): dben pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa/ sgrib pa byed pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye sa sems can 'di dag ni bdag dang bdag gi la mngon par zhend cing phung po'i gnas las ma 'phags pa/ rkyen ci lag bzhi lnga rab tu zhugs
163a8(1): ba/ skyes ched drug gi grong stong pa la shin gnas pa/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i yul gis gtse ba'i phung po'i gshed rang/ rtsom ze ma shin tu mchis pa zhan la du byed pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba yin gyis/ rdo de ni
163a9(1): bdag gis bde ba'i dam pa gnas thams cad dang bral ba 'di lta ste/ bsgrigs pa thams bcad myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o// kye sa sems can 'di dag ni dma' ba dang / zhan 'dang / zhum
163a10(1): bsam mgang thams cangs khyer gang ci she sa dam pa'i sems kyi bdog pa'i theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba'i yid kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo chen yin gyis// de dag bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya che ban
163b1(1): zlas dang sa sa pa dus pa'i 'ag pa chen bzhan byed pa la thams cad mabyed dngas nas yongs su bstan pa sa tu dgo par bya'o/ ma mo kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de skang chub khrims bya bya das
163b2(1): mthu de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dpa/ byams pa mngon par basprul la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyis ma rtsol pa'i bzhes gnyen du gyi pa/ sems can thams cad yongs sus/ 
163b3(1): btang 'bya ba dang / kyi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par/  byang chub sems dpa'i sa dril phyed pa la gnas pa/ de'i lha ba rgya chen po dang ldan sa ma rgya stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang ze rab tu snang bar gyu rad to// sna brgya che
163b4(1): dang smon las gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag yang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag sang po dang/ sas rgyas khrin rgya stong phra kum po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba la rgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig yang po dang / sangs rgya
163b5(1): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag lang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig pa song pAg/ mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ma go dang / sangs rgyas kye 'jug khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rab tu snang bar gyur to// des de bzhin na/ 
163b6(1): gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ma rnonganas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim 'gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// sau/ stang byed do// mchod pa byed do// na bza' dang / bsod snyom dang / gzis
163b7(1): cha dang / kun gi sbyin sri dam po khyad dug kyang 'phrul zhing / byang chub pom med pa'i 'de ba'i la byung rnams cad kyang yongs su 'phrul lo// dge 'dren gyi chogag rnams la yang / yang dag par mchod par byed do// dge ba'i chag
163b8(1): de dag kyang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag kyang ris 'gro chen po sa
163b9(1): rab tu 'dzin te/ ri ltar bzung ba de'ang gang ma dor chung zos par myi byed do// de skal pa du sa dang / bskal pa brgya pA ga dum dang / skal pa stong zag dum dA pa/ bskul la brgya stong phrag d+harmA dang / sgrub pa bye ba
163b10(1): gro rnan tus ra zhes gzhag nyin bras phul dang / 'arnal pa khrag khrig sa rgya thag tu sa dang / bskal pa khrog theg phre phrad du mdug bskal 'a khrus khrig sa rgya stong phrag du mo gzer lnga'i byed dag chu khrims / 
164a1(1): bi/ 'i dri ma myed pas gtob par ba tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la yang dag par 'byung zhing gnasas/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na gser gyis le sbra ma de nyid nag tshur du bcug na de las kyang
164a2(1): dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dri ma dang bral ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bskal pa lum nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong/ 
164a3(1): du ga'i bar du gser sna'i nyes pa dang / tshul khrims ran pa dri ma myed pas gtong ba dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag na pa la yang dag par 'byar zhing gnas so// de'i 'dus pa'i dngos po bzhi las ngag snyan pa'i shas che ba yin
164a4(1): pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i// gas che ba yid te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par myi sgrub ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma byed
164a5(1): ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa sa dor bstan pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'di phal cheran 'khor losasbyar ba'i rgyal po gleng bzhi la dbang par 'gyur te/ chos kyi dbang sbyar ba
164a6(1): rab tu khro bcing rin po che bdun dang ldan pa/ sems cadan thams cad kyis/ ser sna'i skyon dang / tshul khrims ngan pa'i dril bzlog par bya ba du/ la mkhas shing / mthu' yod pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba btsucu
164a7(1): las kyi lam le rab tu dgod par bya bar shin tu mkhas pa dang/ sbyin pa chen po brtsom pas thub pa myed pa yin te sbyin pa 'am/ dge snyan pa 'am/ don bsgrub pa 'am/ don mthun pas/ dge dge ba'i rtsa ba kar ci rtsom yang
164a8(1): rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba/ gtso bar 'gyur ba/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na myed par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba na
164a9(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang // dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems ba'i 'asbyor
164a10(1): pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems pa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dab/ phyi sa 'jigs pa yid la bya ba ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas
164b1(1): nas pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad ma khyes pa'i ye shes kyi bar yid la bya ba dang byi bral ma yin no// de 'dod na skad cig yud tsas zad cog tu khyim dang / chung sa dang / srid thams cad yongs su spang sa te// de bzhin gshen
164b2(1): pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / de rab tu 'byung ba dang / de rab tu byung nas kyang zhad cig yud cas thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sto bcu 'tho ba cing de la snyoms 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong rab tu ma la ci de dag la sangs rgyas
164b3(1): stong mtho brnyen pa dang / de dag gi byin kyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams stong spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams stong snang byed pas dang / sems can stong yong su
164b4(1): sbyin par byed pa dang / bskal pa stong du gnas pa dang / sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi mo'i mtha'i bskal pa stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re res pa yang byas
164b5(1): chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i bcom 'grus de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyis thul can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te de dag ni
164b6(1): lus pa 'ang dag chu 'phrul las/ myigags/ sprong thams ngas da/ phyid pa'ang/ rgyan tam/ byid kyis thams pas/ sa pa 'am/ ma da par 'du byed pa dag kyang bas pa bcus dang / 
164b7(1): bskal pa brgya bra ga du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du sa dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag tu dag dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig pu stong du ma'i khar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos
164b8(1): sa'i don 'di nyid yang dag par brtag par bya ba dang / bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// // de dag mnyam drang las rung 'jam pa'i sems ldan zhing / bsam pa dge dang bsam bzhi dang ldan pa rnam
164b9(1): 'dra 'di'i dbyigs bral rlabs cad blo dang ldan pa'i// tshe nyid sems ldan mkhas pa de dag gnyis la 'bas// de gnas yon tan ldan zhing dge ba'i phun ldan pa// gce myed sems ldan srog gcod rnas par kun spangs ni
164b10(1): ma byin len dang 'a gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin spangs// bde dang ldan zhing lda zhing phra ma gyi smra zhe gcod byed// gzhag longs spyod 'dod sems bral zhing bya bas sems ldan// drang zhing g.yol byed yang dag lam du du rab tu zhugs// 
165a1(1): g.yo' myed thibs po myed cing shin tu nges pa ste// rtag tu bad yod ston pa'i spyod pa yongs su bskur // sems canadamyal byol song skye gnas sdug bsngal ji snyed dang / gshin rje'i ris na yi dgas rtag tu lus 'bar
165a2(1): ba/ de dag sdig blos dge ba byin la babyon pa 'byung // de bas de spangs bden pa'i chos dang ldan par bya// phyi'i nang du skye ba yid du 'od la btsogs// srid me'i bar gi lha'i bsam gtan bde ba dang / rang rgyal theg pa de bzhin
165a3(1): nyan thos theg pa dag/ kun kyang dkar lam bcu 'a pos byung ba yin zhe ste// de ltar shes shing rtag par mkhas par bag yod pa// shin tu bsdams pa'i yid kyis pha rol du tshul dkod pa/ sems can sdug bsngal shes
165a4(1): shing snying brtse bskyed/ byas nas// de bas gong skying rje'i sems dang ldan par byed// kye ma byis pa'i blo can 'di dka lta ran lhung // khro zhing shar nyer gnod pa kun sems thod pa can// rtag tu myi rom sa yul la yang / 
165a5(1): dang yang du smon// gzhi gsum 'brel pa de ga yongs su dgrol bar bya/ pa gti mug pa chen pos kun nas yog pa rnams// lta ba'i dra yang mya ngan lam du lbu de gyu rang pa// 'khor ba'i ging tags nang ma rtag tu ma
165a6(1): gces shing // bdud kyi chom po'i nang nas de dag bdag gis dkrol// nyon mongs rlabs kyis g.yengs shing chu bo bzhir nub pa/ khams gsum sdug bsngal brgya'i sa yongs su gdungs pa'i/ 
165a7(1): rnams phu po'i gnas rten cing bdag tu 'du shes pa// de dag sdu gabasngal dgrol don bdag gis brtson par bya// sangs/ ye ges dam pa rmad bya ba phul spangs shing // 'byung ba yod bzhin dpa' ba'i/ 
165a8(1): blo gros skyed byed pa / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dgod ces// rgyal ba'i ye shes don tu khartson 'grus yangs pa rtsom/ 'di gnas yon tan brgya bsngags drang srong chen po rnams// bde gshegs rkun
165a9(1): mther zhing mchod pa 'ab rab tu byed// dge ba de dag bskal pa bye ba phyir zhing spyod// gser gi dam pa nag chur nang du gtsug pa bzhin// 'di gnas rgyal sras 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// dge ba brgyal
165a10(1): sems can rab tu dgod par byed// dge tshogs gang yang rung ste brtogs par byed pa rnams// stobs bcu ldan zhing 'gro ba'i skyabs 'gyur don tu bcogs// 'dod/ cha rgyal po'i srid kyang rnam par spang byas shing // brtan pa
165a11(1): rnams ni bstan pa'i mchog la rab 'byung nas// brtson 'grus ldan zhing ti pa 'dzin dam pa mchog kyang 'thob// sangs rgyas stong chab skad cig gcig gyis mthong bar byed// 'dra'i tshul gis bgrab pas gzhan yang gcig byin
165b1(1): khyu mtshogs 'di gnas pa rab tu ston pa byed// de'i gong ma ye shes smon lam mchog ldan pa// rnas par 'phrul pa rnas pa dums sems can 'dul// de ltas mchog gnyis pa 'di// 'jig rten kunas par 'dod pa'i// 
165b2(1): khya ba chub rnam sa dpa'i mchog nas sngal// bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi sted// sras dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'is gnyis pa'o// / dul bu gnyis pa// bas po bcu drug pa/ byang / 
165b3(1): chub ses sa dpa'i spyod yul bsam yas pa// sa mchog 'apyod pa de skad thos gyu ra nas// rgyal ba'i sras rjes rab tu dga' zhing sti stang du// me tog sprin char mngon par kun nas 'bebs// ri'i rgyal zong bod la legs
165b4(1): po legs// sems cad kun la snying rtse bsam pa yis// sa mchog dam pa'i baspyod yul de 'dra'o dang // mkhas pa'i tshul khrims sdom pa khyod kyis bshad// yang dag de dngos ma nor gzhan myin pa'i// byang chub sems
165b5(1): dmangs rgyan pa yid 'ong zhig// sems can kun la phan dang bde bar rab sems pa// phul bu 'di gsal khyod kyis bstan pa byas// dadud dpung lba dang myos mchod cing / chos kyi ye shes rigs pa
165b6(1): rjod pa rnam pa// danan phung yul tshul du bzhin du// pa'i dus pa gsus rjod par 'dod// drang srong chen pa'i sbyin tshul spyod pa dang / bzod pa chen 'grus zhi ba shes rab thabs// byams pa'isan#
165b7(1): dang stong rje lam gi ma rnams// rgyal sras 'apyong ba rnams spyad bstan mdzod cig// rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs myed la// rnam grol zla ba yang smras pa// gsum la yang dga' bar 'byung ba'i// bsam pa sakhas pas

174b7(1): bdag dang / shed las skyes pa la mngon par chags pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skyes ched la mngon pa nya chags pa la khyad pa/ brkyang ba dang / bskul pa dang / rnam par rtags pa dang / rnam par bapyad pa dang
174b8(1): phrad pa dang/  bdag gir byan pa dang / nor du byas pa dang / brnyed pa'i gnas su gyu de gsogs cad kyi ma gan sa du btu gas so// rab tu spom dza// de 'di ltar las gang bya ba'i khyi che la/ med drag rdzogs pa'i ngas rnam
174b9(1): kyib spad pa/ kun nas nyon tshangs pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du spong ngo // khas gang bya ba'i rigs pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs dang / 
174b10(1): 'thung ba de dag yang dag par blangs shing gnas te/ de phyir zhing ji lta 'ji ltar thams dang/ shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir lam gyi san lag rnams bsgom pa de lta de ltar
175a1(1): chag / 'das pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ mnyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ las sra drang bu 'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ phan pa dang bad pa'i skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin// tu kun nam byon nas
175a2(1): babyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ gang nas gong du khyang bar yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes kyi khyad par la mos pa'i sems dang ldan yin/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su srub pa'i sems dang
175a3(1): ba yin/ bla ba la ri' gro bya ba dang 'thun pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te// de ni byas pa shes pas drin du gzo ba yin/ 'grogs na bde ba zhing nges pa yin
175a4(1): 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin/ smra byed byed cing nga rgyal myed la thibs ze skyed par spyod pa yin/ 'thun par 'dzin cing lo bde ba yin te/ de de ltar bzod pa dang ldan/ de ltar dul ba dang ldan/ de ltar zhi ba dang
175a5(1): te ka de ltar bzod cing nyul la zhi ba dang ldan pas gong du sa yongs su spyod pa'i ltas rnams yid la byed cing yang dag par 'apyod pas phyir myi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus yon te// rgyun ma chad pa'i brtson 'grus
175a6(1): dang ldan pa yin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa skyed pa'i bcos 'grus dang ldan pa yin pa/ rdzogs par gyi nus pa'i brtsod 'drun dang ldan ma men/ skyob byed pa'i 'thor 'brus dang ldan yid/ yang
175a7(1): pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ mtha' yas pa'i 'artson 'a grus dang ldan pa yis/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan 'ayin// myi mnyam dang mnyam pa'i 'tshon 'grus dang ldan pa yid/ myo 'phrog
175a8(1): pa'i khartson 'grus dang ldan yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa'i byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin tshul gyi tshul pa'i bye brag lA/ byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yis// te/ phyir zhing de'i
175a9(1): bsas pa'i khams yongs phran ka 'ar 'gyur ro// dag pa'i bsas pa'i khams dang rnas par gyi bral lo// mos pa'i zhalas kyang shin tu byang bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel 'atam yong su su'o// 'jim
175a10(1): na sa tsha brtag pa dang tham par 'gyur ma mas dpa yid gcis dang / nes cu dang rgyan mad par 'gyu ro// de bsgor bye pa la mdzin sasas kyi rnams pa 'o sa rdzogs ra gyur ro// na sa da
175b1(1): yang dag par 'byung rog/ de bzhin gshes pa la dad pa rlabs chen po yang mngon gsum du 'gyur ro// sems kyi bsal 'tshad byed pa yang yang dag par skye'o// de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od phro ba can 'di la gnas
175b2(1): dzin tus rgya chen po dang / smon las su stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po spang bar 'gyur te/ ka brgya chen po dang / smon lam bya stoms kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag sas po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / 
175b3(1): sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag ma du po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya pA ga mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
175b4(1): ra po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ma pa po snyan par 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra la rtsom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim
175b5(1): byed do// 'gyur sti byed do// s+t+rI stang byed/ do// mchod pa byed do// nyen bzal/ bsod snyoms dang / gzims ca dang spyan gyi rkyen smas dang / yo bya ba dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems pa'i bde pa'i yo byad
175b6(1): sa cad kyang khongasu 'bul log dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la ya pa dag par mchod par byed de/ dge ba'i cha ba de dag kyang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su pA'o// de bzhin gshegs
175b7(1): ba dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag gis chos bstan pa yang rim 'gro mnyan cing len to// 'jog to// thos nas kyang ci tshul cu nadakyis yang dag par basmrab
175b8(1): / de dag las phal che de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la na seM ba tu 'byung ste/ byir zhing de'i bsam pa dang / ldanas pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur te khyang chub
175b9(1): sems dang sa ma srog ca 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de bskal pa byas dang / bskal pa brgya phrag cub dang / bskal pa stong thag dras dang / bskal pa brgya stob zag cub dang/  bskal pa bye pa
175b10(1): gong khrag tu ya dang ga gsas pa khrag khrig phrag dra la dang / bskal ba khrag khrog brgya stong du ma dang / bsal pa khrag khrig stopa thag tu ma dang / bskal pa zhag khrig brgya steng phrag tu ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrin

176a2(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ gser gis khe sA.A ma de nyid ma gang ba mkhas pas rgyan du byas pa na/ de ma yin pa'i gser zhi sa le sA la gzhan rgyan dus byas pas kyi 'phrogs shing kyi rngub pa yid kye rgyal na/

176a4(1): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i mkhas kyi grogs shing kyi grub pa yin/ kye rgyal pa'i phral dag 'di lta ste dper na/ nong bu rin me rje'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od gzer gyi dkyil la thor longasu dag pa can sdang na

176a6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'o sa 'od phro za can 'di la gnas pa yang / de ma yin pa'i sa 'og a la gnas pa'i byeng chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyi grogs shid kyi thub pa yin/ bdud pa
176a7(1): nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rnams kyis ye shes kyi mchod pa yin/ de'i bsdus pa'i dngos po bzhi das don 'thun pa'i shes che ba yin/ pha ro 'dra tu phyin pa bcu las brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lad tu byed pa'i gas che ba yin te

176a9(1): 'od khro bcan zhes bya ba'o// // de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi phal ched lnga rgyal po rab mche mar gyu nga te sems can mams kyi 'jog tshogs la lha mang ze yang dag par gnam pa
176a10(1): mams shing mthu yod pa yid/ de sbyin pa 'am/ ngag bstan pa 'am/ non pasgrub pa 'am/ don 'thun pas dge ba'i rtsa la gang gyi gyim yang rung ste// de tham pa cad ji ltar sa sems can thams can gyi mchog tu 'byung
176b1(1): gtso bor 'gyur/ mthu bor 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na byed par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i khar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas

176b3(1): tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / myi 'jogs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos a 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes

176b8(1): sam/ spyod pa 'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sa ma// mos pa'am/ gdon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa ru sa dang / bskab brgya phrag du ma das/ bskal pa stor thag dum dang / bskal pa stong phrag
176b9(1): byas dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpal rdo rje snying pos/ sa'i dor 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya sa
177a1(1): / phyi de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa gsum 'od byed pa la shin tu sbyangs shing // nam la ba'i khams dang ying chags sa/ seM mas can bskyod dang chos dang 'jig rten dpyod byed cing // chos dang bsan
177a2(1): ba rnam par dag pa yang dag gnod// 'od phro yod pa'i sa thob 'phral du mthu chen rnams// ston pa'i rigs su skyes pa'i phyir myi ldog/ sangs rgyas chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dad myi phyed// skye zhing 'di ga dang / 
177a3(1): gnas pa byed pa myed par lta// 'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed dang srid skye dang / mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems can rnam par sgob// sngon dang phyi mtha' zad dang skye myed grub pa dang // las la ston pa'i rigs
177a4(1): kyi rjes su 'brang zhing sgom// de dag dra'i chos ldan phan dang bde sems pa// lus dang dan chor la sems dang chos sgom ste// dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa rten pa rnams spangs pa// phyi dang nad dang
177a5(1): gnyis dka'i rnam par mkhas pa sgom// sdig to zad cing dge tsho// rnam par 'phel 'gyur ba'i// yang dag spong ba bzhi la 'ja mkhas pa sgom byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stobs dang dbang
177a6(1): dang / byang chub san la gdon ce las ba sod pa 'tho/ kun kyang thal dang thanas te/ snying ce byams pa thon 'bra na las nyi na/ stobs kyi das sgo la thamam cag ga jig
177a7(1): sems shing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas zhing la smon// ston pa'i 'jigs myed rnams dang chos rnams phrogs myed dang // sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog la brtan pa smon byed cing // rin cen
177a8(1): zab rnam par tha dad pa'i gnas rnams dang / che ba'i thabs rnams yang dag bsgrub phyir sgrol byed na/ 'dig tshogs lta byed lta ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis kyang byed// bdag dang bdag gi byed pa cing srog tu myi skye ba skyed
177a9(1): phyu ba skyem ches rnams dang khams kyi gnas dang rten// kun kyang sakhas pas bzhi po'i sa la rab tu spangs// de sa ga dang gang rnams rgyal pas spang ma dzad pa'i// ngas dang nyon mongs bcas padzin tu
177a10(1): kyi gyur nis sa// me da nga yangs su spang sa shing sakhas pa zod nag ga/ 'gro la skyab pa'i don tshulas dbu ges bathos// spang+yas par gzugs pamams ldan pag kyar med// mnyen mdams
177b1(1): ldan lan dang bde byed dran dang ldan// dam pa'i don rnams thams cad skyon myed yongs su tshol// ye shes dbang bkur mngon mos 'gro ba'i don kyang byed// bla ma rim 'gro byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson// drin
177b2(1): bzo khro ba myed cing nga lo bde dang ldan// sgyu myed thibs po myed cing shin tu nges pa ste// yang dag bsgrub byed brtson 'grus phyir ldog myed in// yid du 'ong ba'i sa 'di la ni de gnas che// lhag pa'i lasam pa nyid dang
177b3(1): bsas dga' thoza par 'gyur// mos pa rab tu 'byur 'byung dge chos rnal par 'phel// dri ma rnyog pa'i the tsom yid gnyis thams cad kyis lad// 'di la gnas pa'i phyir ba khyu mchog rgyal ba'i sras// bde gshegs
177b4(1): bye ba du ma mngon par mchod pa byed// chos kyang nyan bstan pa de la rab tu 'byung // rgyan du byas pa'i gser ltar gyi 'phrogs thub byed/ mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan bsam pa dang // ye shes thabs dang /

177b6(1): mche ba 'i dam pa chos la spyod par 'gyur// lta ba'i thobs po rnag/ nas las sems can rnam par zlo gshe/ rgyal ba'i ye shes don tudage ba rab tu brtsom// brtson 'grus ldan pas kyi'i khyu mchog
177b7(1): khra ga khrig brgya// gzhan du myi sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong // yan cad smod lam dam pa yon tan don baspyod pa// ye ge so 'byu gnas bskal pa mang por mngon par bsgrub// de ltar sa ma nA/

179a4(1): bden pa yang rab tu shes so// lus dang sems la gnod panyams su 'batha bas dra ngos po'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// 'gro ga rgyud kyis mtshams sbyor zas/ 'brum pa'i bden pa ya d+ha rab tu shes so// rims dang yongs su gdung /

179a7(1): se shes khong du chud pas ni ma yin no// de de ltar bden la la mkhas pa mngon par na ba sgrub pa'i blos 'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog brdzun pa/ bslu ba'i chos can/ dku byed byis pa 'drid par yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes/ 
179a8(1): te// de sngon pas kyang sems can thams cad la snyid mngon tu 'gyur ro// byams pa ched po'i snang ba yang rab tu 'byung ste// de de ltar ye shes kyi stobs dpa / shugs rab tu 'thob cing / sems can thams cang la lta ba dang / sangs rgyas
179a9(1): kyi'i shes la mdzo pa mas pas du byed kyi rnas pa mthams cad kyi ldan mi wa' dang / rtso ma'i 'ja ra tu na the/ 'a gyur byan gyi la ma jig ngas/ grod ste ga med gal bar 'a byud rnaman sems can lajo
179a10(1): rgyud du 'bab pa phung po'i gnas las ma lags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po bdag myed pa/ sems can myed pa/ srog myed pa/ gsol ba myed pa/ gang zag myed pa/ bdag dang / bdag gi dang bral ba rnam par 'phel lo zhes
179b1(1): chu shes te/ de 'di snyal du sems so// de ltar lus grangs myed pa zhig 'gags la 'gag par 'gyur zhing // 'gag bzhin te// 'di ltar chung par 'gyur ya lum la rgyab gyi skyed cing spun stsal gyi 'phrul 'amar rje bsku che 'brel du bya
179b2(1): 'khor ba'i rgyud las/ phyir myi ldog cing phung po'i gnas myi gtong ba dang / khams kyi sbrul gyis skyo bar myi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu myi 'byin cing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mye lce 'bar bzhi bar myi byed pa dang
179b3(1): marig pa'i phun pa chen po kyi sel cing / sred pa'i mtsho rgya byams la/ stobs bcun rin pod myi 'chol zhing / bdud kyi bsam bathibs po'i rjes su song ste/ 'kho ma ba'i rgya mtsho rnaMs par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin gyis dkrugs
179b4(1): pas yongs su g.yer bar 'khod cib byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag de ltar gyi rmes shing rmongs pa ni ngo tshar ches ma la bdag gis sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis gan pa/ 'gon myed pa/ dpung byed pa/ skyabs myed pa/ gnas phyed
179b5(1): kyis rnam pa ba thags par bya ba ji lta bur bstsags pas sems cad de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba rab/ stobs bcu'i stobasakyi ye shes chags pa/ myed pa'i khar gyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur
179b6(1): pa'i rnam par de lta bu'i bsod nasas dang / sheshes kyi tshogs bstsags par bya ba 'am/ di snyam ste/ de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyis mdzod par bsgrub pa'i blos dge ba'i cha ba ga bco tshom yang / de ga thams ca
179b7(1): mamapa can pas tha'argyas padas babasa'as sastabasas 'ad / mas par ya ba sagod che ba dang sa yang ci ba
180a1(1): ses sa dpa'is ldag shin tu rgyas 'a dpa' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems pabang rten na pas kya byisas par gyi byung ba chab nyid kyis dran ba ldan pa med/ shi tu sa patogs sa segs can tha/ 
180a2(1): ldan pa med/ mda'i don dang / rdul dang / sdes po dag khong du chud pas/ rig pa ldan pa yin// bdag dang gzhan gi rjes su spang bas don shes shing khrel yong yin/ snyam pa dang / tshul ma bong bas/ dga' ba dang ldan pa yid/ gnas
180a3(1): gnas ma yin pa la mkhas shing / shin tu brtags pas blo dang ldan pa yin/ gzhag gi dri myi 'dzeg pas ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dbye ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin

180a5(1): ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rtsol pas brtson 'grus rgyan gyi chad pa mi skyen/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par phrog pas skyo ba byed pa'o sems dang ldan pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
180a6(1): mngom par bsgrub pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin/ mtshan dang dbye' byad bzang po yang dag par bsgrub pas/ dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brtson pa yin/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i ska dang / gsung dang / dgongs pa'i rgyan
180a7(1): yongasra tshol bas rtag tu rgyun myi chad par brtson pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos sgrub thams cad la rim 'gro byed pas bsnyed bkur dang / sri zhu chen po'i ngang tshul can yin/ byang chub kyi sems da
180a8(1): thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ngang tshul dang ldan par 'jig rten du rgyabs khong khro ba byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems ldan nams cad yongs su spring par bya ba la mdzod par brtson pas cid mchad du zlal
180a9(1): du sems pa'i yid yongs su spangs pa yin te/ de de ltar mngon par rtson pas/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su smyi par byed do// ngag snyan bu dang / don basmra ba dang / don 'thun pa dang / gzugs kyi lus
180b1(1): kun tu bstan pa dang / chos bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod phra brjod pa rang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshis nyid spros pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seshes kyi maH/

181a7(1): / rab tu 'byung nas kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs/ rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa shin tu rgyal bar dga' ba 'di la gnas byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag

182a9(1): byed cing // tshul khrims sems dang nan tan rnams dag pAH// nem nur myed pa'i mkhas pa lnga po yongs su gnon// dran pa'i gasri dang dbang po mda' rno phyir phyi ltog/ yang dag spong sa rta yid gnon pardzu 'phrul rkang
182a10(1): stobs lnga go cha dgra rnams kun gyis tshugs myi nus// dpa' bas myi ldog mkhas pa lnga po yongs su gnod// ngo tsha khrel yod gos in mkhas pa'i tshul gtsang smos// byang chub yan lag 'phreng ba byug pa bsam gtan
182b1(1): mchog// shes rab rnam par spyod dang thabs mchog rgyan yin te// bzal zhing rab 'dzin dga' ldan yang dag gnan/ rdzu 'bras can ma rkang pa drun pa nas dag maphrin// byams brtse nas dag byig yin shes 'bam
182b2(1): ba mchog bdag byed nga ros nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu 'jom// mkham la phyi'i seng ges lnga yongs su gnod// de dag sa mchog lnga po'i phyogs su byin gyu ra nas// yongs su dag pa'i las rnams phyir zhing gong du spyod/ bam
182b3(1): dag mkhas ba rlob par byaden tu// skyo ba skyed par snyir rje byams pa'i rjes su sems// bsod nams tshogs sugs de bzhin ye shes shes rab ldan pa// sa rnams spab par bya phyir gcig kyi thabapa rtog cig// sangs rgyas byin gyis dran
182b4(1): dang blo bras rdo thob pas/ dag 'den pa bzhi po sa lus yang dag khor du chud// don dam bde ba de bzhin kun rdzob sa chan bden dang // nas par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin rtag paden dang // lnga shag 'byung zhing 'dug dang dngos po ni lus bden
