182b9(1): 'chang ba'i rgyud du phyir myi ldogs/ phul po'i gnas dang khams sbrul lta ba'i thug lda can// skyes gdungs yid can sprub pa'i mun pas bsgribs sbyangs pa// dod nams rnam par ma rtags sred pa'i 'chor ba'i rnye dpon bral ba sdug bcwa
182b10(1): mtsha 'das// de ltar rig gnas pa ga yod byi ning rabatu 'byom gyi//  gros kun kyang 'akri ba rnas thar dod tu / phyir zhing dram ldan zla zlas rig dang ldan pa yid// mangs ma rdo ldan zhes rag bsod nams bsugs rnas
183a1(1): ga ye shes das pas myo ngos shing ga rtag tu myed le lo myed par zos pa tshol// zhing lasdu ba rgyal ba'i mchan dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing // phan par brtson pas ngoms myi she swat+ma/ 'gro ba spyid bya'i don tu mkhas pas gamod
183a2(1): gnas / yi ge la sa bad grangs dang rtsis dang ga sol pa'i thabs// 'byung po'i gdon dpalas rnams snga chog sa snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug lag kun la gzhog/ rang bzo'i mchog dang gar sdug lnga tshogs dga'
183a3(1): byed dang // chu klung ra pa shing tog 'dug gnas das// bya ba snga tshogs sprul byed sems cad rin cen 'byung gnas du ma 'ang nye bar ston pa byed// sa g.yo nyizla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du// sems can yan lag mtsham bzhi
183a4(1): dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas// gzugs byed bsam gtan padon zhes mchog dang chad pas myed pas / 'gro la bde dang phad pa'i don 'dod mngon par bsgrub// shin tu rgal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa// sangs rgyas

183a6(1): 'an kyang rlung gi 'grogs pagyid// de kar 'gro ba'i dzin myod jin ros khyod kyang // ri wang na 'di so rgyas kyi chagasazhin 'phrogs pagyin// 'di la gnas pa dga' ldanang ba mam mkhas par/ 
183a7(1): 'gyur// mu stegs spyod dang lta ba meng po'i gnas skyel// stobs rnams bcu pos sems can bsgrub par bya'o zhes// dge ba de dag rgyal bzhi sa sho sa don tu grom// 'di nas gong du brtson 'grus rtsos byed mthu thol pa// khrag
183a8(1): khrig rgya byung gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed// ting 'dzin pob nas zag khrig zhing yang mkhas pas byed// yas cad sbespod las khyad par yon/ byung gsa'o// de skang sa mchog lnga pa 'di// thabras kyi rnas pa phrag khrog nin
183a9(1): sems can gcol yang dag tu// rgyal pa'i sras kyis snyan pa yin// shi tu rnal bar dga' bya ses bya ba ste// byang chub sems pa 'dis lnga pa'o// mkham pa rnam pa pa chag byed par bzab nas// rgyal
183a10(1): dka' zhing mkha las me tog char 'bebs so// nom bu rini cem nas dag 'od gsal rgya che 'byung ba dag/ de ba du gshegs la mthor dag zhes rnam pa brjod// \u0f88\u0f90 rnams 'acu phrag stong grangs dga' zhing bar sdeng lag
183b1(1): ba napa yid yod rin byed snga tshogs bye ba'i rnams// bde ba gshegs la mngon por phyag pa breb spos// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dani se man yang 'bral// lha'i dbang po dab sgyur lha tshogs mang po ras// steng gi mkha' la zhong cing
183b2(1): rin rtsen sprin yangs pa// rgyal ba'i mchod pa'i don tu bde bar gshegs la 'thor// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs zhes rnam par rjod// bar snang gnas las lha'i bu mo stong gis kyang // glu dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i
183b3(1): dbyangs snyan pa byung // sgra rnams kun kyi dbyangs las 'di skad tshig kyang byung // rgyal ba'i gsug zhi yid 'ong nyon mong sa gdung ba sel// chos/ rnams thams cad stong shing dngos zhi mtshan ma byed// nam mkha'i dbyings dang
183b4(1): mtshungs mnyam rnam dag rnam myi rtog/ 'gro dang gnas las nas 'das ma lus spros pa byed// de bzhin nyid du ches rnam sa yang dag mnyam gyi tog/ chos rnams kus la sdang khrod du sus chud pa// de la rdzongs dang dngos byed
183b5(1): gam ba zhang mar byed// spyong rdo rje bas 'grel mo la phyir brtson pa'i// de dag rgyal lams chos kyi spu skyes pa'o// sachan sa thams cad spangs kwing basbyin pa'i spyad spyod// rdul khrims shin tu sems dpa' sngon naman
183b6(1): phyag// 'gro ba don tu chos kyi ye shes mnyams 'azod// brtsona'agrus stobs dang ldang zhing chos rnams kun gyi dben// nyon mongs btsal cing nas dag bsam gtan tshul zhugs// dngos po 'di rgya sa
183b7(1): cad snganas ni zhing rnas par bye// ma shes spyong dang spobs phyi rtag tu 'am ngan bzos// byas sras de dag sdig pazhi che banyid dang na// de skad sna dbyangs snyan pasnyed grangs brjod byag nas/ de zhing tho
183b8(1): gis byed pa// ra pa'i zla lag yang sprus pa// si mchog ldan nam de/ nas paci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyal pa'i sras dge ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa ldam sa
183b9(1): ga'i khas yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' don byang chub sems nga ba'i sa drug pa la 'a drag gi// de ches gcam pa nyid drug ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ 'chad ma myed pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams
183b10(1): mams nyid byed pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos lams cad kyi phye gnyis pa nyid dang / chos thams cad ma byang mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dung / chos thams cad snga nas rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid du
184a1(1): 6/ 9/ chos thams cad smos pa skyed pa mnyam pa nyid dang // chos thams cad blang ba skyed yangs/ dor ba byed pa mnyam pa nyid dang / zam thams cad sbrum dang / skyi las dang / myig gsor dang / sgra brnyen dang / chu'i rna ba dang / gzugs/ 
184a2(1): brnyan dang / spru l+la dang / mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid de// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag chos mnyam kha nyid bcu po 'di dag byis byang
184a3(1): chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'dug go// de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing dpyod pa dang / 'thun par sems shing gyi 'thun par myi byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa thun pa'i bzod
184a4(1): pa non pos 'jog ste/ 'od kyang da dung kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa madrol tu gyurang pazhi tho bA ma son na/ de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rdeg pa'i tshe de bas kyang snying rje ched po sngod tu 'gro ba pa dang / snying rje chen po la dang /

184a7(1): ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar sngags te// su byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyis sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa// nye bar len pa dpa bcas rnaMs 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rgani dang yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa

184a9(1): byung nas rnam pas 'phel lo// myir dang gzugs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel nas/ rab papo lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga byung ldan chun 'du shes shing phrad pas reg par 'gyur ro// reg byas 'dus nas
184b1(1): tsho ba 'byung chu' tshong nas de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo // sred pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do// nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las thod pa 'byung ba na 'gyur mo/ srod pa rgyad
184b2(1): nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur to// phung pa lnga byung nas las gyi rgyud lngar rims kyis dengs par 'gyur ro// dengs nas 'bral bar 'gyur te/ dengs shing bral bas kyi dga' zhing yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus/ mya
184b3(1): ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byub par 'gyur yang de dag la u yab 'byung bar byed pa byed do// rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub par 'jig par 'gyur yang de dag
184b4(1): 'jig par byed pa su 'ang byed zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po/ lus su 'thun par rten cing 'brel par 'byung pha la/ de 'di snyam du sems te// bden pa mngos par myi shes pa ni yang dag pa

185a1(1): gzhi sadi snyas tu sems teg 'di ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems nas ste/ gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phye ste/ bka' stsa lad pa de dag thams cad kyang sems tshis

192a10(1): chug sem sa dpal sems dpa' chen po/ de snying rje chen po sngon tu matad pa'i sems bskyed pa 'byung ba re re zhing yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa / de bzhin gshegs na pa shes kyi don tu/ 
192b1(1): yongs su bsngogs/ de la gang sangs rgyas kyi ye she sa yongs su tshol zhing sems can rnams la dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i smyon pa pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/  gang rten mongs pas mjas su brdu pa
192b2(1): thams cad rang zhi ba 'di ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa'o// gang snying rje dang / byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad la tshig pa myed pa 'don de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gong nas
192b3(1): gong pu dge ba'o// chos tshol bas kyi ngoms par dam brtsa pa 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye ge sa ma ngon tu bya ba phyir 'gyod pa myed pa'i lam dang ldan pa 'di ni n+de 'i bsam gtan
192b4(1): gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// gang rang bzhin gisas skyes pa mngon du gyum pa 'din de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyis pa'o//  she shes chad mngon par sgrub pa 'di ni de'i thabs pa'i pha ro lang du phyind pa'o// gang bas
192b5(1): kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyis lam yongs su myi 'tshed pa 'di ni de'i stobs kyi pha rol phyind pa'o// gang chos thams cad la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa 'di ni de'i ye shes
192b6(1): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du sob pa'i 'di la gnas pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po 'di dag de ltar yongs
192b7(1): su rdzogs pA'i 'gyur te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang yongs su bIr 'gyur ro// byin gyi rlabs bsrud pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gsum bcu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / mdor sngun byang
192b8(1): bya chub kyi yan lag gyi chos thams cad skad cig gcig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de skad smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i blags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
192b9(1): snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa 'ba' shig gi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad du rdzogs pa'i
192b10(1): 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis/ sa bcu po thams cad la'ang de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sa bcu po kun la'ang / byang chub sems
193a1(1): dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su rdzogs par lta 'gyur te// sems dpa'i sa bdun po 'di la ni de dag pas lhag par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur da ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
193a2(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di ni/ nan tan du bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'aspyod pa yongs su gnon pa ste/ de ltar rgyal ba'i sras/ bya ba/ 
193a3(1): chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni smon lam thams cad la lhag par dmyigs pas/ byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la sems kyi dri ma
193a4(1): thams cad la ba bachags pas/ gsum pa la smon lam rnam par 'phel ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thob pas/ bzhi pa lam la 'jug pas/ lnga pa la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ rlag pa
193a5(1): la chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i/ ngan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ chu sems dpa'is bdun pa 'di la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
193a6(1): thams cad yongasu sgrub pas// byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongs su grub par 'gyur na ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbyang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung
193a7(1): ste/ byang chub sesas dpa'i sa bdum pa'i bar du byang chub se sa dpa' sa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i yang lag de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa// yan lag lhun gyis
193a8(1): pa yongs su grub bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste dper na/ kun nas nyon mongs shing yang dag pa'i 'jig rted gi khams dang / shind tu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi las dag/ 'jig rten rgya khams gnyis kyi 'jam
193a9(1): rten gyi khams kyi bar di/ smon lam dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang / shugs ched po sa tornam papa 'dod 'dod brgyal bar gyi chus saso// rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sem
193a10(1): dpa'i spyod pa 'dres pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i rab yang smod pa dang /  thabs rang shes rab dang mngon par shes pa'i sems kyi stobs dang / grags ched po ma gtogs par 'dod nga 'anal bar rgyu ma
193b1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par grol ba zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'on ci/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i daspyod pas kun nas
193b2(1): nyon mongs par yod ches par bya ba yin dang / byang chub sems dpa'// rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang rab tu dga' ba nyid bzung ba yan nan du byang chub sems
193b3(1): dpa'i baspyod bri/ thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang gis/ nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bad gar 'os pa'i tshul gis lam mnyam nyid kyis yid ches par byas te/ de rtsam gis sa bdun po rnams su nyon mongs pa'i
193b4(1): spyod pa las yang dag par 'das shes ni myo bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i As 'di lta ste dpe'an/ 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po na lha rdzas kyi glang po rin po che la zhon zhing gling bzhi dag tu yang 'gro'o// myi'i sngags bsngal dang / 'phongs pa dang
193b5(1): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ 'od kyang nyes pa de dag gis gos par myi 'gyur ro// de tsam gyis myi'i lus las yongs su 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ nam gyi'i lus spangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
193b6(1): du skyes pa'i 'gyur ba'i de'i rtse ni/ tshangs pa'i kan 'a byed la 'denaganas shing / stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyang mthong / de dag tu 'ang 'gro/ tshangs pa'i gzugs brnyan yang kun tu ton te/ myo zhes kyang
193b7(1): myi rjod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan chad/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyind pa'i theg pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rmya ba'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i de ga gis sa gos
193b8(1): pA yang myi 'gyur ro// 'od kyang de tsam gis bdun pa rnams la/ nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag par 'dis shes ni myi bya te// nam sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa thams cad spangs te/ sa bdun pa nas sa rgyad pa'i yongs su gnon par
193b9(1): 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su dag pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i che/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun las 'das pas/ nyes pa de dag gis
193b10(1): kun nas nyon mongs par gyu dad ces kyi bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'dod chags la rdzogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nyon mongs pa mang po thams cad
193b11(1): nyes pa rnams la kyang rab tu shes te/ yang dag pa'i lam tu zhugs pas kun nas nyon mo
194a1(1): 8/ las kyang shini rgyags che bar 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di sa sum la'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ nyon mongs la can nam rgya h+ya/ nyarna mdzes pa byed pa zhes kyang gyi bya'o// de ci'i byor zhen
194a2(1): nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyab myed pas// nyon mongs pa can zhes kyi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mdor bar 'dod cing / bsam kha yongs su ma rdzogs pas nyon mongs pa byed pa zhes kyang myi bya'o// 
194a3(1): de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsamakhas yongs su dag pa'i las dang ldan pa yin/ lhag pa'i khasam pas yongs su dag pa'i lag gi/ 
194a4(1): las dang ldan pa yin/ lhag pa'i bamam pas sangs su dag pa'ishi mAs da spyan bskyed/ don gyi dge ba'i las kyil mde badzin gshes su 'as spyad pa/ ga nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnye
194a5(1): yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs bu de dag thams cad kyang ljon gyis grub par rab tu 'byed do// de ni rma/ sum gi rkyen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na slob dpon bya ba yin/ 
194a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan tshad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ya gaN+Da rtogs par su yang de dpa bsam pa'am/ sbyor bas mnyam
194a7(1): ba myed do// 'di ltar yang gang 'di dag bsam gtan nam sa dang / ting nge 'dzind de ga dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par zhes pa de dag dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gang gyu/ thams cad kyi thams/ 
194a8(1): cad du bsgom pa mngon pa ba sgrus pa'i sgo'i tshul gyis mngon du gyur pa/ 'on kyang na chung byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'al di lta ba de bzhin du ni rnam par spyon pas yongs su rdzogs par ma yin no// de ltar
194a9(1): byang chub sems dpa'is bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa thams cad la shes rab dang / thabs dang / bsgom pa'i stobs su rdzogs pa'i 'gyur ro/ sdod pas kyang chub kyi
194b1(1): yan lag thams cad yod sung ma rdzogs par 'du 'thob ze/ de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'os bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nas ma nga dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la mnyam par/ 
194b2(1): gzhog/ ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini don shin tu gsams pa zhes bya ba dang / khyad par gyi zla gros zhes bya ba dang / chos rab tu bye ba'i zhan gyi sarjod ces bya ba dang / ches ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ 
194b3(1): rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas brtan pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba dang / don sna tshogs kyi mdzod/ 
194b4(1): 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes bya ba la mnya' bar gnog ste/ de dag la pa tshogs pa mngon pa shes pa dang / ye shes chen po'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin sa yongs su sbyong par byed brgya stong phrag bcu 'amang ba la snyoms
194b5(1): par 'dug kong sa de thabs dang / shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzind de dgarab thob pa dang / snying rje dang snying rtse ba'i mthus nyan thos kyi sa la so 'das pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das
194b6(1): pa yin/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par dbyang ba'i sa mngon gsum du gyur ba yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa pa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lus kyi las chad myed pa mtshan
194b7(1): mdang bral la rab tu 'byung do ka dag gi las chad byed mya nan ma dang bral ba ba tu byung ngo // yid kyi las chad byed pa mtshan ma dang bral ba zhin tu rnam sbyangs pa/ myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pas sdang bar gyur pa tshad myed
194b8(1): rang byung ngo// rgya num sem sa dpa' das par mos pa'irnapas rnas pa/  ma pa'i mas pa bya'o// sngang chub sems dpa'is dang po la ga pa tha'i zhes/ kyang ba pa pa'i sus rgyas pa nga ngad dang / 
194b9(1): yid kyi las chud myed pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 'dus nas/ rlos/ byang chung khrims dpa' rdo rje stong pos smras pa'i kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar 'ang yin te/ de ni sangs
194b10(1): bya chos la'ang myigs pa'i mthur zad kyi rang gi blos rnal par dbya yan ma ngon no// byang chub sems dbaldi pa btsun po 'di la ni ring gi blo'i rgyad yul rnam pal dpyod pa rab tu thob pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya
195a1(1): thams cad kyis spyi phrogs pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dri lta ste dper na/ rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa'i rgyal po'i bu/ rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa ni bcas a khrag tu/ rgyal po'i byin gyis blon po'i tsho gas thams pad-i/ 
195a2(1): kyis gnon gyis rang gi thos rnas par dpyad pas ni ma yin no// nam nar son par gyur pa de'o che// rang gi blo'i mthus blon po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de 'di de bzhin du rgya
195a3(1): chub sems dpa' 'ang sems bskyed pa zag tu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid rten pos/ nya r+Ya rA/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// rang gi blos nas par brtags pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems ba'i
195a4(1): ma'adun pa 'ad sa gnas byong chub ses pa dpa 'di/ rang ga gtams rnaM 'inas sa rgyus kyi kya thos dang / bangs rgyam da pa'i tshul gas na sus ma yi do// kye rgyal ba'i thas de sam
195a5(1): thob ma yin te/ khyad par gong du brtsal ba'i brtson 'grus kyong yongs su myi gtong ngo // yongs su btsal pa'i brtson 'grus des kyang / yang deg pa'i mthar gnas pa la'ang gnas te/ khyab par gong ma shind du thob pa
195a6(1): bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu'ang gyi byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yas chad du byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa/ 
195a7(1): ma snyoms par 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos/ smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan cad/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gog pal snyoms par 'jug ste 'bya
195a8(1): chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// sems skad cig re re la yang 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ 'gog pa ma ngon tu bya zhes ni myi bya'o// re bas na de ni
195a9(1): bsam gyis myi khyas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldad pa zhes bya pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang/ chub sems ra pa la yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang / gnas
195b1(1): yade dag pa'i mtha'al mngon tu yang myi byed pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ji lta ste dper na/ myi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru chen por zhugs te/ rgal pa'i thabs la mkhas shing / 
195b2(1): rgyu lesakhas pa dang / tshul mkhas pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i nyes pas myi gos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas shing / pha rol
195b3(1): tu phyin pa'i zla chen por zhugs pa yang / yang dag ta'i mtha' la gnas pas yang gnas la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu yang gyi byed do// de ltar de ye shes kyi stobs dang // shugs thob pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / e shes kyi/ 
195b4(1): stobs dang / shugs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang / thabs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / shugs chen pos 'khor bdi sgo yang ston la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i khasam 'dang yang myi 'bral ba yin// 'khor mang / 
195b5(1): zos kun nas bskor bad snang yang rtag tu rgyun gyi rnyed par sems med kyi dben pa yang rab tu thob pa yin/ khams gsum du skye ba bad 'a smod lam gi dbang gis mngon par smrab lag 'jig rten gi nyes pas kya
195b6(1): rgya gos ma yin/ zhing rab tu zhi ba 'ang yin la thabs kyis kyang ra 'ban te/ de ltar 'bar yang tshig par myi 'gyur ba yis/ sar sa rgyas rgya shes lang med yongs su 'jug la/ nyan thos da / 
195b7(1): rang sangs rgyas kyi sgras kyang phyir ldog pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi thil du yang phyin la bdud kyi yul na'ang 'dug par snang ba yin// bdud kyilam zhi las kyang yang dag par 'das la/ bdud sul dang / spyod yu
195b8(1): sad/ sang ba bar ston pa yin/ gru stegs cad gi gnas thams cad na'ang 'dug par snga nga la/ sangs rgyas su stegs kyi gnas kyi bsas pa yang myi gtong ba yin pa/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad dang ldan par sdang la/ 'jog
195b9(1): rnyed las 'das pa'i chu ba la yang yang dag par no/ gzhol ma yin/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ma dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am rtsi dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs dang / 'jig rte
195b10(1): byo gagon po thams cad las lhag pa'i rgyan dang / lba ba drub shin tu bsgrub pa ya pa rab tu thob la/ chos la dga' ba'i yid la bya ba'ang myi spong ba yin// de de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan par/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du
196a1(1): gsong ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lha bu rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas pa sdang bar 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas
196a2(1): stong khrag mar po dang / sangs rgya su skyong thag sang yo pa/ sang ga rgyas bye ba rgya stong bragasar po nang / sa ba rgyas khrag smrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas ba thub zhig brgyags mang tho dang / sangs rgyas tshig khrig stong phrag sa tsha
196a3(1): dang/ sangs rgyas phrag khrig brgya stong phrag ma ba po ldan bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim 'gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// ste stang
196a4(1): byed do// mtshon pa byed do lan bza' dpas son snyoms dang / gzim sa na dang / spyan gyi rkyed sman dang / me byad dag kyang 'phrul // shing / byang chub sems dpa'i bde gad yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bral lo// dge 'dun ga tshogs rna/ 
196a5(1): layang dag pam sa chod pa byed de/ dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// de ldang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkung byed cing / de dag las rjes nga/ 
196a6(1): ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa yang dgra baba'arin to// nyan thos dang/ rang rgyas kyi mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dri bas kyang myi phrogs pa yin te/ re sdon pas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i chos kyi bzod pa rnam par dag par 'gyun
196a7(1): de na kyang chu des sarnapa pan su mos kyang chu par 'do dam pan kyi da son pas kyang banas rgyab dang / nas dargya grag tum dang / khanas bzhing zan dub dang / yan 'an sa rgya
196a8(1): drus dam/ bsas pa brgya bong zag tu la dang / bskalang pa lag zlog stong phrag tum dang / thims pam zhug brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal po khrag khrig sargya stong phrag du ma mazhin tud dgacing yongs su bya bar gnam dzo/ 
196a9(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na gser gi saM le s+pha la de nyid rin po che thams cad kyis rar d+ha smras pa'i sngon pas kyang rgyas kyi rnam pa gzhan dang / gzhan gis myi thub pa dang / ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal
196b1(1): sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyis bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag sngon pas kyang ches shin tu byang ba dang / chos 'od gsapa
196b2(1): zhing dang par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gyi 'phrogs pa yin no// kye rgyal gris 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i 'od ni skar la'i tshogs dang / zla ba'i 'od kyis kyi phrogs shing 'jam bu'i glar ni rjen gyi bag
196b3(1): yod pa thams cad kyang shin du skams par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sngon pas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
196b4(1): thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs pa yin// phyin ci log bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rlan gyis rnam pa thams cad kyang yongs su sems so// de'i pha rol tu phyin bcu las thabs mkhas pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i shas che ba yin
196b5(1): te/ gas rnams kyang cul dus sa kyi smras pa pa bad ni/ rgyas pa'i zab dan kya chus ses sa dpa' sems dpa' dzin no dang rnams kyi ma dadum nga ba zhes bya ba ste byang chub shesas dpa'i 'tha
196b6(1): mdor snyan pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' semasachen po ni phal cher lha'i brgyal po dbang sgyur du gyur te/ sems can rnams la mngon par rtog pa'i ye shes yang dag par bstabs pa
196b7(1): ma kha!shing mthul yod pa ste nyan thos dang d+ma rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su dri bas myi zad pa yin/ sems can skyon myed par shin tu bzla bar bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ sbyin pa 'am/ ngag snyan pa 'am/ don smrab
196b8(1): pa 'am/ don mthun pas de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gtso bo ma 'gyur ro// thu bor 'gyur ro// phu la khru 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur ro// 
196b9(1): ldan byed par 'gyur ba 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'drend par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad pa byen pa'i ye shes brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste/ pha rbab rgyam yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la ba dang / dge 'dun pa/ 
196b10(1): la khya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / 
197a1(1): myi 'jigs pa med sa kya ga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi ge sI bar du yid bya ba dang / myi bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yun
197a2(1): cas zad cig tun ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu tho ba zhing de dag la ba snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bye khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par zhes pa dang / 'dzin
197a3(1): rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sdang bar bya ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yid du sbyin par bya ba dang / bskal sa bye ba khrag khrig pa stong gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ba'i mtha'i bskal pa byed pa
197a4(1): khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la rab tu 'jug pa pang / chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khra ga khri gi brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag
197a5(1): 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ myig kam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyar se sam/ pyod pa 'am/ rgyan tam/ byin kyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ ma rom par 'du byed pa dag kyi/ bskal pa bya ma dang /  bskal pa brgya phrag
197a6(1): chus dang / skal pa stong phrag rngu ga dang/ bskal pa rgya stong khrag du sa.a dang // bskal pa bye ba khral khrig brgya stog snga ga dus 'i mar gyis kyang bzang bza' dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos mo dran
197a7(1): 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ye shes don dam tshig gi rjes snyegs shing / sa drug rtogs pa'i yid ldan bdag nyid mnyam gzhag pa// shes rab/ 
197a8(1): thabs gnyis zung du 'brel pa mngon par sdug/ mkhas pa sa 'dun 'apyod pa dam pa yongs su gnon// stong pa mchan byed kyi smon spyi rje byams dang ldan/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod par byed/ 
197a9(1): shes pas shes bya ba bsod nams stobs rgyas kyi ngoms pas// de byim mkhas pa bdun pa'is phyogs yo sku gnon// khams gsum mngos par sgrub byed shin lung gis rlob// nyon mongs stobs nags zhi yid 'gro la zhi la chog
197b1(1): gyi gsor sgrub skyilas myi gnyis chos 'apyod kyang// snying rje las bapyod ston la mkhas pas 'dun gnon ga nam kha'i bsame pas zhing rnam sa longs spyod nam rgya tog ku/ rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan zhing rkyen mo 'chos dang ldan
197b2(1): rjod pa'i dbyangs thas 'gro sa gar bya ro tu gnyes// skad cig sems kyis rgyal pas/ kun sa khyen yang dag zhol// chos rnams 'di dag kyang bas sdang bzo ba 'gyur bas// 'gro ba'i don 'dod la mchog yo rjes su
197b3(1): ces bya// de dag sa 'di gnas gingam pa' yas sems can 'apyod// bde gshes chad byed las mkhyen rnam par dpyod par byed// zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs sna tshogs rgya sa dang // mes dang bsas pas sems dang
197b4(1): pa tshogs dang / gatheg pa gsum po bstan rang myed yab dag 'dug/ bdag gi sems can de dag yongasu sbyin bya zhes// de dag de ltar ga nas bye shes rab las ldas pa/ spyod las zhi bor mngon par 'tshon zhing bas
197b5(1): dang ldan// sems kyi skad cig kun la byang chub yon tan la smra ba// pha rol pa phyin bcu pa 'acug yongs su rdzogs par byed// sems skyes 'gro la yongs sngo de ni sbyid pa'o// tshul khrisas nyon mo sa zhi la
197b6(1): bzod pa gyi tshig pa/ kha thos 'grus de nas byed par gong du phyin ge ba ste/ la a las ma sprul de ni legs ldan bsam gtan no// // myi skye ba'i bzod pa rtul byed mazhes pa'o shes rab mchog/ da lu
197b7(1): mngon 'dod rje ba dos spong las ste// myi thub stobs yin shin tu rtog bzhi she shes so// de ltar byang chub yon nyan thams cad skad cig ldan// ring por dmyigs pas yon tan mangs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gnyis
197b8(1): dri ma brtsal phyir gsum la bgegs pa mal bas// bzhi lnga las gyis lnga la mnyam kha kyis te// gyi skye'i sdang bas mkhas pa'i drug po rnam par 'phyel// bdun po 'drir byin yon tan mthal dag kun rdzogs par// smen
197b9(1): lam dra ma sna tshogs pa'ad par bskul pa byed// sa byor zhen ye shes myong pa 'dir grub ste// don pa brgyan pa yin na kun tu nam dog 'gyur// 'da' dka' byin dka' ye ges mang po las kyis grub ga zhing gnyis
197b10(1): par mtshams ji ltar yongs su la rgal dka' bzhin // bdun la 'apyod pa rgyal po chags phyed ji bzhon te/ las la~M gnas pa yin gyi thams cad brtan pa 'das// brgyad ye shes pa dang gar che ldan par 'gyurd/ 
198a1(1): de me sems kyi sum panas soshes las gnas la/ tshangs pa 'gro ba la'ang bya'i bdag nyid byin// de bzhin lakhas pa pad ma bzhin du gyi chags kyang // 'ad gnas ma tshan mongs su tshogs rab tu 'ad // khyod ce na
198a2(1): daspyod byed byang ba'ang thob phyin// lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod myed phyid// rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de bas bzal ba myon// 'jig rten bzo'i dang lngas rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas
198a3(1): te zhes byas dang // bsam gtan mngon shes byasgobs ldan par 'gyur ba rnams/ de bas gsal gyur da ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub// nyan tho smra rang rgyal dpyod la sa yongs su 'das pa ste// bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyor
198a4(1): la mal sa banas// snga 'chang bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes kyis// nad mon mtha' dang ldan pa'i bu bzhin no// shis tu bza ba dang ldan pas pa rtsom byed de// 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par myi byed do// rdo ltar rgya mtshor
198a5(1): byin cing bu che galugs bya da pa// sra mul thams cad mdze par byaras rgyal sngon gyi 'gyud// de dag smon pas sabs dang shes rab chog da // zhes dka' 'gro ba kun du shes byed yon tan mang// sangs rgyas bye ba yang
198a6(1): snrubasam padag pas zod// gser smra nyid rig chen mang thos smras panin// 'di la gan sa hA 'aM zhes rab mchog ga 'od// zed panyi mun mas ji rnaM gnyis bzhis yongs su sems// sa mchog 'dis gnas pa'i dbang sbyar rgya
198a7(1): bor 'gyur// ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu pa' ston la mthu yod mkhas// 'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chang pa dag/ phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zong // 
198a8(1): yan cad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang myed// 'di ni sa mchog btsun pa ste// rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang // 'jig rten rkun gyis shes par dka'// thabs dang she sa spyod pa'o// ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'i bdun pa'o// 
198a9(1): / dum bu gnyis pa// / bam po bcu dgu pa// mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas su// lha'i tshogs dang lha'i dbang po kun kyang dga'// byang chub sems pa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po la// bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras
198a10(1): rnams la mchod pa byed/ me toka 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan pa dan yid 'o ga/ spos dpa'aphye ma rin cen na bza' rgyan// dbyig gis spras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khri ka dang / 'phreng ba'i srin gyi dam pa'i char yar mngon 'babs shing // lha'i bu mos
198b1(1): yid du 'od sgra dbyangs glu// du ma'i sil snyan gang gi mchog dang byas pas// der glegs dang rgyal sras mchod don tu// rngub pa'i yon tan rmad du byung rjod de// thams cad gzigs pas rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso// sangs rgyas 'apyod yul 'gro
198b2(1): la bar phyir ston mdzan pa/ dbyangs srin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba'i// rnga dang sil sman sno rnams las 'di yang byung sna'i che la bder gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed de// 'ga' 'ga' khrag khrig bye ma'i dul bas de yang mang / 
198b3(1): zhing mchog dam pa mnyam pa myed bu dag na/ khyu mchog rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad// spu gcig rtse la 'byam klas dam pa'i zhing mang po// gling bzhi du ma rgya mtsho a tsho can kun gnas te// 'khor yug bye ba de ba
198b4(1): zhid ri bar thams cad kyang // so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur te// skra'i rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po// yi dgas byol song myi dang sems dmyal lga// gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lba myi mang po dag/ sna tshogs las kyi
198b5(1): yul la bun kyang spyod byed de// rdub bral kun gyi zhing ni byed yul kun tu ni// 'tshon mo'i dam pa'i mchog kyang dere 'khor 'gyur te// 'gro pa'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin myod pa la// bde gshegs gas rgya
198b6(1): gi dam pas kun kyang bstan byas// sems can las la bde gshegs zhing mang sna tshogs te// zhing la sems can mar snyed lus kyang de bzhin no// lga dang spyi'i lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs te// mkhyen nas bde bar
198b7(1): gshegs pa kun la bston dashin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes par gyur te// rtul gyi mchanas dag la 'dra shes yangs par 'gyur// de la 'asogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phyal ni// 'jig rten kun gyis brjod kyang zad
198b8(1): gyi 'gyur ro// che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du// snyan pa'i dbyangs su grags gyur nas// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi// gsung ba'i mchog la lta zhing gnas// 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur da nas// rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa/ 
198b9(1): brgyad pa'i rnam pa dang / de la 'dral ta bstan par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje snying pos spras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpalas bdun pa la nas
198b10(1): par bye bshin tu byas pa'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi ma las shin tu sbyangs pa/ tshogs shin tu brtsegs pa/ spod lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs dang / shugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu rlabs pa// rang gi dge
199a1(1): ba'i rtsa ba stobs dang / shugs thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yod la bya ba dang ldan lnga/ bsam pa dang / lhag bsam pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 
199a2(1): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa/ snying rje dang // snying che ba chen pos sems can kyi khas thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ ye shes las chad myed pa'i rjes su song ba de chos thas cad thog
199a3(1): pa nas pa byung ba nyid la yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du 'jug go// ma skyes pa dang / 'tshan nyid byed pa dang // du skye ba skyed pa dang / 'jig pa byed pa dang / thug pa byed pa dang / byi rgyu ba dang / gyi ldog byed pa dang / dngos po byed pa'i
199a4(1): rang bzhin dang / thog pa dang / tha ma dang / dpur mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par myi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'ang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ des rnam pa thams cad du/ sems dang / 
199a5(1): yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes dang bral shing thegs pa myed la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing / nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
199a6(1): ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi g.yol ba thob ma thag tubyang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba/ #
199a7(1): myi bde ba mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba// 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir ldog pa/ tshad myed pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs pa dben pa thams cad mngon tu
199a8(1): gyur da pa/ shi nad tu thob pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems na khams cad la dbang thob pa mthar kyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa/ 
199a9(1): nirgyu ba dang / sems pa dang / g.yo' ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
199a10(1): brgyad pa myi g.yo' ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob cing lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsol ba thams cad dang bral te/ shi nad tu dben pa'i dben pa'i chos nyid la
199b1(1): gnas pa yin kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na myil la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmyi lam nu/ bdag chu bo chen pos khyer ba snyam byed la/ de de nas ci byin ci 'og tu 'bad cing tshol ba/ 
199b2(1): chen po chom tshim pa las/ de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur da na/ des sad ma thag tu 'bad cing grol ba thams kyi bral bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
199b3(1): yang nyon mongs pa'i chu ze chen po bzhir sems cas mang po dor bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo// de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi g.yol ba 'di thob sa thag tu / ched du bya ba
199b4(1): thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am/ mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang / thams cad kyi thams nad du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni
199b5(1): 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su myi rgyu ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ byang chub seMs/ dpa'i sa myi g.yo rna ba la gnas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang / yid
199b6(1): dag rnas pa gapa yangasapa chub rnas bams pa da kyi med du ma ga pa kyi ma ba yin te/ de sangs rgyas la songs pa gnas/ byung chub la yongs sa sug nga/ byang chub the mdum #
199b7(1): la yongs su rgyu ba 'am// rang sangs rgyas la yong su rtsub 'phe/ nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ma 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgya bo'am/ dgra bcom pa la yongs su rgyu ba 'am phyir myi 'ong gal mo// 
199b8(1): ras su slu ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa la yongasu rgyu ba 'am yongs su kyi rgyun/ 'jig rten pa'i yongs su g+hu/ yongs su myi rgyu ba lta ci smos// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar gyi gsol ba'i sa la~M gnas pa'i rkyen
199b9(1): chung sems dpa'i smon 'i mtha' las kyi stobs dang / shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye rab bsgrub pa mdzad de/ de
199b10(1): 'di skad ces kyang bka' sa la pa to// rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs pa gyul kha/ 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa//  yin na// 'od kyang rigs kyi bu de gyi stob
200a1(1): bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyed la myed kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa desadag yongs su bcal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ bzod pa'i sgo 'an
200a2(1): nyid kyang ma btang shig/ rigs kyi 'di lta ste/ khyed kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang / byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongasu rgyu bar gyur d+ha na/ de ltar
200a3(1): rnam par rtog pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu mnar ba la sems 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu sngon gyi smon lam/ sems can gyi don yongs su grub par bya bar btab pa dang / ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis myi khyab par dran par
200a4(1): gyis shig/ 'di ltar yang rigs bu 'don chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams byur yang rung // chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste/ 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
200a5(1): nyi tshe brjod par byas ma yin te/ nyam thos dang / rab sangs rgyas dang /  thams cad kyang rnam par myi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di pa tho ba/ rigs kyi bu khyod nged kyis lus tshad b+hU dang / ye shes tshad myed pa dang / sangs
200a6(1): kyi zhing tshachad myed pa dang / ye shes mngon par skrag pa tshad myed pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad myed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dge ba tshad myed pa la ltos/ khyed kyis kyang de bzhin du mngon par
200a7(1): bsgrub par bya dgos so// 'di ltar rigs kyi bu ga pa de ltar chos thas cad la rnam par myi rtog pa de ni khyed kyi snang ba gcig pur zad te/ rigs zla de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ yongs su mthe'
200a8(1): par song la/ yongs su mtha' yas par kha sgrub pa ste/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig pabye stong gis kyang bgrangs rla bas/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrub pa bskyed cig/ 'di ltar yang rigs kyi
200a9(1): bu khyogs bcu'i bzhir chad byed pa dang / sems can tshad myed pa dang / chos rnam par phye ba tshad myed pa la ltos te/ de dag thams cad mnon par bza pa bar gyis cig ces te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar/ de sa
200a10(1): bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la so rdzogs pa gang gis// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rnam par phye ba'o chu/ 
200b1(1): ru ma jam par ba smra ba'i las chad byed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gzhal du myed pa de dag nye bar bsgrub pa ma dad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khyed kyiso rjes pa dang / khong du chud par bya na gal te sangs rgyas brtsem
200b2(1): ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor zhugs par mdzad du zin na/ de nyid de'i mtha' las rgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur da te/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa
200b3(1): 'ang rgyan bcad par 'gyur ro// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i las gang gis skad cig gcig tu mngon par sgrubs pas kyang / thog pa sems bskyed pa phyi nad cad sa bdun
200b4(1): la zhugs shing rjes su song ba'i yongs su brtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gyi cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / phrag khrig brgya'i cha dang / khA ga khri stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya skyong gi char nye bar gyi 'gro 'am/ bkrang
200b5(1): ba dang ga dper dang rgyur yang nye bar gyi 'gro ba nas skrun pa tsam gis paradru'ang mya chog pa de snyed du chad bya'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa las nye ba pa sgrub pa ma rbad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang chad lus cig/ 
200b6(1): gyis mngon par bsgrub pas// spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur gyi 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams ni lus rnam par phye/ pa tshad myed pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su spyad de/ nyebya bya
200b7(1): dbyangs mngon par smrab pa tshad myed pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad myed pa dang / skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa yang myed pa dang / zhing yong su spyad pa tshad myed pa dang / sems can yongs su spring par bya ba chad myed pa dang / 
200b8(1): sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba chad myed pa dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang / shugs chad myed pa dpa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khob chad byed pa rnam par skye ba dang / 
200b9(1): tshad myed pa rjes su song ba khris dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i myod pa thams cad kyi mthul gyi skul ba'i tshul gis// yang dag par bsgrub po// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po pa 'gro ba'i gru ni/ 
200b10(1): rgya mtsho chen po sa phyin kyi bar bya/ ched du baspyod rtsipa 'gro bar bya ba yin te/ rgya mtsho 'a chen po la zhend ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis srubs ched du bskyed myi dgos pa yin// des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin gcig gis rdzi cod pa de ni sngon ched du
201a1(1): 'gyon cing 'gro sna lo brgyad yang de ltar chad skyed par byin par gyi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs yang dag par dazugs pa theg
201a2(1): chen po'i grur zhugs pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i bskyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas yud cas gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes ji tsal yang dag par gnod pa'i de ni sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i kham
201a3(1): kyi bskal pa brgya stong du yang drag par gnon par myi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di tho ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis bsgrub pa'i lhan gyis grub
201a4(1): la shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blos thams cad mkhyen ba'i ye shes pa rnam par dpyod cing //  'jig rten gyi khams 'byung rdzab yang rnam par dpyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa 'ang rnam
201a5(1): par dpyod do// de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes/ 'jig rten ji ltar 'jig pa de yang rab tu shes so// las gang bam/ gas pas 'jig rten byung bar gyur da pa de yang rab tu shes so// las gang 'u
201a6(1): ramags pas 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba'i de yang rab tu shes so/ dus ji srid kyil 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur da pade yang rab tu shes so// dus ci srid kyis 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so// 
201a7(1): shes 'on pa'i khams chad byed pa yang rab tu shes so// sa'i khams rnam par bye ba yang rab tu shes so// de mu'i khams shin tu chu la yang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams gin du che ba yang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams cad/ 
201a8(1): mags rtsornas ra gyigasang btugs so/ dkyi pa sa rgyu byasapa shes ro// 'i las choga'ang bzhugs so/  byo bsas can byid pa'ang sushes / 
201a9(1): mamarnams par bye ga 'as tugs so de nga rgya gags shin tu rung ba da shes so// rlung kyilam pa shin tu ches ra tushes so// rnang gyi khams cad byed pa 'ang rab tu zhes zag dru gi 'ams na
201b1(1): bye ba 'ang rab tu shes so// de rtul shin tu phra ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// shin tu phra ba'i rdul yangs pa yang rab tu shes so// shin tu phra ba'i rdul chad myed pa rlab tu shes so// gnang tu phra ba'i rdul rnam par bye'i la'ang rab tu shes
201b2(1): so// 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sa'i khams kyi rngub shin du phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyi rab tu shes so// chu'i khams kyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed dag kyang rab tu shes so// mye'i khams kyi rdul tu phra ba de dag kyang
201b3(1): rab tu shes so// rlung gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rin po che rnam par phye ba ji snyed yod pa dang // rin po che'i tshul shind tu phra ba ji snyed sod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can gyi lus la rdub
201b4(1): ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// zhing kyi rgyad lhun la rdul shin tu pra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// de sems cad gyi lus che ba dang / lus yangs pa dang / lus pA ba dang / lus rnam par bye ba'ang rab
201b5(1): tushes mo/ sems cand byal pa'i sa cul shin tu phra ba 'i snyed kyis 'byung ba dang / rgyal ma gi ste gnas pa'i nga shrIts+tsha tu zla brji sa byu dang / gzhan 'i 'jig rted du khrus chu gishing tu ma
201b6(1): byed kyis drang ba dang yus son tu tshig ces pa bu di bdi byed kyis byung ba dang pa'i 'tshig nyon pa'i spos na ni rdzi ma srid kyis byung ba dang / chogs marnas pa bas
201b7(1): rtsa shin tu phra gaji srid gis byung ba de dag kyang ra tu shes so/ ri ga cu la shin su za ba rab tu dbyebs grugs pani 'ad pa 'i khams 'jog pa'ang rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu na rnon
201b8(1): pa'ang rnanas cho da pa ba'am na na/  byab 'argab mas tugs so// gsags phyid kyi dug 'ams sa so zhi
201b9(1): khams chu pa'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams rtse ba 'ang rab tu zhe satho/ 'dod pa'i khams chad myed pa 'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khas sa rnama'am phye la 'ang rab tu shes so//  gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
201b10(1): byed pa'i khams chung pa yang rab tu shes so// che ba'ang rab tu shes te so// tshad myed pa 'ang rab tu shes so// rnam par phye ba 'ang rab tu shes so// de khams gsum rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes khong du chud par mdzen/ 
202a1(1): gsang smras pas sa shes kyi mang ba da sa sems can kyisas rab tu byas sa sams cag thang kyi lu nas par byag 'amigs sa sams sa skyes myu 'ad du du sa tho
202a2(1): tu gtong ste/ de ni sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi skye ba yang / yongs su gru la ji 'dra ba/ de lta bur rang gi lus byid kyi rnab bo// de steng gsum rgya stong chen po'i 'di gi nyi gis
202a3(1): brgyas par bkar zhing / sems can gyi mos la ji lta bu de bzhin du rang gi lus myig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub ste/ stong gsum gyi stong ched po'i 'jig rten gyi kha
202a4(1): gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drag gas/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ gsum bcu 'am/ bzhi brgya'am// lnga bcu dag nas/ brjod du byed pa'i yang rjod du myed pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkarang ste/ chen
202a5(1): sa can kyi nyos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rang gi lus myig g.yod lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas / skye bar bya ba'i khyir mngon dbar smrab po/ de de lta bu'i ye shes dang / ldan pas sangs rgyas rgya
202a6(1): zhing gcig nas myi gsol la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du myed pa ngag gi de bzhin gshes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag tu snang bar phyin pa yin/ de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam pa nata
202a7(1): bye ba dang / thos pa dang / bsas pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de dang / de dag dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang bo ga tu de lta de ltar rang gi lus ston te/ me dge sbyong gi khro rad kyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong
202a8(1): dog dang / gzugs ston to// bram ze'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor du bram ze'i kha dog dang / gzugs ston to// rgyal rigs kyi 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor du/ rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang / gzugs ston to// rje'u rigs kyi 'khon
202a9(1): kyi dkyil 'khor bu rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang / gzugs ston to// khyim bdag gi 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor du/ khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rgyal chen po bzhi'i ros kyi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor du de rgyal tsha
202a10(1): chen po bzhi'i ris kyi kha dog dang / gzugs ston to// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi/ 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor bu gsum rtsa gsum pa'i kha dog dang gzugs stonang to// de bzhin du mche ma'i kho rab kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dgal
202b1(1): ldan gyi thodang byidakyil 'khor dang // 'phrul dka'i 'khorang dkyil 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i la rang kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ chog kyi gyi 'amad kyi dkyil 'khor
202b2(1): kyi bar du de lho de lta bu'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to// de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs stod to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnamams la'ang
202b3(1): sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs ston byang chub sems dpa'as 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / kha dog dang gzugs stond to// de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems
202b4(1): de can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbu dpa/ kha dog dang/ gzugs 'on to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed 'a ni drag gis sems can rnams rgya mos parab tu mang ba de dag thams cad rang gi
202b5(1): khrus de lta de ltar rnam par bye ba yongs su ston to// de lus kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang rnam par dral ba ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can gyi lus rab tu shes so// shing gyi lus dang / las rnas
202b6(1): bar sbyid pa'i lus dpa' nyan thos kyi lum dang / rang sangs rgyas/ lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku dang ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang / des sa la'i lus nata tra
202b7(1): kyang rab tu shes so de sems cad rnams kyi sems dang / bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pas yongs su shes pas/ 'dod na sems can gi lus nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin du zhing gi khrus dang / las
202b8(1): rnas par smyin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyag nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis
202b9(1): rlob bo// des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub par yongs su shes pas// sems can gyi lus rang gi lu su byin gyis rlab bo// de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par sbyin pa'i lus dang / 
202b10(1): nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhigs pa'i sgra'i dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang / nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byed kyis rlob po / des
203a1(1): gshes gnasas tubyams dang / khams pa mdod pa 'asmras pa 'ongs sugs sus ka byung / lus gas ga tu 'ang bad na ma/ tha dan 'ad rgya /  na
203a2(1): las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so// rnam par spyon pa'i lus dang / nyon mongs pa'i lus dang / gzugs kyi lus dang / gzugs myed pa'i lus kyang rab tu shes so// zhing gyi lus rnams kyi chung ba'i rang bzhin yang rab tu shes so// che ba dang / chad byed
203a3(1): pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / snrel gzhi dang / s+ye'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyam par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba yang rab tu shes so// las rnam par spyod pa'i lus rnam par phye/ 
203a4(1): ba'i brdalapa dag tun sa/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi lus rnag par phye ba'i brda dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i rna dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda' yang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur
203a5(1): gyi lus dang / bsod nam sa kyi lus dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / rjes kyi phra sa kyang rab tu shes so// ye shes kyi lus rnams kyi shin tu rnam lam/ dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags
203a6(1): pa laya ba rab tu shes so// 'bras bu'i spyod pas yang dag par bzung ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par phye ba dang / theg pa gsu ma rnam par dgod pa dang / thun mo dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba
203a7(1): dngag gyi 'byung ba dang / slob ma dang myi slob pa yang rab tu shes/ so// chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// 'khrul payA pa rab tu gis so// gnas dang brda dang / kun rdzob rnam par dgod pa dang / sems can dang / 
203a8(1): sems cad ma yin pa'i chos rnas par dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par dgod pa yang rab tu shes so// nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad byed pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi rjes su som
203a9(1): pa dang / lus byed pa dang / nod pa myed cing // mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mang po mngon zhing / gsal bar byed pa yang rab tu shes so// des lus myi shes mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bur rab tu thob pas/ bskal pa brjod du byed
203b1(1): pa yang brjod du byed par che byin kyi rlag pa'i phyir tshe'i dbang rab tu thom zog ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtog pa'i ye shes mas 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi rab tu zla bzo 'jig rten gyi khas thams cad rgyad thums rab tu da
203b2(1): cing gi nang tu grug pa'i byid kyis rlabs pa'i yang dag dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir yo byad kyi dbang rab tu zo za zo// las kyi rnam par spyon pa'i byin gyi rlabs chus bzhin du mno par snyam pa'i phyir las myo ba' rab tu thob no// 
203b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongasasu bstan pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang dus ga tu ci dgal bar ma ngon par 'chang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo// 
203b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa rab tug pa paya bdag par bstan pa'i phyir mos pa'i dbang rab tu theg po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul ra / rnam par 'phrul pa yang dge par bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul
203b5(1): gyi bstobs rab tu 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'dzi chenags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpo'i byad bzang po dang / mngon par 'chang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ye
203b6(1): shes kyi dbang rab tu thob bo// mtha' dang dpung myed pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbu pa ba tu thob bo// de byang/ chub sems dpa'i dpapa bcul po 'di dag thob ma thig tu nas/ gas/ 
203b7(1): gyis myi khya ba'i ye shes dang / ldan pa yin chad myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ yangs pa'o ye shes dang ldan pa yin// myi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ des de lta bu'i rjes su so bzhing / de lta bu'i ye shes ldan pas lus
203b8(1): kha na ma tho ba shin tu myed pa yang dag par rgyu zhing byung ba yin/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba shind tu myed pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yon/ yid las kha na ma tho bshin tu myed bcing ye ges sngon tu 'gro ba ye shes rjes su 'brang ba/ 
203b9(1): gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pang ba bsgyur bas snying rje chen po sngon tu 'gro ba thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyis shin tu rlabs pa sems can
203b10(1): gyi don bya zhing sbyang ba rgyun ma chad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par phye ba/ yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung rje kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de la mdor bstan byeng chub sems pa'i sa g.yol ba 'di thol ba'i byang chub sems da
204a1(1): lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas rgyang chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo // de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi yol ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad dang bran
204a2(1): pa'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs shi nad tu brtan pa yin/ lam dang myi bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yin// sems can gyi don yongs su m+b+hi gtong ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po'i stobs shi nad tu brtan pa yin/ 'gro ba zhes
204a3(1): cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i stobs shinang tu brtan pa yin/ nyams pa myed pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzugs kyi stobs shi nang tu brtan pa yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu phye ba'i bye brag la mthu
204a4(1): pa'i phyir/ spobs pa'i stob la shin tu brtos pa yin// 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par spyod pa yi rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i stobs shind tu brtan pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su
204a5(1): gtong bas/ smon lam gyi stobs shinang tu brtan pa yis/ sangs rgyasakyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir phra rold tu phyin/ pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin/ thams cad mkhyedad pa'i ye shes rnam pa
204a6(1): thams cad du mngon tu gyur ba pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byis kyi rlo kyi stobs shin tu bstan pa yin te/ de de lta bu stobs kyi kug sa dang ldan pas bla ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston la/ rgya ba zas ba ca
204a7(1): cod kyang yang dag par ston la/ bya ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba yang myed pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sa brgyad pa ste/ myi 'phrogs pa'i phyir myi g.yol ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba
204a8(1): thams cad kyis shes par dga' bas na thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes bya'o// kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i phyir gzho mu'i sa zhes bya'o// bsam pa ji lta bzhin du dbang sgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o// gzod bya ba'i myed pas yongs su rdzon
204a9(1): pa'i sa zhes bya'o// ye shes kyis rnam par dbye bshin tu byas pas mthar thug pa'i sa zhes 'bya'o// smos las shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'is zhes bya'o// gzhan gyis rnam par gyi 'khrugs pa'i byin
204a10(1): kyi rnabs kyis sa zhes bya'o// sngon gyi mthar mngon par sgrub pas/ lhun gyis grub pa'is zhes bya'o// kye rgyal kha'i sras dag de ltar byang chub semasang ba'i de lta bu'i ye shes mngon khar bsgrubs dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi
204b1(1): kyi sa chu mang ga ngas rnam rgya na gyis shin rtsub yang pa byas pa/ de 'dzin pa'i sbyi las spyad pa dang / rus kyi rjes su mopo sasangs rgyas kyi yu la sas tu rjud pa don tog tu rgyu bya
204b2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu rnabs pa yin/ rgya byin rang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten 'gon thos rab tu gsu tha ma nA~M/ la gan rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin/ rting nge 'dzin gyi thazas yongs sus gtang ba min/ lu
204b3(1): rnam par bye ba chad myed pa mngon par grub pa yo de/ lus kyi myong ba'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ mngon shes pa chen po'i rnam par sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yis// ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la bang spru pa yin/ lum
204b4(1): bstan pa chad byed pa yang dag par non pa yin/ yongs su sbyin pa'i bzhin tu 'tsho pa rnams la mdzad par 'chang rgyal yongs su ston pa yin te/ de de la ba ni ldan zhing / theg pa chen po'i da kyil ma 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa shi tu
204b5(1): rnam par dpyas pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyu kyi chad par snang ba'i 'od gzer gtong ba'i chos kyi dbyings cha gus bskyed pa'i lus tu zhugs pa// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi las rnam par phye ba la
204b6(1): mkhas pa yon tan gyinas bathams pad yang dag par stonang ra sems bskyed pa la dbang sbyar brjon gyi mtha' dang / byin rjemapa' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes cad / bdud kyi lam thams cad yong 'bru
204b7(1): bzlog pa'i ye shes dang ldad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i ni 'jig rten gyi khamasa'i byamaklas zhing / mu myed pa dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i tshul gyis
204b8(1): spyod pas ro'i phyir byang chub sems de pa 'de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi g.yol ba tho ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'o sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'is kyi g.yol ba the ba'i byang chub sesas dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin
204b9(1): kyi na pa sgru babasad tu rnya byinan ma me pazhin gzhes pa la mas pas song bar dubyas pa yin/ yang sa rgyam mong ba la mdzad bya bsnyen pa kur ba rgya chen po yang yongs su ma ba ni
204b10(1): pa re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa re re dag tu yang sangs rgyas du ma dang // sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgya sra brgya stong gra gdun rang
205a1(1): ka sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig du ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas mthag khrig stong phrag tu ma dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig rgya stong phragazug
205a2(1): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma kha rim 'gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// sti stang byed do// mchod pa byed do// mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par dbul lo// de bzhin gshegs
205a3(1): ba de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba sngon tu 'gro ba'i chos snang ba nye bar sgrub pa yang yang dag par len na to// de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'o chos kyi sardod rab tu thob pas/ 
205a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su bris pa shin tu bstan pas myi 'phrogs pa yin/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya
205a5(1): stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa byed khrag khrig phrag tum dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bsngal pa khrag
205a6(1): khro la brgya stong phrag tu a dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu 'on gsal zhing dpapar gnas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste
205a7(1): dper na/ gser gi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas des yongs su zin par gyur nas/ marngam bu'i gling gyi bdag po'amagul lam/ mgo' la btags na/ sems cad 'jam bu'i gling pa'i thams cad kyi rgyan kyi rnam
205a8(1): pa kun gyis kyi thug/ myi phrogs pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi g.yol pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ar
205a9(1): gyi phyir gyi 'phrogs pa yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa las bdun pa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dba'i ye shes kyi 'od chen po ni ye shes kyi shin tu rnam par phye bas/ sems can rnams kyi nyan mongs pa'i thun pa rab tu se
205a10(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ stong la dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni/ stong gyi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas bkang zhing 'od kyis snang bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi g.yol/ 
205b1(1): ba'adi la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi 'ong rgya stong phrag bcu'i rnal shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi'ams snang bas rgyas par bgrang zhing / sems can rnams kyi thong
205b2(1): yongs su gdung ba mthar kyi sazhi ra byed do// lus kya bzhin tu tshim par byed do// de'i pha rol tu phyind pa bskulas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gas che ba yin te/ lpags rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par gyi bsgrub pa ma yin na
205b3(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa myi g.yo' ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mdor ston pa'o// rgya cher ni bskal pa su myed pas bstand pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub
205b4(1): sems dpa' ni phal cher stong gyi bdag po tshangs pa 'i chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan la zil kyis gnon cing / gzhan gi zi lad kyis myi non pa dang / don mthong zhing dbang thob par gyur da te// sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
205b5(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pas myi 'phrogs pa yin// de sbyin pa rta 'am/ ngag sten pa 'am/ don bsgrub pa
205b6(1): don srun pas / dge ba'i ma ba ga sa mam par rgyang ste/ yad dri gar rnams pa can pas na kyi chog tu kya nga / gcos sa/ gcu bor 'gyur/ yul rgyu 'byor/ das pas can/ zan byed par 'gyur/ bab
205b7(1): 'dren par 'gyur/ yong su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i khar du 'gyur snyam ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub seMs dpa' yid la bya ba dang / 
205b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya la dang / pha rol tu phyinang pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / myi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la
205b9(1): bya ba dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang / myi bral ba yin te/ de 'dod de skad cig yud tsam zad cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul gind tu phra ba
205b10(1): snyed rab tu 'thob ci/ de dag la snyoms par 'dug pa dang / sangs rgyas stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams stong gsum brgya
206a1(1): stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shind tu pra
206a2(1): snyed snang bar bya dang / sems cad stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su sbyin par bya ba pa / bskal pa stong gsus brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du gnas par byed pa dang / sngon gyi mthar
206a3(1): dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bzhal pa gong sum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyal shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'dug pa dang / rjes blo stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgya gshin tu phra ba snyed rnam pab khyod pa dang / sum stong gsum brgya rmo/

206b6(1): mtshangs byed lha dang kyis mchod pa// e shes sgom rnams nye bad sgrub pa mdzad// rgyal ba'i chos rgyal pha rol mtha' yas zhugs / ma dad pa// de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pas chard gyi 'gro// khyu ma mo/
